about_text: "The Chicago Hotel the World Knows Best." The hip & historic Palmer House Hilton has a history of over 140 years and after a multi-million dollar renovation continues to thrive in the heart of the theatre and financial district, just steps from the Art Institute, Millennium Park and State Street shopping. This Chicago hotel features 130,000 sq. ft. of function space with over 77 meeting rooms, seven ballrooms and two exhibition halls. Lockwood Restaurant and Bar, located just off the lobby and Potter's Lounge, perfect for cocktails will enhance your experience.

hotel_name: InterContinental Chicago Magnificent Mile, an IHG Hotel
about_text: Step into our airy lobby with a sweeping staircase and marble mosaic floors, and find yourself drifting into the Roaring Twenties at the InterContinental Chicago hotel, where historic origins blend into the modern luxuries of hospitality. Enjoy breathtaking views of Chicago from the 32nd-floor Tower Lounge, or unwind with a sauna or massage in our luxurious spa. An elevated dining experience with flawless service and gourmet cuisine typify Michael Jordan's Steak House and ENO Wine Bar.

address: 644 N Lake Shore Dr, Chicago, IL 60611-3017
about_text: See the Gold Coast of Chicago like never before at W Chicago - Lakeshore. From our perfect location on Lake Shore Drive, our hotel provides unlimited access to the best of Chicago, Illinois. During your stay in one of 520 sleek hotel rooms and suites, you can enjoy waterfront views that are absolutely unrivaled while you plan your next adventure. Meanwhile, stay active with the latest workout equipment at FIT or make a splash at WET®, our heated indoor pool. When hunger catches up to you during your visit, beat it like never before with seasonally inspired American cuisine at CURRENT, our hotel restaurant. Socialize over cocktails at the Living Room, the place to see and be seen on the Gold Coast. Celebrate and succeed in dynamic event space, from intimate meeting rooms to the stunning 33rd-floor Altitude, overlooking the shores of Lake Michigan. Whatever brings you here, W Chicago - Lakeshore is ready to help you keep it fun.

about_text: Located in Uptown Houston, near the Galleria Mall and 6 miles from Downtown Houston, the Four-Diamond Omni Houston Hotel elevates the guest experience. The hotel offers all the comforts and amenities of a resort with the convenience of an urban setting. Hotel Details: The hotel is a chic retreat with a luxury spa, weekend nightclub, and two outdoor pools. Enjoy Texas cuisine and stroll the lushly landscaped hotel grounds in Houston, TX. Plush room and suites feature marble baths and flat-screen TVs. Kids are treated to a games-filled backpack and in-room video games. As one of Houston's most romantic hotels, Omni Houston Hotel features elegant banquet rooms for weddings, as well as spaces for large corporate meetings. With fantastic city views, exceptional service and amenities, and the finest of dining and world-class shopping on your doorstep, Omni Houston Hotel is the only way to experience America's fourth-largest city.

about_text: Casual sophistication with modern appeal is what you'll find at The Royal Sonesta Houston, one of the few AAA Four Diamond rated hotels in Houston. From a laid-back atmosphere, ample amenities and fine dining to a location within walking distance to the Houston Galleria mall and Uptown neighborhood, our hotel is the perfect place to work, gather, rest or retreat. Settle into one of the 485 beautifully appointed guest rooms and suites, sip at Axis Lounge, or eat at ARA restaurant, TableOne chef's table, or Launch for meals on the go. Host a meeting, throw a gala or say "I do" in our 50,000 flexible square feet of event space, one of the finest for hotels in Houston, TX.

address: 111 N Post Oak Ln, Houston, TX 77024-7703
about_text: Travel + Leisure 2023 World's Best Award, No. 1 Resort Hotel in Texas With 27 wooded acres adjacent to Houston’s Memorial Park, this urban escape defines Texas elegance and delivers plenty of room to roam, dine and play with no resort fees! Guest pleasures are endless with meandering pools and outdoor spaces, legendary restaurants, newly renovated guestrooms and suites, and complimentary access to the exclusive Houstonian Club. This famous property was once the home of President and Mrs. George H.W. Bush and is a reflection of all that Houston is – strong, beautiful and friendly. The newly renovated Trellis Spa at The Houstonian with its outdoor Soaking Pools & Garden is right outside the door of the hotel, and Solaya Spa & Salon by The Houstonian is located just 2.5 miles from the property with complimentary transportation for hotel guests.

about_text: Discover the west end of Houston, TX, at the Houston Marriott Westchase. Our hotel offers spacious, well-appointed rooms, contemporary Texas-themed decor, and high-speed Internet throughout our AAA-rated 3-diamond hotel. Other amenities include indoor/outdoor heated swimming pools, a fitness center, parking, two restaurants, and Starbucks(R) coffee house. The Westchase section of Houston is conveniently located near key Houston landmarks like Reliant Stadium, Rice University, and The Uptown Galleria Area and is home to companies such as National Oilwell Varco, Honeywell, and BMC Software. A few minutes from the hotel is the I-10 Energy Corridor, a business hotspot for Energy powerhouses like ExxonMobil, Shell, BP, Schlumberger, and many others. Along with amazing rooms and service, we have over 43,000 square feet of available meeting space for your next conference or event, including the Grand Pavilion Ballroom, which has seating for 1,725 guests. Book your stay at The Houston Marriott Westchase Hotel today.

about_text: Situated in the heart of downtown’s thriving business and entertainment districts, the newly renovated Hyatt Regency Houston is connected to restaurants and services via the city’s famous seven-mile tunnel system. Walk to events at the nearby George R. Brown Convention Center. Take in an Astros' game at Minute Maid Park or Rockets' game at Toyota Center. Be sure to save time to enjoy a show in downtown’s Theater District or explore the shops along Main Street. A quick ride on Houston’s METRO Light Rail, with stops just seconds from our hotel, will take you to the renowned Museum District, Children’s Museum, the Houston Zoo, the Texas Medical Center or Reliant Park. When it’s time to relax, retreat to your spacious accommodations with Downtown views and thoughtful amenities. Always the right choice; book your reservation now at our outstanding accommodations.

address: 1200 Market Street Reading Terminal Market, Philadelphia, PA 19107-3615
about_text: Home to America’s first skyscraper and the Philadelphia Savings Fund Society (PSFS), Loews Philadelphia Hotel is a historic hotel in one of America’s most historic cities. In 2019, the hotel completed a renovation, updating the guestroom décor and bathrooms of each of the 581 guestrooms; added a brand new state-of-the-art fitness center, featuring TechnoGym equipment and Peloton bikes, and salon and spa by the renowned Joseph Anthony Salon & Spa. With over 47,000 of meeting and event space, Loews Philadelphia is the ideal choice for weddings, meetings or events. Take advantage of POD Market, an organic grab and go concept or enjoy an inherently American dining experience at Bank & Bourbon restaurant located off the hotel lobby featuring local seasonal fare and robust bourbon and cocktail program. Right outside our doors explore all the city’s most popular attractions including Reading Terminal Market, City Hall, LOVE Park, Dilworth Plaza and Benjamin Franklin Parkway, the home of the famous Rocky steps and the iconic Philadelphia Art Museum.

about_text: Experience the best of Center City at your doorstep while surrounded by deluxe, modern amenities at Philadelphia Marriott Downtown. address: 201 S. Christopher Columbus Blvd., Philadelphia, PA 19106-3101
about_text:
Enjoy spectacular views from your spacious and well-appointed guest room at Hilton Philadelphia at Penn's Landing. Relax and enjoy plush bedding, HDTV, complimentary WiFi. Amenities include refrigerator, iHome clock radio and work desk with ergonomic chair. Our hotel proudly features Peter Thomas Roth bath amenities in all guest rooms. Want to pamper even more? Enquire about our hotel's suite availability, some with an outdoor balcony for the ultimate hotel stay.

Experience waterfront dining at its best at Keating's Rope & Anchor Bar and Kitchen on the lobby floor of Hilton Philadelphia at Penn's Landing. Known for its delicious and innovative cuisine, the restaurant is open daily for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Room service is also offered for your convenience. 

Unwind in The Lounge at Rope & Anchor and watch the activities on the waterfront and the seasonal Spruce Street Harbor Park promenade.

about_text: In Texas we do things in a big way, and The Fairmont Dallas is no exception amongst hotels in Dallas, TX. In this modern city of soaring skyscrapers, The Fairmont Dallas luxury hotel sets the standard for style and elegance. With our ideal location in the heart of the Downtown Dallas Arts District, we are situated just moments from incredible fine dining, shopping, arts and world-class entertainment. Newly redesigned luxurious guest rooms and suites offer warm hospitality, modern décor and that special Texas flair for an unrivaled travel experience. Fairmont Gold, an exclusive boutique lifestyle experience, is designed to fulfill the needs of the discerning business executive and leisure traveler, with elite lounge access and all of the comforts of home. Enjoy The Pyramid Restaurant & Bar’s four-star cuisine and a Starbucks conveniently located on the lobby level.

about_text: Experience the best of downtown Dallas, TX when you stay at Omni Dallas Hotel. Connected to the Dallas Convention Center via sky bridge, the hotel is a sleek retreat with a full-service spa, heated outdoor infinity pool, rooftop terrace, 7 restaurants and a coffee shop. Relax in chic hotel rooms and suites featuring floor-to-ceiling windows with sparkling city views and sensory floor lighting. Fireplaces and living rooms are also available. The hotel is near historic Dealey Plaza, the Dallas Museum of Art, and less than a mile from Reunion Tower, West End Historic District and Dallas World Aquarium. From dining to culture to sporting events, Dallas has it all and Omni Dallas Hotel puts you right in the center of the action. Whether you are looking for a family retreat, couples getaway, staycation or a solo stay in the city, our hotel specials offer something for everyone.

about_text: The Austin Motel opened its doors in 1938, and its landmark neon sign has been brightening South Congress Avenue ever since. This recently remodeled 41-room motel, with classic motor court exterior, is centrally located in the heart of Austin’s most interesting cultural district and is close to downtown, the Congress bat bridge and other area attractions. The iconic motel’s amenities include a swimming pool with pool bar, communal hangout spaces, free WiFi, flat-screen TVs, and complimentary parking. The 24-hour reception desk and retail store caters to guest needs, offering snacks, drinks and interesting mementos.

about_text: Located in downtown Austin on the shores of Lady Bird Lake, the Hyatt Regency Austin is a full service hotel which offers cool, contemporary new guest rooms. Situated along the Hike & Bike trail, the hotel is within walking distance to all of downtown Austin's major entertainment districts, and 7 miles from Austin Bergstrom International Airport. Take a five-minute walk to Congress Ave Bridge near sunset in the summer to catch Austin’s famous bat show, featuring more than 1.5 million Mexican free-tailed bats.

about_text: Sophisticated design meets classic hospitality at what Condé Nast Readers voted as a Top 10 hotel in the Midwest. Boasting 1,013 contemporary guest rooms and 103,000 square feet of sprawling event space, JW Marriott Indianapolis is the crown jewel of the Marriott IndyPlace hotel complex, a distinct destination for business and leisure travelers in the downtown area. This renovated modern oasis is a haven where guests can experience world-class amenities, a convenient location and exceptional comforts. Not only offering the largest ballroom in the Midwest, this Downtown Indianapolis hotel also provides creative event planning services for meetings, weddings and social events of various sizes. There is also direct access via skybridge to the Indiana Convention Center & Lucas Oil Stadium for event larger events and conventions. In addition to incredible meeting space and spacious guest rooms, JW Marriott Indianapolis provides delectable dining onsite at High Velocity and OP Italian.

about_text: Welcome to the Conrad Indianapolis Luxury Hotel.The Conrad Indianapolis hotel in downtown Indianapolis is a destination that connects you with an innovative guest experience unmatched by other Indianapolis hotels. Located at the most prominent intersection in Indianapolis, a skybridge provides an uninterrupted path from our Indianapolis luxury hotel's ballroom and meeting rooms to the Artsgarden, Circle Centre Mall and the Indiana Convention Center. Our 23-story tower boasts 241 guest rooms, 15,000 square feet of state-of-the-art meeting space, a rejuvenating wellness center with a state-of-the-art fitness centre and pool, and two entrancing restaurants. Fine dining options at our luxury hotel in Indianapolis include The Capital Grille, with outstanding culinary delights served in an intimate dining experience, and Tastings, a wine bar experience that uses progressive wine technology for guests to enjoy wines by the taste, glass or bottle.

about_text: Urban style meets stunning natural beauty at the Crowne Plaza® Jacksonville Airport hotel. Our guests enjoy the newly renovated lobby, restaurant, and bar, along with the advantages of a free airport shuttle and a prime location near the JAXPORT cruise terminal and other popular local attractions. Smart business travelers absolutely love the convenient location of our upscale hotel near Jacksonville Airport. With 10,000 sq. ft. of event space and dedicated Crowne Meetings Directors, we are the perfect place to hold your next conference, convention or banquet. We also offer free Wi-Fi access and an internet cafe, so you can stay productive during your entire visit. A trip to Jacksonville isn't complete without a day at the beach. We're only a short drive from historic Fernandina Beach and Amelia Island. Learn how beers are brewed at Anheuser-Busch Brewery, or visit the penguins at Jacksonville Zoo. River City Marketplace, featuring shopping and dining options to please all tastes, is just across the street. Outstanding guest service, a seamless blend of style and comfort, and terrific amenities are why we're the premier choice among hotels near Jacksonville airport. Enjoy a variety of features, including the heated outdoor pool and fitness center. We look forward to exceeding your expectations! The hotel is 100% smoke free.

about_text: Set in the city's circa-1929 fire department headquarters, this sleek, fashionable hotel in Downtown is 4 miles from the Detroit Institute of Arts and 5 miles from Belle Isle Park, a 982-acre island park. Chic, classically furnished rooms are adorned with local artwork and modern lighting. All have 49-inch flat-screen TVs and free Wi-Fi, plus minibars and desks. Suites add sitting areas with pull-out sofas; 1 has a pool table, a private bar and a dining area. Room service is offered. There's a swanky New American restaurant offering an industrial-chic bar and chef's table dining experiences. Conference rooms are available.

about_text: The Westin Book Cadillac Detroit returns legendary style and glamour to Detroit, Michigan hotels. The historic luxury hotel in downtown Detroit has been restored to its original splendor to reclaim its position as the city's premier hotel and social gathering destination. Take advantage of our hotel's downtown location to explore Campus Martius Park, the scenic Riverwalk promenade and The Henry Ford Museum. Recharge with an invigorating workout at the WestinWORKOUT® Fitness Studio or take a swim in the indoor pool. Memorable dining includes a cosmopolitan steakhouse and the only Starbucks® Reserve Store in downtown Detroit.

about_text: Our historic 1930s Art Deco digs, just a ten-minute stroll to UW’s campus, sits proudly in Seattle’s University District. Purple pride runs deep in the lush lobby, inviting Huskies past and present. Over 36 feet of plaidly clad sofas ease up to a communal coffee table warmly perched fireside. An installation of seashell mobiles dances above, an amped up wall invites conversation and jewel toned rooms wink at our storied past. High above, our scenic rooftop bar serves up hues and mountain views of the inspired landscape.

about_text: Check into one of 264 rooms filled with personality and style. Look out through floor-to-ceiling windows that showcase a vibrant Denver cityscape, then settle into a room or suite with well-appointed amenities. Relax in a standard room with a walk-in shower and work area, or opt for a high-floor space for more dramatic views. After you’ve unpacked, head out to see local landmarks like the Denver Art Museum, located less than a mile from your doorstep. At Hyatt Centric Downtown Denver, you’re walking distance to entertainment, fine dining, shopping, celebrated parks, and so much more.

about_text:
The Hilton Garden Inn Denver Downtown Convention Center is one of the best centrally located hotels that Denver offers. The Hilton Garden Inn is less than 100 steps from the front doors of the Colorado Convention Center, two blocks from the 16th Street Mall, and a five-minute walk from the Denver Pavilions. 

Cheer on your favorite sports team during your visit. We're just one mile away from Coors Field, two miles from Empower Field at Mile High, and one mile from Ball Arena. Denver Center for the Performing Arts is a 10-minute walk away. Major nearby corporations include CenturyLink, Wells Fargo, Deloitte, KPMG, Gates Corporation, VF Corp, Accenture, and Encana/Ovintiv, all less than 10 minutes away.  

This hotel features 221 beautiful guest rooms, each equipped with complimentary WiFi, mini-refrigerators, microwaves, and Keurig Coffee Makers. The hotel offers a workout facility, full-service restaurant, Territory Kitchen and Bar, along with Dazbog Coffee Shop onsite.

hotel_name: Hilton Garden Inn Boston Logan Airport
about_text: The Hilton Garden Inn Boston Logan Airport (BOS) is conveniently located 1 mile from Logan Airport, just minutes from downtown Boston.  Free 24 hour Airport Shuttle service to airport and Subway/Train Station and daily parking for a fee during your stay. Our tastefully-appointed hotel features modern conveniences suited to the savvy business traveler, along with a great location and amenities to please leisure guests.  Spacious new guestrooms boast a long list of guest amenities including Keurig Coffee Makers, generous work surfaces and all rooms are complete with microwaves and refrigerators and Complimentary high-speed internet access.   For your convenience, wireless HSIA is available in public areas throughout the hotel.  Our guests have full use of our amenities including: indoor heated pool, well-equipped Fitness Center and Hotel features the Garden Grille & Bar on-site as well as many restaurants and retails shops nearby.

hotel_name: The Nines, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Portland
about_text: The Nines Portland is a truly magnificent and luxurious hotel in downtown Portland. Historic in nature, yet contemporary in everything else. The hotel is situated amongst picturesque surroundings in the historical Meier & Frank Building. Enjoy modern, and eclectic comfort amidst foxily fashioned hotel suites and rooms. Luxuriate with contemporary amenities, crystal lighting, alabaster colored satin drapes, and leather headboards. Close by are boutiques, trendy dining options, and local attractions accessible by foot, or by Portland's green-friendly Light Rails and Street Cars. Explore the exotic Japanese Gardens, museums, and posh neighborhoods in the city. Stimulate your senses with unique artisanal cuisine, while enjoying exhilarating views of a vibrant downtown landscape. Experience some of the top restaurant's in Portland with the Urban Farmer Steakhouse and the Asian-inspired Departure Restaurant + Lounge. For special occasions, events, or corporate parties, The Nines creates a memorable social experience.

about_text: Want to get to know the real Portland? The keeping weird, coffee-drinking, food-loving, creative, always-outdoors, never normal Portland? We're Hotel Lucia, and we know Portland. Because we are Portland. Centrally located in the heart of downtown close to dining, shopping, entertainment, public transit, and more, Hotel Lucia is the perfect starting point for your Portland adventures. Why? From our hotel artwork to the experts at our 24-hr front desk and concierge service, everything about us is local. We’ve been helping people discover and fall in love with this city since before Portland was trendy, and we’ll keep on doing it for everyone from leisure travelers to business travelers and everyone in between. Some of Portland’s best landmarks and local attractions, dining, and restaurants can be found just steps from Hotel Lucia. Browse books at the world-famous Powell’s City of Books or shop famous brands from Nike to Louis Vuitton in and around the Pioneer Square Mall. Stop in for a cup of Portland-roasted joe at Never Coffee, dine at the world's first certified sustainable sushi restaurant Bamboo Sushi, or try craft cocktails (a Portland specialty) at Fortune. The nearby Pioneer Square and Courthouse is the perfect starting point to discovering Portland; known as the city’s living room, it’s here that Portlanders come to hang out, have fun, and enjoy the feel of the city. From there, TriMet buses and MAX Light Rail lines can connect you to the rest of Portland, from the hip Pearl District to Chinatown to Forest Park. Then, after long days exploring, we’ve got everything you need to rest, recover, and get ready for the next day. Our boutique rooms come with fine modern amenities including a flat screen TV, air conditioning, free Wi-Fi, and a minibar. Want to get in a workout? Head to our top-line fitness center. Need a place to park your car? Enjoy convenient paid public parking on-site or use our valet service. 24-hour room service is also available from Cheryl’s restaurant. So come and stay with us. We know Portland and we’re here to help you discover her.

hotel_name: The Porter Portland, Curio Collection By Hilton
about_text:
Welcome to The Porter Portland, Curio Collection by Hilton, perfectly located in one of America's most walkable cities. Rising 16 stories above the thriving Fountain District, our Portland hotel is steps from premier shops, popular restaurants and Keller Auditorium and just 2 blocks from Tom McCall Waterfront Park. OHSU Hospital and Legacy Good Samaritan are conveniently close. The MAX Light Rail station is a quick stroll for any travels to Greater Portland.

Guest rooms are stunning, rustic and modern with complimentary WiFi, a 55-inch TV, mini-fridge, a coffeemaker with local teas and coffees, and cozy extras like plush robes and slippers. Upgrade for floor-to-ceiling windows and views of the Willamette River and Cascade Mountains, or book a suite with a separate living area, dining table and wet bar for entertaining.

Hotel restaurants blend indulgence with Portland's love for the outdoors.

about_text:
Experience Unparalleled Comfort and Convenience at the DoubleTree hotel Portland
Welcome to the DoubleTree hotel Portland, your gateway to an exceptional stay in the vibrant Portland Metro area. Our hotel isn't only one of the largest within walking distance to the Oregon Convention Center, the Moda Center, and Portland Memorial Coliseum, but it also offers an array of amenities and a prime location that ensures an unforgettable visit.

Perfectly Situated for Business and Leisure
Our central location means you're just steps away from world-class entertainment, tax-free shopping at specialty boutiques and national brand stores, and of course Portland's renowned culinary scene with its endless dining options. 

Convenient Parking
At the DoubleTree hotel Portland, we understand the value of convenience. We offer on-site covered parking in our garage, which is a rare find in downtown Portland.

address: 800 W Juneau Ave Enter at 8th Street and Juneau Avenue intersection, Milwaukee, WI 53233-1448
about_text: This upscale contemporary hotel is located in the newly revitalized Brewery Area, across from the Fiserv Forum, the new home of Milwaukee Bucks basketball. The hotel is also walking distance to Pilot Project Brewing and Pabst Taproom, and a 10 minute walk to the Milwaukee Riverwalk and over 25 restaurants. Baird Center, Marquette University, UW-Milwaukee and Summerfest are all nearby as well the Public Museum, Milwaukee Art Museum, Harley Davidson Museum, Milwaukee Public Market and American Family Field. Bright, comfortable rooms come with free WiFi, 49" HDTVs and living areas with sofa beds, as well as coffeemakers and mini-fridges. The hotel also features a Coffee to Cocktails Bar, 24-hour Gallery Market, spacious 24 hour fitness room, 24 hour business center, and modern meeting and event spaces. A daily hot breakfast buffet is available. Valet parking is available onsite, or there is a self-park garage 1 block west of the hotel.

hotel_name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Milwaukee Downtown
about_text: The DoubleTree by Hilton is perfectly located in the heart of Downtown Milwaukee and is an ideal destination for those visiting Brew City. The Baird Convention Center is adjacent to the hotel while the Milwaukee Public Museum and Fiserv Forum are steps away. Within a few blocks, you will find the Marquette University campus, the Summerfest grounds, and the entertainment district. Local businesses include Harley-Davidson, Molson Coors, Manpower, Rockwell Automation, Johnson Controls, Northwestern Mutual, and Milwaukee Tool. Enjoy valet parking, a warm DoubleTree cookie upon check-in, Hilton Honors benefits, free WiFi, and a microwave and refrigerator in each of the contemporary guest rooms. An onsite restaurant, The Avenue Bar and Grill, offers traditional Wisconsin fare for breakfast, lunch, and dinner each day as well as full-service, seasonal sundeck patio. The award-winning team looks forward to welcoming you to the legendary city of Milwaukee.

hotel_name: El Conquistador Tucson, A Hilton Resort
about_text: The Hilton Tucson El Conquistador Golf & Tennis Resort is located on 500 acres of high Sonoran Desert terrain in the foothills of the Santa Catalina Mountains, our full-service Tucson, Arizona hotel offers a beautiful destination setting in the heart of Arizona. The hotel houses three nearby championship golf courses, or play a tennis match into the evening on one of 31 floodlit tennis courts. Unwind in your choice of four swimming pools with a waterslide, children's pool, sauna, and hot and cold jetted tubs. Enjoy the southwestern sun on the pool deck and cool down with a tropical drink from Desert Springs Café poolside bar. Relax with a spa treatment or massage at Elements Spa in the Hilton Tucson El Conquistador Golf & Tennis Resort. Re-energize in the fully equipped 24-hour fitness room with modern equipment.  Feel at home with a separate bedroom and living area. Start the day with a delicious breakfast at the Sundance Cafe.

hotel_name: DoubleTree by Hilton Fresno Convention Center
about_text:
Feel welcome the moment you check-in to DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Fresno Convention Center with a warm chocolate chip cookie on arrival. The largest full-service hotel in California's Central Valley, we are just across the street from the Fresno Convention and Entertainment Center. Enjoy easy connectivity to Highway 41, Highway 99, California State University and Fresno Yosemite International Airport - only 10 minutes' drive away. Discover many retail, dining and entertainment opportunities nearby, and visit Kings Canyon National Park, Sequoia National Park or Yosemite National Park; all within driving distance of our friendly hotel in Fresno, California.

Feel at home in a stylish guest room, equipped with complimentary WiFi, an iPod Dock Alarm Clock, a 37-inch flat-screen HDTV and a Serta Suite Dreams bed. Upgrade to a suite for more space and amenities - ideal for families and extended-stays in Fresno, CA.

about_text: The Tony Hotel South Beach was originally designed and built in 1939 by L. Murray Dixon, a master architect responsible for many of the Art Deco buildings that line Collins Avenue and Ocean Drive. Dixon’s signature style, embodied in this hotel, included streamlined curves, jutting towers, window “eyebrows,” and neon. Originally named The Tiffany (and subsequently renamed The Hotel of South Beach), the hotel’s rooftop “Tiffany” spire is an historic landmark, towering majestically over Collins Avenue for more than 80 years. In 1985, legendary placemaker Tony Goldman visited South Beach for the first time and fell in love. He saw past the blight and dilapidated buildings that plagued South Beach at the time and envisioned the American Riviera. He spent the next 27 years of his life leading the renaissance of South Beach, fighting to preserve its history while also envisioning its future as a pedestrian destination where people from all walks of life could enjoy its natural beauty in an inclusive community. Tony Goldman bought and methodically restored the hotel, among other properties, and in 1998 enlisted fashion designer Todd Oldham to infuse the hotel with the rich colors, shapes, and textures emblematic of the Art Deco era. The renaming of the hotel as The Tony Hotel South Beach in 2022, on the tenth anniversary of his passing, was a fitting tribute to Tony Goldman by his family, who still own and operate the hotel to this day.

about_text: Visit the Pestana South Beach, an Art Deco Boutique Hotel in Miami, made up of 4 buildings with white and blue façades in the middle of Miami Beach. It is just 5 minutes from the waters of South Beach and only 9 minutes on foot from Lincoln Road, a truly open-air shopping centre. Here, you can immerse yourself in the most sophisticated side of architecture, culture and urban events, along with typical American beach culture. Close by, you can visit the Miami Beach Convention Center and the Miami Beach Golf Club. The Pestana Miami South Beach offers a courtyard where you will find a heated outdoor swimming pool, a Bistro and a Bar. It offers a car park for a fee, a business centre, beach service, concierge and bike rental services so that you can get to know the city. Rooms include free internet and cable TV.

about_text: Situated on Belle Isle in Biscayne Bay, The Standard Spa, Miami Beach is an indoor and outdoor hydrotherapy playground that fosters stress-free socializing in a tropical, contemporary setting. With a minimalist design, the holistic hydrotherapy spa hotel provides a stylish yet intimate ambience just blocks from the glitz of South Beach. Winner of Conde Nast Traveler's Readers' Favorite Spa Hotel, it also features a garden, DIY-based scrubs, plunges, open-air mud baths, and stunning amenities that include a Hammam, Steam Room, Sauna, Ice Room, Infinity Pool, Roman Waterfall Hot Tub, and Arctic Plunge. The modest guest capacity complements the hotel's communal setting.

about_text: Welcome to your new living room on the beach. With stunning waterfront views, Mondrian South Beach is located just minutes away from the heart of Miami Beach. Mondrian’s hub of activity is our new bay front destination, Baia Beach Club. Baia embodies a Mediterranean coastal flair and brings the effortless sophistication of international coastal living to Miami. Baia Beach Club features multiple areas for indoor and outdoor dining/entertaining throughout, our bayside pool with cabanas, a marina with available boat dockage, a full service wellness spa, a state-of-the-art fitness center, curated programming, an exclusive membership program, and more. Whether enjoying a weekend getaway, a special event or a company meeting, Mondrian South Beach offers a lush tropical centerpiece for you to enjoy every moment. Take off your shoes and get comfortable.

about_text: Welcome to the brand new Hampton Inn Oakland Downtown-City Center, located in the heart of Oakland's vibrant and hip downtown on 11th Street and Franklin, 10 minutes via train to Downtown San Francisco. Steps away from the Oakland City Center business district and one block from the Oakland Convention Center, our hotel puts you right in the middle of the action. Oakland's world class dining scene is on your doorstep, only a 10-minute walk to Uptown or Jack London Square. We are adjacent to the Oakland City Center BART station, providing access to Downtown San Francisco, the San Francisco Embarcadero and Moscone Center. Berkeley and Emeryville are within easy reach. Oakland and San Francisco International Airport are within a 30-minute drive. Enjoy signature amenities such as free hot breakfast and free WiFi, available throughout the hotel. Relax in a modern guest room, furnished with a clean and fresh Hampton bed® and ergonomically designed work area.

about_text: Kissel Uptown Oakland is the newest luxury hotel located in the heart of Oakland’s vibrant and eclectic arts and entertainment district. Embodying the spirit of the city and drawing inspiration from its history, the hotel seamlessly blends art deco elements and the industrial character of the old auto row with contemporary design and luxurious modern amenities. Featuring 168 guest rooms and suites, the seven-story hotel serves as a relaxing destination for locals and out-of-town guests alike. Located just minutes from the Fox Theater, Paramount Theater, Lake Merritt, Jack London Square and The Hive, a retail and entertainment complex featuring breweries, bakeries and shopping, it’s the perfect starting line for exploring all that Oakland has to offer. Among the hotel’s amenities are a state-of-the-art fitness center and three distinct food and beverage concepts that offer guests unique dining experiences in inspired settings. The hotel also boasts 9,000 sq. ft. of dynamic and flexible meeting and event spaces, including indoor and outdoor settings for groups. The hotel is also located just 10 miles from Oakland International Airport.

about_text:
Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Oakland, Hilton Oakland Airport is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its quiet environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, Hilton Oakland Airport makes it easy to enjoy the best of Oakland.
Guest rooms offer a flat screen TV, a refrigerator, and air conditioning, and Hilton Oakland makes getting online easy as wifi is available.
You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the hotel, including a 24 hour front desk, room service, and express check-in and check-out. In addition, guests can enjoy a pool and an on-site restaurant during their visit. As an added convenience, there is parking available to guests.
Close to some of Oakland's most popular landmarks, such as Oracle Arena (1.5 mi) and Oakland-Alameda County Coliseum (1.5 mi), Hilton Oakland is a great destination for tourists.
If you’re looking for a wine bar, consider a visit to Vino Volo, which is not far from Hilton Oakland Airport.
If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Martin Luther King Jr. Regional Shoreline (0.3 mi), which is a popular attraction amongst tourists, and it is within walking distance.
Whether you’re traveling for business, pleasure or both, Hilton Oakland Airport is sure to make your visit to Oakland one worth remembering.

about_text: Brand new Holiday Inn & Suites Oakland Airport is the Holiday Inn of the future! This newest Oakland Airport Hotel near San Francisco is just one mile from Oakland International Airport (OAK), and offers free shuttle to destinations within five miles of the hotel.In Oakland, you'll find a variety of attractions within close proximity of our hotel. We are one mile from the McAfee Coliseum-Home of the Oakland Raiders & Oakland Athletics, and Oracle Arena - Home of the Golden State Warriors, and just minutes away from Jack London Square and the Metropolitan Golf Course. Our hotel's location near San Francisco makes it easy to visit the 'City by the Bay.' Business travelers enjoy our close proximity to National Automotive, Unisys Corporation, Waste Management, FedEx, UPS, Rainin Instruments and other businesses in Oakland. Lodging in our hotel makes it easy to utilize the 24-hour business center as well as over 3,000 square feet of meeting space. With a heated, outdoor pool and a fitness center as well as an on-site convenience store and Diamonds Sports Bar & Grill, our guests receive excellent services from our new hotel in Oakland. All rooms feature triple-sheeted king beds, 32-inch flat panel TVs, microwaves, refrigerators and work spaces with two phones and free high-speed Internet access. For top-quality service in an ideal location, this is the place to stay.

hotel_name: Hampton Inn & Suites Minneapolis University Area
about_text:
Establish a home base near popular attractions at the Hampton Inn & Suites Minneapolis University Area hotel. Our hotel is across the street from the University of Minnesota - Twin Cities campus and hospitals. Walk to the nearby Prospect Park Station and catch the LRT for easy transport throughout the city. Whether you're in town for a game, alumni meeting or just passing through, our thoughtful amenities and clean, comfortable surroundings will help ensure a successful stay.
In our perfect mix lobby, you'll find a stunning water feature, fireplace and free hot breakfast daily.  If you're in a hurry, grab one of Hampton's On the Run™ Breakfast Bags, available Monday through Friday. Take a relaxing dip in our indoor heated pool or whirlpool, and get some exercise in our fitness center. Set up shop in our business center with access to computers, printing and copying capabilities. Our hotel features 750 sq. ft. of meeting space to accommodate your next Minneapolis event.

about_text: Connected by an indoor skyway to the world-renowned Cleveland Clinic, the InterContinental Cleveland delights with modern elegance and comfort. From a dedicated concierge team to 24-hour fitness center, our hotel has everything you need for a luxurious stay. hotel_name: Springhill Suites by Marriott Wichita East At Plazzio
about_text: Finding an ideal family-friendly hotel in Wichita does not have to be difficult. Welcome to SpringHill Suites Wichita East at Plazzio, a nice option for travelers like you. Springhill Suites Wichita East At Plazzio Hotel is a family-friendly hotel offering a flat screen TV and a kitchenette in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests. Plus, guests can enjoy a pool and free breakfast, which have made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Wichita. For guests with a vehicle, parking is available. Wichita has plenty of Italian restaurants. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like Olive Garden, Old Chicago Restaurant, and Il Vicino Wood Oven Pizza & Brewery, which are serving up some great dishes. If you’re looking for something to do, Chapin Dog Park, Harrison Park, and Meridian Dog Park are a nice way to spend some time. SpringHill Suites Wichita East at Plazzio puts the best of Wichita at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

address: 1600 E Randol Mill Rd, Arlington, TX 76011-6219
about_text: This stylish resort destination offers unparalleled access to Texas Rangers’ Globe Life Park, the Dallas Cowboys’ AT&T Stadium, the Esports Stadium Arlington & Expo Center, and more. Centrally located between Dallas and Fort Worth, and just 10 minutes from the DFW International Airport, the 14-story resort features 300 guest rooms and luxury suites, each outfitted with custom décor and floor-to-ceiling windows. The complex houses five chef-curated food & beverage outlets including a classic steakhouse, Cut & Bourbon; lobby lounge, Bar Bourbon; outdoor mixology bar, Arlington Clover Club; swim up bar and lounge, SOAK; and organic, grab-and-go market, River Market. Amenities include a Fitness Center complete with Peloton bikes and private poolside cabanas alongside an infinity pool with sweeping views.

about_text: Mixing contemporary culture with its European heritage, Le Meridien Tampa has transformed the one time Federal Courthouse into an inspiring 130-room boutique hotel. The hotel features luxurious accommodations, meeting and event space, state-of-the-art fitness center and the engaging Hub - a redefined version of the traditional hotel lobby. Take in the New American flavors at Bizou, our bistro and bar, or indulge in a hand-crafted cocktail at Longitude Bar. Enjoy the convenience of our proximity to Ybor City, Channelside and other Tampa attractions. At Le Meridien Tampa, the possibilities are endless.

about_text:
Step into the inviting ambiance of the DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Denver-Aurora and receive our signature freshly baked chocolate chip cookie as our welcome gift to you. Conveniently located between Denver's major highway systems of I-25 and I-70, the hotel is just twenty minutes from Denver International Airport and ten minutes from the Denver Tech Center. Take our complimentary shuttle to and from the airport.

Make yourself comfortable in a contemporary guest room with high-speed internet access, a well-lit, over-sized work desk, LCD TV with HD channels, and complimentary newspapers Monday-Friday. Choose a deluxe room for the added convenience of a larger room with a refrigerator and microwave.

The Doubletree by Hilton Denver Aurora offers 14,000 sq. ft. of versatile event space including ballrooms, boardrooms and a 100-seat amphitheater. Depend on the expertise of our friendly staff to customize the event to your needs.

about_text: Fairfield Inn & Suites Denver Aurora/Parker is minutes from Buckley Air Force Base, Denver Tech Center, Parker Adventist Hospital, Aurora Soccer Sports Fields, Aurora Reservoir, Aurora County Fairgrounds as well as Mile High Racing & Entertainment, If you haven't visited an outdoor lifestyle center mall yet, you're in for a great time! The Southlands Mall begins at our front doors and stretches another full mile with streets, stores and plenty of parking. The beauty of our Mall is convenience: drive up and park by the store where you want to shop! With both indoor/outdoor spaces to enjoy, you'll find the entire pleasures the mall offers: fashion, dining and entertainment. We offer five room styles, all smoke-free with a refrigerator, microwave and free wired and wireless high speed Internet access. Whether you're looking for a basic hotel room or one of our sweet suite options, you'll always have a clean and fresh room at Fairfield Inn & Suites Denver Aurora/Parker.

hotel_name: Marriott Riverside at the Convention Center
about_text: Discover home on the California trail at the full service Marriott Riverside hotel located in the heart of historic downtown Riverside nestled in the Inland Empire. The hotel is located adjacent to the newly renovated Riverside Convention Center, and 15 miles from Ontario International Airport. The hotel features 292 luxurious accommodations including 25 spacious suites ideal for the business and leisure travelers. The hotel is within walking distance to the Fox Performing Arts Center, the historic Mission Inn, the Riverside Pedestrian Main Street Mall, and 2 miles from the University of California Riverside. The hotel is also a mile from the Riverside County Superior Courthouse, major corporations, and 10 miles from March Air Force Reserve Base. The hotel offers a business center, a dedicated Concierge lounge with breakfast & evening Hors d'oeuvres, and 14,000 sq. feet of meeting space with 2 ballrooms. The hotel is just minutes from Mt. Rubidoux and 30 minutes to the Temecula wineries.

about_text: It doesn’t matter if you stay with us once a year or once a month—at the Cambria Hotel Pittsburgh - Downtown, you‘re always a VIP. The vibe here is upscale but never uptight - and our modern, stylish rooms make you feel like you’ve been upgraded. We feel pretty strongly that we have an experience just for you—and maybe even a surprise or two along the way. What’s different about Cambria Hotel Pittsburgh - Downtown? Just about everything! Our hotel provides you with personalized service, all the amenities you need, and a dash of fun to make every trip enjoyable. There’s an option for everyone at our Social Circle™ bistro, perfect for a simple-yet-interesting bite. And with service that’s always attentive and never stuffy, you’ll get the extra-special treatment you deserve, every time you stay. • Modern, spacious, stylish suites • Full bar and onsite bistro dining at Social Circle • Workouts on-the-go at our Custom Fit fitness center • Convenient onsite gift & sundry shop • Attached parking deck with easy access to events at the CONSOL Energy Center • Free high-speed internet—accessible everywhere.

about_text: Located in the heart of downtown Pittsburgh, PA, Omni William Penn Hotel is a sophisticated, historic retreat that is the home of the Pittsburgh Steelers. The hotel is near Union Station train station (0.4 miles), PNC Park (1 mile), Heinz Field (1.4 miles), and University of Pittsburgh (2.9 miles). Since opening its doors in 1916, our Pennsylvania hotel has played a starring role in the city of Pittsburgh, hosting movie stars, politicians, heads of state and leaders of business. At Omni William Penn Hotel, you will experience outstanding service, comfortable and spacious accommodations, event venues and award-winning cuisine. Hotel Details: Features include an elegant restaurant, vibrant tea room, and luxurious two-tier Grand Ballroom. There are also two bars, a coffee shop, and deli plus expansive conference facilities. Plush rooms and suites include perks like city views, kitchenettes, and flat-screen TVs.

about_text: Immerse into the awe-inspiring beauty of Alaska by staying at Sheraton Anchorage Hotel, located in the heart of downtown Anchorage. After a restful night's sleep on our signature beds, wake to spectacular city, Cook Inlet or Chugach Mountain views. Our rooms and suites seamlessly blend intuitive designs with unparalleled comfort and convenience. Stay in touch with high-speed Wi-Fi access, or relax watching your 42" flat-screen TV. Take advantage of our hotel's enviable location. Walk to your conference at Egan Convention Center, or stroll to the Anchorage Museum, both only a 10-minute walk away. After a day of sightseeing or business, enjoy breakfast and fresh seafood at JADE Restaurant, Ptarmigan Lounge, or visit our 24-hour fitness center. With over 25,000 square feet of event space and an ideal downtown location, our hotel is also the perfect backdrop for weddings and corporate events in Alaska.

about_text:
The Hampton Inn Toledo-South/Maumee hotel is located in Maumee, Ohio, next to Arrowhead Business Park, on the southwest side of Toledo. Our hotel is accessible from Ohio Interstates I-80/90 at exit 59 and exit 6 off US 23/I-475. Area attractions near our hotel include Imagination Station, Lucas County Recreation Ctr., Fort Meigs, Toledo Museum of Art, Stranahan Theater Complex, Toledo Botanical Gardens, Maumee Theater, Toledo Zoo, University of Toledo, Medical University of Ohio, Bowling Green State University, golf courses, and shopping areas. 

The Hampton Inn Toledo-South/Maumee hotel is a four-story interior corridor property, featuring 125 rooms, a fitness center and indoor pool and whirlpool. Complimentary amenities of our hotel include hot breakfast, served daily, wireless Internet access and fee local calls. Free hot breakfast menu features hot waffles, three hot breakfast items and other numerous cold items.

hotel_name: NYLO Dallas Plano Hotel Tapestry Collection by Hilton
about_text:
NYLO Dallas Plano offers corporate travel with style. Find this boutique hotel in the center of Legacy's business district.

Features:
-Free WiFi
-Pet-friendly rooms and suites
-24-hour fitness center
-Outdoor heated pool
-Free five-mile shuttle
-Twenty minutes from DFW airport

Each guest room offers loft-style decor, custom NYLO beds and bedding, a Keurig coffee maker, and rainfall shower.

LOCL Restaurant & Bar provides a lively on-site hangout with breakfast and dinner service as well as late bar service.

Host weddings, events, and meetings for up to 300 guests in our contemporary indoor and outdoor venues.

Local attractions include Toyota Stadium, Shops at Legacy, and The Star in Frisco sports and entertainment district. See it all with the free five-mile shuttle - available Monday through Friday.

hotel_name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Henderson, an IHG Hotel
about_text: Try your luck at our modern hotel near the Las Vegas strip Don't miss a beat when staying at the Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites in Henderson, NV. We are located just eight miles from McCarran International Airport (LAS) and 15 minutes from the Las Vegas Strip! Explore the Hoover Dam, browse Galleria Mall or try your luck at Sunset Station Casino. Other great sites, including the Sam Boyd Stadium, Lake Mead, and the District at Green Valley Ranch are a short drive from our hotel's convenient Henderson, Nevada address. Are you in town for the annual NASCAR, SEMA, or CES events? Our easy access to I-515 places you a short drive to some of Las Vegas' biggest events. When you stay with us, you will find yourself only minutes from University of Nevada - Las Vegas (UNLV), 360 Communications and St. Rose de Lima Hospital. In addition to a great location, we also feature a lot of quality perks.

about_text:
The Hampton Inn Lincoln - South/Heritage Park hotel of Lincoln, Nebraska is located in southeast Lincoln near 56th and Nebraska Highway 2. A Hilton Family hotel, this Hampton Inn hotel is minutes from Lincoln's Attractions and Convention venues. Downtown Lincoln, Nebraska and the Historic Haymarket District, the NE Heart Hospital, University of Nebraska Memorial Stadium - home of the Nebraska Cornhuskers, the Nebraska State Capitol, the Nebraska Governor's Mansion, the Bob Devaney Sports Center, the Nebraska State Fairgrounds, Pershing Center, the Lincoln Children's Museum, the Sheldon Memorial Art Gallery & Sculpture Garden, Folsom Children's Zoo and the Lincoln Municipal Airport are only a short drive away from our Lincoln, Nebraska Hampton Inn hotel.

Our location provides easy access to Union College, NE Wesleyan University and the University of Nebraska-UNL.

about_text: Hyatt Regency Orlando is an iconic, award-winning hotel located in the heart of everything that Orlando has to offer -- theme parks, shopping, dining, nightlife and more! Soak up the Florida sunshine at two pools featuring a water slide, waterfall, splash pad, separate kiddie pool area and cabanas available for rent. Get comfortable in one of our 1,641 recently restyled rooms outfitted with Hyatt Euro Pillow Top beds, complimentary Wi-Fi, and other modern amenities. Choose from five full-service dining outlets, including two bars, an Italian steakhouse, comfort food diner, 24-hour grab & go Market and in-room dining. Recharge with a full-service spa & salon and 24-hour StayFit Gym. We are minutes from Universal Orlando(R), Walt Disney World(R) and SeaWorld(R). Our customer service-driven team awaits your arrival.

about_text: Already one of the nation's most impressive hotels, Orlando World Center Marriott features the ultimate in comfort and style, just minutes from the city's hottest attractions, entertainment and dining options including everything at Walt Disney World. And now, with refreshed suites, an all-new pool area, three water slides, a re-concepted on-site restaurant and more, our Lake Buena Vista resort world gets better every day. Splash into fun at River Falls Waterpark delighting guests of all ages with a combined outdoor water oasis featuring an iconic slide tower and a 575-foot-long lazy river winding through a tropical paradise at our hotel in Orlando. Recently completed renovations at our resort in Orlando, Florida include new Suites. In your accommodations, surround yourself with the comfort of island-like tranquility whether resting up after your event or catching up on some work. Starbucks(R) has been redesigned and expanded to resemble those found on neighborhood street corners across the country and features additional seating for networking. The Falls Pool offers a refreshing new pool experience featuring an expanded pool deck and function lawn for poolside events.

about_text:
Welcome to the award winning Hilton Phoenix Chandler, located in the heart of the Phoenix high-tech district, near businesses including Intel, Microchip, and Freescale. Escape the ordinary with exceptional amenities and award-winning services, and benefit from the convenient access to Phoenix Sky Harbor, Tempe, and Mesa. Only one block away is the popular Chandler Fashion Center with numerous shops, restaurants, movies, and special events. Historic Downtown Chandler is also close by, offering eclectic dining, shopping, and galleries.

Discover comfort and convenience in one of 197 guest rooms, each outfitted with Hilton Serenity Beds, flat screen televisions with premium channels, large work desks, high-speed internet access and voicemail. For upgraded features, select a premium hotel room with a walk-out balcony. 

The year-round outdoor pool and patio at this Hilton hotel in Chandler, AZ provides a fantastic oasis to relax in the Arizona sun.

address: 1 N San Marcos Pl, Chandler, AZ 85225
about_text: Our business hotel and resort in downtown Chandler, AZ, is a perfect spot to balance work and play. Crowne Plaza® Phoenix - Chandler Golf Resort features well-appointed rooms, free Wi-Fi, a sparkling outdoor pool with a jacuzzi, and elegant meeting spaces and various amenities.​​Walk to downtown Chandler, a vibrant community with microbreweries, diverse local restaurants, shops, and live music. Visit Chandler Center for the Arts before teeing off at the adjacent, 18-hole championship golf course - San Marcos Golf Course. Business travelers will be near the Phoenix Convention Center and companies like Bank of America and Intel.​Whether you're in town for business or leisure, our pet-friendly resort is the ideal place to relax and recharge.​

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Phoenix - Chandler
about_text: Discover a home away from home at Homewood Suites by Hilton® Phoenix/Chandler hotel. Stay a while in a spacious suite and enjoy the freedom to continue your daily routines with a large, separate living area, fully equipped kitchen and two flat screen TVs. Start your day with a boost and savor a complimentary full hot breakfast or enjoy complimentary evening dinner and drinks*, Monday through Thursday. Keep active in this Chandler hotel’s fitness center, pool and basketball court situated just steps from the hotel. Enjoy a carefree stay with pet friendly accommodations and an onsite convenience store. Stay connected with complimentary high-speed internet access available throughout the hotel and stay in touch with work or home in the business center. Host a meeting for up to 12 people in the professional boardroom and relax while our dedicated events team takes care of the details.

hotel_name: Holiday Inn Phoenix - Chandler, an IHG Hotel
about_text:
This Neighborhood Hotel's Amenities Go Beyond Other Chandler, AZ Hotels

Your home away from home, Holiday Inn® Phoenix Chandler, is located next to the Ocotillo Golf Club with views of rolling fairways in the heart of Chandler. With our level of service & easy access to shopping, dining, Price Corridor, Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport (PHX), Arizona State University (ASU) and world-class golf facilities you won't want to stay anywhere else.

Business or Pleasure, we've got you covered. Amenities include onsite Restaurant, outdoor heated pool & hot tub, free WIFI, 24 hour fitness center, business center and local transportation.  Within a 5-mile radius you will find local offices for Intel, Wells Fargo, OnTrac, Northrop Grumman, PayPal, ASML and Chandler Fashion Center. Hotel is also within 20 minutes of Cactus League Spring training facilities; Tempe Diablo Stadium, Sloan Park & Hokoham Stadium as well as Gila River Casino and Fire-bird International Raceway.

about_text: Surround yourself in our downtown accommodations seamlessly combined with traditional charm at Norfolk Waterside Marriott, a downtown Norfolk hotel set in the heart of the historic district. Located on the picturesque Elizabeth River waterfront, our Norfolk, Virginia hotel combines stunning river views with marble accents, classic wood styling and eclectic artwork. From its convenient connection to the Waterside Convention Center to the nearby Nauticus, Norfolk Naval Station or the Virginia Zoo, our location is ideal for business or leisure guests. Stay active at our premier Norfolk, VA hotel fitness center complete with personal TVs, or relax after sightseeing at Capo Capo, serving renowned cuisine within this hotel in Norfolk, VA. Plan outdoor gatherings on our sixth-floor Riverview Terrace or execute grand galas in over 68,000 sq ft of premier Norfolk event space. For unrivaled lodging on the vibrant waterfront, look no further than Norfolk Waterside Marriott.

hotel_name: Madison Concourse Hotel and Governor's Club
about_text: Welcome to Madison’s hotel. We offer our guests a special Madison experience through our distinctive customer focus, modern Madison-inspired decor and perfect location in the heart of beautiful, vibrant downtown. Stay here and you'll find yourself steps from dozens of restaurants, museums, shops, craft beer bars, cocktail lounges and live music venues, as well as bicycle and kayak rentals to travel Madison's bike paths and local lakes, multiple yoga studios and the nation's largest producer-only farmers' market. While you're within our walls, enjoy local flavors at CIRC, our lobby restaurant, take a dip in our 3rd floor pool, use our state-of-the-art fitness center, or grab a cocktail in our Bar. Book a room in our Governor's Club level and enjoy complimentary cocktails, hors d'oeuvres, and desserts in our exclusive 12th floor lounge overlooking Madison's stunning State Capitol building. Come find familiar, experience new, and explore our beautiful city!

hotel_name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Phoenix Glendale-Westgate
about_text: Make yourself at home in our all-suite, pet-friendly hotel. Located just steps away from Westgate Entertainment district, State Farm Stadium and Tanger Outlet Mall, it is the ideal location whether you are traveling for business or pleasure. Convenient location to Camelback Mountain where you can enjoy hiking and the beautiful outdoor terrain. For our sports enthusiasts, we provide easy access to catch Spring Training with the San Diego Padres & Seattle Mariners, Fear Farm Sports & Entertainment Complex, American Sports Center, Gila River Arena and NASCAR Track. Hit the links at Grand Canyon University Championship Golf Course or Wigwam Golf Club, or enjoy hot air balloon rides, Dave & Busters or Top Golf. Enjoy downtime with a workout in our fitness center, a swim in our outdoor pool or by having an evening nightcap by the fire on our cozy outdoor terrace. Our location is sure to please!

hotel_name: Staybridge Suites Phoenix - Glendale Sports Dist, an IHG Hotel
about_text: The Staybridge Suites welcomes guests for an exceptional extended stay in the Glendale Entertainment District. Our beautiful newly renovated hotel is within walking distance of the Westgate Entertainment District, Tanger Outlet Mall, Desert Diamond Casino, Desert Diamond Arena & the State Farm Stadium. You can also enjoy easy access to downtown Phoenix and the Ak-Chin Pavilion. Guests at our pet-friendly Glendale, AZ hotel can experience area attractions. Sports lovers can watch the Arizona Cardinals, Phoenix Suns, or watch a NASCAR race. Business travelers appreciate our extended stay hotel which is near Luke Air Force Base, Lockheed Martin, Raytheon, and Banner Health. We have Over 900 sq. ft. of meeting space, free high-speed Internet access, and a 24-hour Business Center are available to meet your professional needs. We also offer complimentary laundry facilities, fully equipped kitchenettes, outdoor pool, local shuttle, and our Fitness Center.

about_text:
The Hampton Inn Glendale-Peoria hotel is 20 minutes northwest of downtown Phoenix in Peoria, Arizona next to the Peoria Sports Complex.  Conveniently located off the 101 Expressway and West Bell Road, we are across the street from the Arrowhead Shopping Mall. Area attractions include golf courses, Peoria Sports Complex, Water World Water Park, Victory Lanes Sports Complex, Lake Pleasant, Challenger Learning and Space Center, Sundome and the Glendale Arena home of the Phoenix Coyotes. The NFL Arizona Cardinals Stadium is under construction 6 miles to the south.  Within a 1 mile radius of our Glendale - Peoria Hampton Inn are over 50 restaurants including PF Changs, Buca di Bepo, the Fox and Hound, Palo Verde Pizza, Texas Roadhouse, Krispy Kreme, In and Out Burger, the Cheesecake Factory and Firebirds Grill.   

 The Hampton Inn Glendale-Peoria hotel features 112 rooms, some with whirlpools, a modern, Southwestern decor, gift shop, exercise gym, connecting rooms, cribs and outdoor pool.

It's all happening here---check in and check us out.

about_text: The Chesapeake Inn is a perfect retreat for a weekend getaway or a weekday retreat from the chaos of everyday life. We offer twelve beautifully renovated rooms, each with a unique mix of vintage and modern furnishings, a chandelier and a seating area for two in a style we call "coastal elegant" - pretty enough to make our guests feel special but laid-back enough to put your feet up! We are dedicated to true personalized service -- we truly want our guests to feel like the Inn is "their retreat by the river." We don't have an official check-in time and don't ever want our guests to have to wait. Instead, we do our best to make sure our guests' rooms are ready when they arrive! We don't charge extra fees: our rates include snacks and waters and the full use of our amenities (including our bikes, surreys and kayaks), and we welcome pets and families (again, no extra fees). Plus, we provide everything you might need for a weekend away including wireless internet service, 32" LCD televisions, luxury personal amenities, full size refrigerators, microwave ovens, and on site parking. Enjoy the delicious seafood at our wonderful restaurant onsite, the Half Shell Grill, play a game or relax in our lobby/living room or grab a bite at one of Urbanna's other restaurants (6 within a couple blocks of us). Use one of our complimentary kayaks to enjoy Urbanna Harbor, peruse the antiques stores and other shops, or take one of our pedal operated Surreys or bicycles for a joy ride around historic Port Town Urbanna. Nestled in the heart of town, you are only a short stroll to all of our little town's beauty! And the Chesapeake Inn is pet and family friendly, so bring your four-legged family members and kids along:) Come visit us to play, shop, and relax! If you are looking for a family reunion, a small wedding or a retreat, our Inn is the perfect size. In addition to our 12 rooms and lobby/living room, we offer a beautiful event space, the Rappahannock Room, a conference room and a garden.

about_text: Find the perfect blend of comfort and convenience at Tru by Hilton Gilbert, adjacent to San Tan Mall Dining and Retail district, only a stone's throw from Phoenix-Mesa Gateway Airport. With quick access to Loop 202 you can easily explore the family-friendly vibe and emerging nightlife of Downtown Gilbert and the greater Phoenix Area. Our efficient rooms include free WiFi, a large bathroom and large TVs with a premium channel lineup. Try our 'Build Your Own' breakfast bar with 30 sweet and savory toppings for cereal, bagels, oatmeal and more. Healthy, indulgent - your pick, all yum. You'll find drinks, gourmet snacks and single-serve beer and wine at our 24/7 market. Our lobby is zoned for work and play. Veg with a book, grab a board game or shoot some pool. Tea, coffee and hot chocolate are always fresh and free.

address: 223 Las Colinas Blvd W, Irving, TX 75039-5404
about_text: Business and leisure travelers will enjoy a rewarding Texas stay at Marriott Dallas Las Colinas. Our hotel is located on the Lake Carolyn waterfront, providing easy access to numerous area attractions. We are within walking distance of the Irving Convention Center at Las Colinas and the recently opened Toyota Music Factory, featuring a concert venue and popular restaurants. Retreat to comfort in our spacious rooms with luxury bedding, ergonomic workstations, and flat-panel TVs, and take advantage of room service for convenient in-room dining. Visit our hotel restaurant serving breakfast, lunch, and dinner to fuel-hungry travelers. During downtime, keep up with your exercise routine at our 24-hour fitness center and indoor pool. You can also host a small or large business or social function in one of our stylish event rooms, complemented by AV services and catering. You'll find everything you need for a successful stay at Marriott Dallas Las Colinas.

about_text: Explore the Sonoran desert landscape in the shadow of Mummy Mountain at Scottsdale Plaza. For nearly half a century, we’ve been a special slice of Scottsdale with over 40 acres of gardens winding through five pools, tennis courts, dining and day spa, all within moments of Old Town, mountain hikes and world-class golf courses. Stay in the center of it all from our hotel guest rooms, or take over a private casita. Our variety of accommodations are perfect for family vacations, conference retreats, desert weddings and last-minute getaways alike.

about_text: Experience traditional Southern elegance in a historic yet modern setting at Hampton Inn & Suites Birmingham-Downtown-Tutwiler. Nearby attractions include Birmingham Jefferson Convention Complex, Uptown Entertainment District, Alabama Theatre and Lyric Theatre, Birmingham Civil Rights Institute and Birmingham Museum of Art. Enjoy free breakfast daily and free WiFi.

about_text: The Embassy Suites Birmingham hotel is located just minutes from the Birmingham Shuttlesworth International Airport, downtown Birmingham, and many corporate office parks. The hotel is also near the Birmingham Zoo, Birmingham Botanical Gardens, Vulcan Park, and other local attractions. During your stay at this hotel in Birmingham AL, enjoy fully furnished two-room hotel suites featuring separate living and sleeping areas, a balcony, and included amenities such as two flat-screen televisions and WiFi availability. The Embassy Suites Birmingham hotel offers 5,100 sq. ft. of flexible meeting and event space, including a 4,704 sq. ft. ballroom for hosting a large conference or banquet for up to 320 guests. Exercise in the fitness center and stay fit with a swim in the hotel's indoor pool.  Savor a unique dining experience at Ruth's Chris Steak House, which serves a range of succulent steaks, lamb and seafood dishes, and enjoy a free cooked-to-order breakfast every morning.

address: 322 N Spokane Falls Ct, Spokane, WA 99201
about_text: Our pet-friendly riverside hotel is located on the Centennial Trail, a 3-minute walk from the 100-acre Riverfront Park and Spokane Falls. Take the Inland Northwest Ale Trail to more than 46 breweries. World-class wine tasting rooms like Barrister and Maryhill are less than 10 minutes away. Shopping and dining destinations at River Park Square are a short walk away, or wander over to Gonzaga to cheer on the Bulldogs. Attending a convention, sporting event or show? Our hotel is connected to the Spokane Convention Center and First Interstate Center for the Arts, and we are less than one mile away from the Spokane Arena and The Podium. Please note, we have suspended our hotel transport services. We recommend taxi, Lyft, or Uber from the airport (trip is approximately 15 minutes).

hotel_name: Holiday Inn Express Spokane-Downtown, an IHG Hotel
about_text: The Holiday Inn Express Downtown Spokane hotel is an excellent location for business and leisure travelers alike. Perched above the city with a 360 degree view, our hotel in Spokane is close to Spokane shopping, dining, and all that downtown Spokane has to offer. We are a stone s throw from the Spokane Convention Center, and serve as a home away from home for visiting Gonzaga University, EWU, WSU, and Whitworth University. Our Spokane Hotel is also a great place to stay when coming to Spokane to see a Broadway Show at the INB Performing Arts Center, Concerts at the Knitting Factory, Concerts at the Spokane Arena, Chiefs WHL Hockey and Spokane Shock Arena2 Football at Spokane Veteran s Memorial Arena. For the best service in any Spokane hotel, search no further than the Spokane Holiday Inn Express on the rock! We are 100% non-smoking, complete with exercise facility, business center with free printer use and Internet access, free high-speed wired Internet in every guest room, free deluxe Continental breakfast as well as cookies and milk every evening. Make your reservation now; your room awaits. All you have to do is come prepared to experience that which memories are made of at the Holiday Inn Express Downtown Spokane hotel.

about_text: Welcome to Hotel Murano, a boutique downtown Tacoma hotel located adjacent to the Tacoma Convention Center and steps from the city’s best museums and restaurants. Tacoma is the epicenter of the American glass art movement and, honoring that heritage, Hotel Murano pairs luxurious guestrooms and well-appointed event space with a museum worthy collection of glass art from around the globe. Hotel Murano is conveniently located in the heart of Tacoma attractions, including Chambers Bay, site of the 2015 US Open and just minutes from downtown Seattle. With a world-class art collection, delicious cuisine at Bite and craft cocktails at our Lobby Bar, and a full-service spa and salon, Hotel Murano is the perfect place to wake up inspired. As one of Tacoma’s finest pet friendly hotels, Hotel Murano invites guests and man’s best friend to take on Tacoma while enjoying our boutique accommodations, timeless service and modern style.

about_text: Conveniently located off Interstate 5 (exit 129), minutes from the Tacoma Dome, JBLM and the Tacoma Mall. The 132 room Hotel Thea Tacoma is the ideal place to stay with a 24-hour pool and hot tub. Getting around is easy on the Tacoma Link light rail that connects one end of downtown Tacoma to the other, between the Tacoma Dome, Museum District, Convention Center and Theater District. Children17 and under always stay free with an adult. Dogs* welcome with nominal fee. (Restrictions apply - First Floor Double Queen rooms ONLY - Call hotel for availability).

about_text: Experience a seamless blend of high-tech and high-touch amenities at Columbus Marriott. Originally constructed as a mid-nineteenth-century cotton mill, our downtown hotel is mere steps from the Coca-Cola Space Science Center, Springer Opera House and the Chattahoochee RiverWalk. Retire from adventure in our spacious rooms, showcasing complimentary Wi-Fi, pillowtop mattresses and room service. Upgrade to our concierge-level accommodations for exclusive access to our private lounge, as well as the additional amenities it provides. Worked up an appetite? Dine at our on-site restaurant, Houlihan's, for an array of delicious entrées. When you're not attending an event at the adjacent Columbus Georgia Convention and Trade Center, host a business function or social occasion in one of our five venues. Maximize your stay by visiting our outdoor pool and fitness center. Whatever the reason for your travels, allow Columbus Marriott to provide the professional service and luxurious amenities you deserve.

about_text: Conveniently located in the exclusive EastChase area, about eight miles east of downtown, our Montgomery hotel is the perfect home base from which to explore all the capital city has to offer, including: the Montgomery Museum of Fine Arts, the Alabama Shakespeare Festival, Montgomery Zoo, and EastChase Shopping Center. The Hampton Inn & Suites Montgomery EastChase hotel has a heated outdoor pool with shady trellis and relaxing music provides an area to relax and unwind after a day of business or pleasure. We also offer a putting green so your golf game doesn't suffer during your travels. Our free breakfast gets you going with hot and tasty daily features.

about_text:
Welcome to the DoubleTree

The Doubletree is located in downtown Montgomery on Madison Avenue is adjacent to RSA Building, City Hall, the State House, Riverfront Stadium, and just minutes from the State Capitol. We are convenient to Maxwell Air Force Base and right up the street from the newly renovated Cramton Bowl, only steps away from Montgomery Convention Center and to then new Montgomery Center for Performing Arts. We are in the center of Alabama history including Dexter Avenue King Memorial Baptist Church, Rosa Parks Library and Museum, Old Alabama Town, First White House of the Confederacy, Civil Rights Memorial and Center and so much more.

Our many amenities include, state of the art fitness center, full service restaurant and bar, guest laundry, and 10,000 square feet of meeting room space to accommodate 15 to 500 people. Our guest rooms feature bold designs with a warm wood finish allowing the room to be both calm and relaxing.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Aurora Naperville
about_text:
Quietly tucked in corporate park, yet easily accessible to commercial region, Homewood Suites by Hilton Aurora Naperville is a great base for business and leisure guests alike. We are just a five-minute walk from Route 59 train station, taking you to downtown Chicago, Naperville, and Aurora. Local restaurants, shopping and entertainment are also easily accessible. The hotel offers scenic jogging paths and has an outside patio overlooking a lake with a sports court, seating area, gazebo, and grills.

Our bright and airy studio, one and two bedrooms suites are equipped with all the comforts of home. Prepare your meals in the fully equipped kitchen with a full-sized refrigerator, microwave, two burner stove and dishwasher. Work at the desk and keep in touch with complimentary internet access. Unwind on a sofa bed and watch HDTV.

Start your morning right at our Aurora Naperville, IL hotel with complimentary full hot breakfast served daily.

hotel_name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Amarillo Downtown
about_text:
Daily Mandatory Charge includes: Texas Recovery Fee.

Welcome to Embassy Suites Amarillo Downtown, a sleek and stylish addition to the heart of the city. Our all-suite hotel is next to the Amarillo Civic Center and the Globe-News Center for the Performing Arts, and a quick walk to restaurants and government offices. Explore Texas Panhandle attractions like the American Quarter Horse Museum, Amarillo Botanical Gardens, Wonderland Amusement Park, Panhandle Plains Museum, Palo Duro Canyon, and Cadillac Ranch - all near our Amarillo hotel.

Feel at home in a studio or two-room suite with living space and a wet bar with fridge, microwave and Keurig® coffeemaker. Suites also have a sofa sleeper, workstation, 42-inch TV, and spacious bathroom with quartz vanity and frameless glass doors. Stay connected with WiFi, and lounge in comfort in the slippers and cozy bathrobe provided in every suite.

about_text: Located in Glendale, the 60’s retro Glendale Express Hotel is within 6 miles of the LA City core, while offering 10 minute access to the Burbank airport. Our guests love the hotel's quiet location and retro vibe. Easy freeway access and within minutes of Universal Studios. Large truck parking available. Join us for our retro Pop Tart breakfast along with coffee and hot tea. Grab & Go available. The area's natural beauty can be seen at Griffith Park and La Brea Tar Pits, while Greek Theatre and Norton Simon Museum are cultural highlights. Check out an event or a game at Rose Bowl Stadium, and consider making time for Los Angeles Zoo, a top attraction not to be missed.

about_text: At the Best Western Plus Glendale you're sure to find that little something extra. With our modern amenities and thoughtful design, the Best Western Plus Glendale will stand out among other hotels in Los Angeles,CA. For the business traveler, a spacious work desk and free internet access are included in all our guest rooms to ensure you don't miss a beat while you're away from the office. For extended stays, each room provides a convenient in-room mini fridge that is ideal for drinks and snacks. We also have an in-house fitness room, so you can keep up your workout routine while you're on the road. As always, the Best Western Plus Glendale will provide you with the superior customer service that you are used to at Best Western® Hotels & Resorts.

hotel_name: Hilton Los Angeles North/Glendale & Executive Meeting Ctr
about_text:
The stylish, Hilton Los Angeles North/Glendale & Executive Meeting Center is nestled in an upscale business district near Bob Hope Burbank Airport and only a few miles from LA area attractions. Ride the complimentary shuttle to and from the airport. Visit Los Angeles Zoo at Griffith Park, Universal Studios or shop at Glendale Galleria and Americana at Brand.

Stay in a spacious guest room, suite or executive room at this Los Angeles North/Glendale hotel. All rooms feature contemporary decor and high-speed internet access. Upgrade to an executive room on the higher floors for amazing views, exclusive amenities and complimentary breakfast for two at Trofi's restaurant.

Centrally located and only a few minutes' drive to Burbank, Hollywood, Pasadena and Los Angeles, the hotel is Glendale's premier Executive Meeting Center. Take advantage of over 19,000 sq. ft. of meeting and event space, room for up to 850 people, for meetings, Glendale wedding receptions and special events.

about_text:
Welcome to the Doubletree Hotel Tallahassee - a full-service, hotel in the heart of downtown Tallahassee, Florida.

The Doubletree Hotel Tallahassee is located in the heart of downtown Tallahassee and is within walking distance from Florida's Capital Complex, the Florida Supreme Court, U.S. Federal Court, Leon County Courthouse, Tallahassee-Leon County Civic Center, and many government offices and museums. This Doubletree hotel offers views of the city parks, friendly service and an unbeatable location with easy access to Florida State University, Florida A&M University and only 15 minutes from Tallahassee Regional Airport. Our luxurious guest rooms include all the comforts of home and must-have amenities for business and leisure travelers alike.

Doubletree Hotel Tallahassee Features: 6,000 square feet of flexible meeting and banquet space, Two executive meeting suites, Complimentary wireless high-speed Internet access in public areas, Valet and self parking, Outdoor pool and sundeck,
