about_text:
Looking for a place to stay in Tallahassee? Then look no further than Aloft Tallahassee Downtown, a family-friendly hotel that brings the best of Tallahassee to your doorstep.
Aloft Tallahassee Downtown Hotel is a family-friendly hotel offering a flat screen TV, a refrigerator, and air conditioning in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.
The hotel features a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and baggage storage. Plus, guests can enjoy a pool and a lounge, which have made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Tallahassee. For guests with a vehicle, parking is available.
Nearby landmarks such as Knott House Museum (0.2 mi) and Old City Cemetery (0.4 mi) make Aloft Tallahassee Downtown a great place to stay when visiting Tallahassee.
If you like seafood restaurants, Aloft Tallahassee Downtown Hotel is conveniently located near Crystal River Seafood, Harry's Seafood Bar and Grille, and Bird's Aphrodisiac Oyster Shack.
If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Florida State University (0.6 mi), Museum of Florida History (0.5 mi), or Cascades Park (0.7 mi), which are popular attractions amongst tourists, and they are all within walking distance.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Aloft Tallahassee Downtown as you experience everything Tallahassee has to offer.

about_text:
Settle in for a relaxing stay in the heart of Tallahassee. Whether you're visiting us for business or leisure, our Hampton Inn & Suites Tallahassee Capitol-University hotel offers a prime location between historic All Saints District and the revitalized Gaines Street corridor. Enjoy modern comfort steps from Capitol Hill, Florida State University, Florida A&M University, Donald L. Tucker Civic Center and Cascade's Park.
Our modern guest rooms feature free WiFi, a microwave, refrigerator and HDTV. Head to the lobby for free hot breakfast each morning, or grab one of Hampton's On the Run™ Breakfast Bags, available Monday through Friday. Get a complete workout in our 24-hour fitness center or take a dip in our outdoor pool. Stay productive in our business center with access to a computer, faxing and printing capabilities.

hotel_name: Hampton Inn & Suites Huntsville Research Park Area
about_text:
The Hampton Inn is located within minutes from the Huntsville International Airport in the heart of Cummings Research Park. Huntsville is a city rich with charm, culture, ambiance and a thriving business climate.
The hotel faces a quaint lake with a 1/2 mile walking track around. The hotel features rooms with one king bed and sofa bed, rooms with two queen beds, and suites with separate living and sleeping rooms. All rooms feature free HSIA with printer on demand capalbilities. The suites offer a mini fridge and a microwave and all rooms include coffee makers. The hotel rooms also feature I-Home radios with MP3 connections. All rooms will have 32" LCD TV's featuring HD channels. The pool is an outdoor saline pool which is eco-friendly. The exercise room features all the latest equipment and has a laundry room with in for the time conscious guest.

address: 323 East Upper Wacker Drive, Chicago, IL 60601-9722
about_text: Comfort and productivity come together where the river meets the lake at Swissotel Chicago. Swissotel Chicago is graced with European style and contemporary Swiss elegance. The luxury experience includes award-winning hospitality, well-appointed accommodations and breathtaking views. Housed in a distinctive glass triangle structure, our hotel stands out for its international style, downtown sophistication and central location to signature sights. Find peace of mind and productivity in our recently upgraded 662 guest rooms or 42 luxury suites. Our business-friendly amenities make travel simple and seamless and our 65,000 sq ft of state-of-the-art meeting rooms, ballrooms and special venue space excel as an efficient place to meet, connect, celebrate and do business. We also have one on-site restaurant, hotel bar, and a penthouse fitness centre.

hotel_name: The Post Oak Hotel at Uptown Houston
about_text: The Post Oak Hotel is the only Texas Forbes Five-Star Hotel and Spa and Houston’s only AAA Five-Diamond destination. Set on 10 oak-studded acres, the 38-story tower boasts 250 ultra-modern guestrooms and suites; 20 executive residences; and an elegant 35,000-square-foot conference facility, including the largest ballroom in the Uptown Houston area. Unique amenities include Texas' only Forbes Five Star Spa, a state-of-the-art Technogym fitness center, a two-story Rolls-Royce showroom and on-site Bentley and Bugatti Post Oak Motors dealership, as well as six restaurants and bars throughout the hotel. The Cellar at The Post Oak, houses a wine collection with over 30,000 bottles, offering guests access to more than $5 million of the world’s finest wines including vintages dating back to the 1800’s. Additional offerings for an effortless experience include the indulgent Post Oak Salon, and the hotel’s fashion-forward boutique, 29 North.

address: 1 Arrivals Rd Terminal B, Philadelphia, PA 19153
about_text: Combine convenience and modern amenities in our well-located hotel, the Philadelphia Airport Marriott. Connected via skywalk to Philadelphia International Airport (PHL)Terminal B, our hotel offers guests an ideal retreat after a long day of traveling. Visitors will love our convenient airport location near downtown Philadelphia's most celebrated top attractions, including Penn's Landing, the National Constitution Center, Wells Fargo Center, and Eagle's Stadium in Lincoln Financial Field. If visiting for business or social gatherings, host events in our hotel's sophisticated venues with advanced audiovisual technology and enough space for up to 1,050 guests. After a full day of business, shopping or sightseeing, work out your tired muscles in our hotel gym or refuel with classic American dishes at Aviation Grill. In the evening, unpack in spacious hotel guest rooms with soundproof windows, premium bedding, and high-speed Wi-Fi. We look forward to welcoming you to Philadelphia Airport Marriott next to PHL.

hotel_name: Hampton Inn Philadelphia Center City-Convention Center
about_text:
Welcome to the newly-renovated Hampton Inn Philadelphia Center City-Convention Center hotel - conveniently located across the street from the Pennsylvania Convention Center. 
Our downtown location is within walking distance to the city's best restaurants, shopping and attractions. Visit Reading Terminal Market or the historic Macy's Department Store - both just a 3-block walk away.
We are known for our unbeatable value and convenience, free hot breakfast buffet and free WiFi. Our expanded fitness center is sure to please even the most seasoned gym-goers. All of our well-appointed guestrooms include a microwave and mini-refrigerator for your comfort and ease.
Enjoy dinner at our on-site restaurant, Pub 1301, open every evening from 5pm and serving casual American fare alongside a full bar service.
We look forward to welcoming you into our Hampton family and being your home-away-from-home here in Philadelphia.

about_text: With a convenient location and modern event venues, Sheraton Philadelphia University City Hotel is an ideal destination. Stay between the scenic campuses of University of Pennsylvania and Drexel University, top universities in the nation. Childrens Hospital of Philadelphia and the 30th Street Station are also nearby, allowing you to easily access the historic sites of the city. Well designed hotel rooms and suites offer everything you need for a successful visit. Enjoy vibrant views and all of your favorite cable shows from plush beds during downtime. Those seeking to stay active will appreciate our 24 hour fitness center. Guests can savor delectable Asian cuisine at Sang Kee Noodle House, located right onsite. Groups are invited to gather in one of our elegantly designed event venues, including the Benjamin Franklin Ballroom and William Penn Suite. Whether it is work or play that brings you to town, make Sheraton Philadelphia University City Hotel your home base.

about_text: Discover downtown Phoenix through a different lens at Hyatt Place Phoenix/Downtown: Timeless, Refined, & Energetic. Designs featuring modern desert chic all custom lobby, & full-service restaurant. Prime location within walking distance to an array of local attractions. Hyatt Place Phoenix/Downtown brings art deco design, a casual atmosphere, & practical amenities. Urban guestrooms offer separate spaces to sleep, work & play, as well as a Cozy Corner sofa-sleeper. Located in the heart of downtown, 3 blocks from the Convention Center & an array of attractions: Orpheum Theatre, AZ Financial Theatre, Chase Field, Talking Stick Resort Arena, Phoenix Art Museum, shopping, and restaurants. Immerse your taste buds with curated meals from Adams Table Patio & Bar during lunch or dinner, and indulge in local beer, premium spirits, fine wines, and made-from scratch food!

about_text: Embassy Suites Austin - Arboretum is just a short drive from downtown Austin and within walking distance of the Austin Arboretum's shops and restaurants. Located 20 minutes from the Austin-Bergstrom International Airport, the hotel is close to dining, the business district and the Austin technology hub, with companies such as Charles Schwab, IBM and Microsoft. Start your day with a complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast featuring scrambled eggs, pastries and fresh fruit. Unwind with complimentary beverages paired with snacks in our open-air atrium at our Evening Reception. Enjoy room service, or indulge in regional cuisine at D.J.'s American Grill.

about_text: Indianapolis Marriott Downtown boasts 650 guest rooms and suites which include modern, stylish design, luxurious linens, signature bath products, flat-screen TVs with HD programming and functional work areas. Conner's Kitchen + Bar located just off the lobby, offers elevated comfort food, craft beers and cocktails to a hangout-worthy spot and downtown Indy's best weekend brunch destination. Loaf + Vine Market is serving up grab and go fare and local specialties. Rye Bar is the place to see and be seen with an unmatched whisky selection and classic cocktails. Modern gym featuring new Peloton bikes, cardio equipment and free weights with a city view. Connected via skywalk to the Indiana Convention Center and Circle Centre Mall, this downtown Indianapolis hotel is ideal for business travel, just steps from Lucas Oil Stadium, Victory Field and a short walk to Gainbridge Fieldhouse. Indianapolis Marriott Downtown is a recipient of the Tripadvisor 2023 Travelers' Choice award.

about_text: Located on the shores of Lake Washington, Hyatt Regency Lake Washington at Seattle’s Southport perfectly combines the natural beauty of the Pacific Northwest with modern amenities. Enjoy access to downtown Seattle, Mount Rainier National Park, Gene Coulon Memorial Beach Park, and more. Spend your time shopping, dining, or hiking, then return to your comfortable room in Renton. Lakefront accommodations: 347 spacious guestrooms and suites with unparalleled views • Delicious all-day dining: Our waterfront restaurant offers cuisine inspired by the Pacific Northwest, or enjoy 24-hour dining options from The Market • Location, location, location: Explore Cougar Mountain Regional Wildland Park, kayak on Lake Washington, shop at The Landing, and much more • Ample on-site amenities: Enjoy the complimentary Wi-Fi, indoor pool, on-site spa, and 24-hour StayFit™ Gym • Indoor-outdoor event space: 60,000 sq ft of flexible meeting and event space, including 25,000 sq ft of outdoor event space

about_text: Enjoy a stay at the award-winning Arctic Club Hotel conveniently situated in downtown Seattle located within walking distance of local attractions like Pioneer Square, Lumen Field, T Mobile Park, and Pike Place Market. Travel on the Link light rail system from nearby Pioneer Square station to many areas in and around Seattle. This chic, vintage decorated Seattle hotel offers a unique experience echoing the post-Klondike gold rush days of the early 1900s. It also offers modern facilities to business and leisure travelers alike, including wireless high-speed internet access and 5,700 sq. ft. of meeting and event space. Wine and dine in style and at your convenience at the Polar Bar, a famous, local hotspot in the Arctic Club Hotel.

about_text:
Welcome to the Hampton Inn & Suites Baltimore Inner Harbor hotel, an upscale Maryland hotel offering the ultimate in modern amenities, comfort and service in the heart of the Baltimore Financial District.  This grand historic building is located two blocks from the Inner Harbor. 

The Baltimore Inner Harbor Hampton Inn & Suites features 116 spacious amenity filled hotel rooms with microwave, refrigerator, coffeemaker, hair dryer, complimentary high-speed internet access, and premium cable TV with movie channels. Maryland travelers can also request a spacious suite that features a whirlpool and additional amenities.

Sure to please the busy executive or leisure Maryland traveler, Baltimore Inner Harbor Hampton Inn & Suites hotel guests will be treated to our complimentary On the House hot breakfast buffet served daily.

about_text:
The Hilton Garden Inn Milwaukee Downtown is located in the heart of the city.  Walking distance from the magnificent Milwaukee lakefront this historic Hotel is located in the iconic Loyalty building on north Broadway.  This 125 year old gem will be transformed into a magical Hilton Garden Inn with all the modern technology and amenities necessary in today's hotels while embracing the history and character that has made the Loyalty building an historic landmark of great renown.  Experience the five story atrium with marble, granite and iron finishes and the magnificent skylight.  Imagine executives from Northwestern Mutual Life Insurance climbing the grand staircase in 1886. 

A mere ten miles from Mitchell International Airport the Hotel is walking distance to almost every major attraction the city has to offer:  
• The historic third ward with eclectic shops, art galleries and upscale dining nestled between Lake Michigan and the Milwaukee River.
• West town with its magnificent shoppi

about_text: Rekindle the spirit of your alma mater at the smartest place to stay in town. Nestled in the heart of campus, Graduate Tucson is close to everywhere Wildcats want to be, and just a short trip from downtown and historic Fourth Avenue. Guest rooms celebrate the natural flora and fauna of the region with pops of color against neutral backdrops. Accents of natural materials such as leather, wood and textiles blend together to create a modern space that’s distinctly Southwest. In the lobby, a vibrant desert sunset scene illuminates the front desk, while giant cacti and woven textiles make the bright, open interior about more than the natural sunlight. While you’re here, relax at the terrazo communal table and make yourself at home at Poindexter, our onsite café. Or head to the rooftop for a drink or a swim. So whether you’re in town rallying for a Wildcats win, exploring campus or soaking up the Southwestern sun, we’re here to make your stay memorable. Our warm, friendly and whip-smart staff are happy to provide you recommendations around Tucson so you’ll feel like a local even if it’s your first time in town.

about_text: The Adobe Rose Inn is a hidden gem tucked away just two blocks from the University of Arizona in the heart of the delightful and historic Sam Hughes Neighborhood. Each of our 6 rooms come with a private bathroom, hairdryer, coffee maker, television, and plush robes. The beauty of our natural surroundings invites you to relax and enjoy our tucked away courtyards, swimming pool and patios. Our breakfasts will tempt your palate and set the tone for your day, whether it is one filled with exploring, adventure, learning or business. The Adobe Rose Inn is dedicated to helping our guests create a lifetime of memories, one moment at a time.

hotel_name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Sacramento Riverfront Promenade
about_text: Embassy Suites Sacramento-Riverfront Promenade provides a comfortable all-suites experience. Explore the local attractions around this centrally-located hotel, from the Raley Field to the Crocker Art Museum. Stroll along the Riverfront Promenade - just steps from the hotel. Business guests can gather at the nearby Sacramento Convention Center or visit the California State Capitol. Spend an afternoon discovering the stories of Old Sacramento - browsing its shops, attractions and world-renowned museums.  Host a meeting in one of our spacious conference rooms, and stay connected with high-speed WiFi internet access. Our close proximity to the freeway and Sara Lee, Drexel University, PBS&j and Wells Fargo premises are a bonus to business travelers. Enjoy our signature complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast and evening reception held underneath the elegant tropical atrium.

about_text:
Hilton Cleveland Downtown is in the heart of Cleveland's vibrant downtown area, connected to the First Merit Convention Center of Cleveland, and near attractions, dining and entertainment. Enjoy a concert or game at the Rocket Mortgage Fieldhouse, First Energy Stadium or Progressive Field. Nearby are the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and Museum, and Playhouse Square.
 
Our downtown Cleveland hotel offers 600 beautiful, functional rooms with sleek, modern decor. Enjoy the exceptional views of Lake Erie and the Cleveland skyline, and handy amenities such as a 50 to 65-inch HDTV, an iHome docking station with USB connectivity, a mini-fridge, safe, and built-in workstation. WiFi is available for a fee. Upgrade to a suite to have a separate living area.
 
Enjoy fine dining at the on-site restaurant and appreciate a cocktail and a great view of Lake Erie from Bar 32 on the top floor. In-room dining is also available.

about_text:
The Hampton Inn Cleveland-Downtown hotel in Ohio offers quality accommodations, friendly and efficient service in clean, comfortable surroundings, with WiFi in all our rooms.

The Hampton Inn Cleveland-Downtown is conveniently located in the heart of the Cleveland, Ohio downtown business and financial district. The Hampton Inn hotel is a short walk from the Galleria and Tower City Malls, Theater District, Convention Center, the Flats and Warehouse District, Rock & Roll Hall of Fame, Great Lakes Science Center, Cleveland State University, Progressive Field, Browns Stadium and The Rocket Mortgage Field House (formerly The Quicken Loans Arena). Cleveland Hopkins International Airport is only 13 miles away from the hotel. 

The Hampton Inn Cleveland-Downtown hotel in Ohio has 194 guest rooms featuring complimentary hot breakfast, local and toll-free phone calls, 100% Guest Satisfaction Guarantee, and Hilton Honors Points and Miles.

hotel_name: DoubleTree by Hilton Tampa Rocky Point Waterfront
address: 3050 N. Rocky Point Dr. West, Tampa, FL 33607-5800
about_text:
The DoubleTree by Hilton Tampa Rocky Point is located on the waterfront just 12 minutes from downtown Tampa and the Tampa Convention Center. The hotel is in the heart of the city and a short drive to the Tampa International Airport, Westshore Mall and International Plaza. Enjoy picturesque views of Old Tampa Bay Wildlife Preserve and Tampa Bay from your room. 

The DoubleTree by Hilton Tampa Rocky Point Waterfront is situated in the Rocky Point business area, which is close to several Fortune 500 companies, the University of Tampa, the University of South Florida and MacDill Air Force Base. Your stay will begin with a warm freshly-baked signature DoubleTree chocolate chip cookie. Unwind in our heated outdoor pool and enjoy a meal poolside. Or, energize in our fully-equipped fitness center including Peloton© bikes.

this newly renovated hotel offers a peaceful retreat from the hustle and bustle of Waikiki with remarkable views of
majestic Diamond Head and the ocean.

hotel_name: Hilton Vacation Club The Modern Honolulu
address: 1775 Ala Moana Blvd, Honolulu, Oahu, HI 96815-1603
about_text: Perfectly situated, Hilton Vacation Club The Modern Honolulu stands at the epicenter between the world renowned Hawaiian experience of Waikiki Beach, the blossoming Kaka’ako arts district, and Honolulu’s downtown cosmopolitan scene. We are the hub of contemporary culture and creativity in Honolulu. Our boutique luxury is as refined as it is relaxed. An empowered team delivers an exceptional experience which is alluring, personalized and innovative, surrounded by an award-winning design concept that creates an urban chic beach aesthetic. Two stylish pools overlook the ocean for daytime fun. It’s no wonder Thrillist magazine called us “The best boutique hotel in Hawaii.”

about_text: Located just around the corner from Disneyland® Resort, the Anaheim Majestic Garden Hotel is named for the gardens that grace the 13-acre property, Anaheim Majestic Garden Hotel is an experience that’s as magical as the main attraction just down the street. Its 489 rooms are extra large (and even larger in the suites), the Dream Machine shuttle to and from Disneyland® Resort is free and there’s a Disney Desk where you can buy Disneyland® Resort Tickets. And when it’s time to unwind, there’s an outdoor pool & Jacuzzi, garden courtyards, a koi pond, and a family fun center. Plus the hotel's very own Princess Corinne delights kids and adults with story time, breakfast visits, and, with advance reservations, tuck-in/wake up experiences. The Garden Court Bistro is a great place to enjoy breakfast or dinner. Plus, the all new Hanagi Restaurant offers authentic Japanese temptations for the whole family to enjoy. Poolside dining is available in the summer and the California Deli & Store offers grab and go sandwiches and sushi. In addition to a great family escape, the Anaheim Majestic Garden Hotel provides a diverse array of meeting space, catering selections and pre- and post-meeting adventure. Featuring over 20,000 square feet of flexible meeting space, the hotel offers fifteen meeting rooms ranging in size with beautiful natural lighting and state-of-the-art AV capabilities. Outdoor space with picturesque gardens set Anaheim Majestic Garden Hotel apart from the standard meeting hotel.

about_text:
Located in the heart of Downtown Anchorage, Alaska the Hilton Anchorage hotel stands out for its convenience and comfort. This Hilton hotel is just a 10 minute drive from Ted Stevens International Airport, one block from the Alaska Railroad Depot and within walking distance of the Anchorage Convention District.

The Hilton Anchorage hotel is also within walking distance of over 100 dining options in and surrounding the downtown area. Our very own Hooper Bay Café is an open-air full-service lobby restaurant featuring the Hilton Breakfast, two private dining areas and a Starbucks Coffee Kiosk.

This Hilton Anchorage hotel is just two blocks from: Ship Creek fishing opportunities, Flight-Seeing Operators and Tour Companies, Alaska Museum of History and Art, The Ulu Factory, Nordstrom and the 5th Avenue Mall.

The Hilton Anchorage hotel has an inviting lobby enriched with an extensive Alaskan art collection, complete with a self-guided walking tour.

about_text: A full-service Hilton in Stockton, CA on I-5 in the San Joaquin Valley. We're located four miles from the Stockton Arena, three miles from the Haggin Museum, 15 miles from Lodi Wine Country, and less than one hour from San Francisco or Sacramento, CA. Enjoy complimentary WiFi, in-room mini-refrigerators, HDTVs and large work desks. Choose a standard room, or upgrade to a suite or executive room. Executive rooms include executive lounge access, with continental breakfast, available in our lobby across from the front desk). Dine on-site at the Canal Street Sports Bar or the Orchard Grill (local laws apply, vegan options available). Choose from healthy options, or enjoy delicious "bar food" dishes, if you like. We also have an outdoor pool/whirlpool spa, 24-hour business center, 24-hour fitness room, and an on-site walking track. Our on-site Starbucks® kiosk also serves a variety of bottled juice, smoothies or Tazo® teas.

about_text: Located adjacent to the Center for Contemporary Art and across the street from the Aronoff Center for the Arts, 21c Cincinnati works to foster the ongoing revival of Downtown Cincinnati and strengthen its role as a cultural destination. Working with the Cincinnati Center City Development Corporation (3CDC), 21c renovated the former Metropole Hotel and embraced the architecture of the historic landmark to create an exciting new space for guests to experience genuine hospitality, view cutting edge contemporary art, and enjoy culinary experiences that celebrates the region's sustainable producers. The world has changed over the last several months and here at 21c, we have made some changes too. One thing remains constant. Our top priority is the safety and wellness of our teammates and guests. Our website has everything you need to know to return to travel with 21c. We can't wait to welcome you back to Metropole and 21c Cincinnati!

about_text:
Looking for a place to stay in Toledo? Then look no further than Quality Inn, a budget friendly hotel that brings the best of Toledo to your doorstep.
Guest rooms offer a flat screen TV, and Comfort Hotel makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.
In addition, guests can enjoy a fitness center and free breakfast during their visit. As an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.
For those interested in checking out Savage Arena (1.9 mi) while visiting Toledo, Comfort Inn Toledo is a short distance away.
Travelers looking to enjoy some shrimp can head to J Alexander's Restaurant, Mancy's Steak House, or Mancy's Italian Grill. Otherwise, you may want to check out an Italian restaurant such as Mancy's Italian Grill, Olive Garden, or BRAVO Cucina Italiana.
Toledo is also known for some great historic sites, including Wildwood Manor House and Woodlawn Cemetery, which are not too far from Quality Inn.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Quality Inn as you experience everything Toledo has to offer.

Hilton Dallas/Plano Granite Park has consistently been awarded for outstanding guest services and upscale, contemporary hotel products since opening in 2014. The Boardwalk & Granite Park - The Boardwalk is a restaurant row, located behind the hotel, which features 8 walkable eateries. With Granite Park, we have a total of 13 restaurants within walking distance from the hotel. Entertainment - We boast fantastic proximity to area restaurants, shopping, entertainment, and sports facilities. A complimentary shuttle is available within a three mile radius. Local Attractions include: The Star in Frisco, The Shops at Legacy, Toyota Stadium, Stonebriar Centre Mall, Dr Pepper Ballpark, and Legacy West.

about_text: The Embassy Suites Lincoln hotel is located downtown in the city of Lincoln, Nebraska, adjacent to the Lied Center for Performing Arts, the historic Haymarket District and the campus of the University of Nebraska at Lincoln - UNL. This full-service upscale all-suite hotel is just minutes from the University of Nebraska's Memorial Stadium - home of the Nebraska Cornhuskers, the Nebraska State Capitol, the Nebraska Governor's Mansion, the Bob Devaney Sports Center, the Nebraska State Fairgrounds, Pershing Municipal Auditorium, the Lincoln Children's Museum, the Sheldon Memorial Art Gallery & Sculpture Garden, Folsom Children's Zoo and the Lincoln Municipal Airport. Guests of the Embassy Suites Lincoln hotel stay in spacious two-room suites and receive a complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast, a nightly manager's reception, a fitness center featuring a Peloton® Bike with toe cages, and high-speed Internet access.

about_text: Located in the heart of the historic Haymarket District the Hilton Garden Inn Lincoln downtown hotel is situated near the major businesses, events and attractions in Lincoln, Nebraska. Steps from Memorial Stadium and the Pinnacle Bank Arena, plus the convenience of a complimentary airport shuttle to and from Lincoln Municipal make this hotel in downtown Lincoln the perfect place to stay when visiting Lincoln for business or leisure. Upscale amenities include an onsite restaurant and bar with a fantastic outside covered patio area overlooking the street providing views of all the downtown action. Choose from a variety of spacious rooms and suites. Free Wifi throughout the hotel, 24-hour business center and fitness facility, indoor swimming pool and hot tub ensure you have everything you need for a comfortable, successful trip. Book Direct for best rate!

about_text: Hilton Orlando is a vibrant, contemporary resort with an exciting personality to complement an exceptional location, central to all major theme-parks and attractions and just minutes from dining and entertainment of International Drive. Guests are immediately welcomed with an upscale feel enhanced with resort-style accommodations and amenities. The resort offers several distinct dining options from our new sports bar, FastBreak, to the more leisurely Tropics Pool Bar & Grill. From a little R&R to making a big splash, enjoy our expansive recreation area featuring a tropical oasis with sweeping waterfalls overflowing into two pools and a lazy river lined with luxurious cabanas. For more activity, take a plunge down the winding waterslide, splash in the new Splash Pad or enjoy an afternoon on one of the sports courts. Inside, take the time for wellness and enjoy eforea spa & fitness center. Hilton Orlando is truly a destination with a unique experience in of its own.

about_text: The practically new Embassy Suites Laredo, TX is located just three miles from the Laredo International Airport and conveniently in the heart of Laredo's finest upscale shops. The beautiful full-service all suites hotel is just a short drive from the famous and Historical Downtown Streets of Laredo, the Civil Center, Laredo Center for the Arts, The Mexican Border and the Laredo Entertainment Center Arena - home of the Laredo Bucks Central Hockey League Champions, Texas A&M International University and Laredo Community College. Experience a relaxing environment surrounded by lush landscaping and tropical scenery with breathtaking waterfalls. about_text: Hilton Norfolk The Main is conveniently located at the intersection of Granby and Main in downtown Norfolk, Virginia. Our new hotel puts you within walking distance of many of Norfolk's attractions, dining and nightlife. Book a river view room and take in the beautiful views of the Elizabeth River. Take a dip in our indoor pool, or grab a workout in our onsite fitness center. During your stay, enjoy dinner or drinks at one of our three delicious new onsite dining options, Grain, VARIA and Saltine. Try your hand at a game of pool at our roof garden and lounge on the fifth floor, Grain. Enjoy fresh seafood and craft beers at Saltine. Or a delicious Italian meal at VARIA. In addition, extensive, high-tech meeting space makes The Main a perfect choice for small and large corporate events, weddings, conferences and more.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Virginia Beach/Norfolk Airport
about_text:
The Homewood Suites by Hilton Virginia Beach hotel is an all-suite, upscale, extended stay hotel just six miles from Norfolk International Airport. Conveniently located off I-264, the Homewood Suites hotel is nearby many of Virginia Beach's points of interests including the popular Virginia Beach Oceanfront and Boardwalk, Ocean Breeze Waterpark, Virginia Beach Marine Science Center, The Sandler Center for Performing Arts, Virginia Beach Town Center, Downtown Norfolk, and several Military Bases.

The Homewood Suites Virginia Beach, Virginia hotel offers 122 suites including your choice of Studio Suites or One and Two Bedroom Suites. All suites present areas for work and relaxation, complimentary wireless high speed Internet access, Flat Screen TV's, fully equipped kitchens with stovetop, microwave oven, full size refrigerator, table and chairs, dishwasher, plates, flatware, and coffee maker.

about_text:
The Hampton Inn Lubbock hotel is located in Lubbock, Texas, off the Quaker Avenue Exit of South Loop 289, behind Jason's Deli.  Area attractions include Texas Tech University, the West Texas Walk of Fame and Buddy Holly statue, local wineries, sporting events, golf courses, shopping malls, and amusement parks.  A variety of restaurants, including IHOP, Jason's Deli, Cheddar's, Outback Steak House, and Applebee's are within walking distance.

The Hampton Inn Lubbock hotel features 80 rooms, each with cable TV, high-speed wireless internet, hairdryer, iron, and ironing board. Microwaves and refrigerators are available in all rooms. Additional hotel amenities include our free hot breakfast, an indoor spa and pool, a business center, and copy-fax services.

We love having you here at the Hampton Inn Lubbock.

about_text: Discover the Southern California lifestyle at the fully reimagined Sonesta Irvine, just two miles from John Wayne Airport. Our centrally located hotel puts the most popular things to do in Irvine and Orange County within easy reach -gorgeous beaches, Disneyland, world-class shopping, multinational corporations and more. Guests at the all-new Sonesta Irvine will enjoy modern guest rooms inspired by Irvine's natural surroundings, flexible and collaborative meeting spaces and an exciting new culinary experience, Haven Point Provisions & Spirits. We look forward to giving you a warm California welcome! Sonesta Irvine provides complimentary SNA Airport shuttle for hotel guests daily from 6am to 10pm.

hotel_name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Irvine Orange County Airport
about_text:
The Embassy Suites Irvine - Orange County Airport hotel is the premiere suite hotel located in Southern California. Less than a mile from John Wayne/Orange County Airport, this Embassy Suites hotel is central to major corporations in the Irvine/Airport area and just minutes to Newport, Huntington and Laguna Beach, California. Our hotel is just a short drive to many top Orange County destinations including: Disneyland Resort, South Coast Plaza, University of California at Irvine, Irvine Spectrum, Anaheim Convention Center, Boomers! and K1 Speed Indoor Racing.

In town to catch a game? The Embassy Suites Irvine - Orange County Airport hotel is a short drive to Angel Stadium of Anaheim, home to the Los Angeles Angels of Anaheim and The Honda Center, home to the Anaheim Ducks.

Enjoy our spacious two-room suites featuring separate living room and private bedroom, microwave, refrigerator, galley kitchen and dining/work area.

address: 5055 N President George Bush Hwy, Garland, TX 75040
about_text:
Check in to a uniquely Tru stay at our Tru by Hilton Garland hotel. Balance is found in each room with free WiFi, a huge bathroom and 55-inch TV. Enjoy smaller, more efficiently designed rooms with various storage options for you to unpack and kick back.
Start your day with plenty of breakfast choices. From healthy to indulgent, selection abounds with our 'Build your Own' Breakfast toppings bar featuring 30 sweet and savory toppings for cereal, bagels, yogurt and more. Grab snacks, drinks, light meals and single-serve wine and beer in the 24/7 market. 
A four zone lobby will be your favorite spot to work, play, lounge and eat. Energize in the 24/7 fitness center. Cool off in the sparkling indoor pool and spa. Be entertained with games on the outdoor patio and yet be close to all your business needs in the Richardson Technology Corridor.
Affordable travel now comes with unexpected things - like certainty.

hotel_name: Holiday Inn Miami West - Airport Area
about_text:
Holiday Inn Miami West - Airport Area.
Only 9 miles from Miami International Airport (MIA) and offers free airport transportation. 

Whether your journey is for business or leisure, our elegantly designed, 100% smoke-free hotel is conveniently situated just 30 minutes from downtown Miami and Fort Lauderdale, with easy access to various renowned attractions. The world-famous South Beach, Marlins Park (home to the Marlins), and Hard Rock Stadium (home to the Miami Dolphins) are all just a short drive from our location.

Our outdoor oasis is ideal for unwinding by the pool and basking in the inviting Florida sunshine. Whether savoring a morning cup of coffee or indulging in a late afternoon or early evening cocktail after a bustling day, it's perfect either way.

Experience a blend of style and comfort at the Holiday Inn Miami West. Enjoy a range of on-site amenities, including Bistro 103, an outdoor pool, catering and event services, car rental, and a gift shop.

about_text: Embrace Southern elegance at Omni Richmond Hotel, an elegant retreat that overlooks the class 4 rapids of the scenic James River in Richmond, Virginia. Enjoy storied views, a heated indoor pool, and a beautiful atrium restaurant serving Tuscan delights. There's also an Italian market, Starbucks cafe, and breezy outdoor sundeck. The Virginia State Capitol and Virginia Museum of Fine Arts are moments away from the hotel. The hotel is conveniently located in downtown Richmond, VA making it an ideal place to hold large meetings, corporate events, and weddings. Our personalized service and luxury accommodations will not disappoint you and your guests. Omni Richmond Hotel is a truly unique destination offering easy access to timeless architecture, historic features and vibrant local life that defines the Richmond experience.

hotel_name: Hyatt Regency Birmingham - The Wynfrey Hotel
about_text: Welcome to Hyatt Regency Birmingham – The Wynfrey Hotel; a multi-million dollar renovation with untouched southern hospitality was completed in 2021. The transformation includes all guestrooms, meeting space, public space, and food & beverage outlets. The hotel now offers 329 modern guestrooms with features and amenities that allow for a convenient and comfortable stay. Each guest room has the Hyatt Grand bed, an in-room safe, 42" flat panel TV and a mini fridge. All 32,000 square feet of meeting and event space, including the Wynfrey Ballroom and over 22 meeting rooms, have been elegantly appointed with contemporary updates. A revitalized sense of arrival with an updated lobby coupled with a new restaurant, Merk’s Tavern and Kitchen, and a Hyatt StayFit fitness center, will complement the time-honored southern hospitality that awaits you at the Hyatt Regency Birmingham - The Wynfrey Hotel.

hotel_name: Redmont Hotel Birmingham, Curio a Collection by Hilton
about_text:
First opened in 1925, Redmont Hotel Birmingham, Curio Collection by Hilton, underwent a complete renovation in 2015, embracing state-of-the-art technologies and amenities, while retaining the style and glamour associated with the hotel in the 1920s. Our boutique hotel is within walking distance to the Theatre District where you will discover The Alabama Theatre, The Lyric Theatre, Paramount Restaurant and Bar, and lots of other dining and theatre options.

Organize a meeting or plan your dream wedding at this Downtown Birmingham, AL hotel. Our mezzanine level ballrooms provide the perfect setting for a host of events, and our dedicated staff will ensure your function is personalized and professional. Our 24-hour Connectivity Zone is the ideal place to check emails or make updates to your presentation.

Energize with the latest cardio and weights technology in the 24-hour fitness center.

about_text:
Located in the heart of downtown, Hilton Birmingham at UAB puts you within walking distance to the Five Points area and the University of Alabama at Birmingham. Navigating the city is easy with MAX Connect and our complimentary shuttle within two miles from the hotel, as well as to the airport and train. We are just blocks away from Region's Park, home of the Birmingham Barons, Uptown, Lakeside and the BJCC Convention Center Complex. The hotel also features a six level parking facility with direct guest room access. 

Our stylish guest rooms with UAB-themed décor boast floor-to-ceiling windows and offer oversized workspace with ergonomic chair, refrigerator, safe and individually controlled air conditioning. Select a large suite or executive room for a higher floor location, extra amenities, and Executive Lounge access with complimentary breakfast and refreshments throughout the day.

about_text: Our staff eagerly awaits your arrival at the Modesto Hotel near Highway 99, your gateway to Yosemite! Whether you are traveling for business, touring the beautiful California scenery, or just need a comfortable bed for the night we are the hotel for you! We are conveniently located 3 miles from some of the area's best medical centers such as Kaiser Permanente and 4 miles from the historic downtown area where you can visit the historical McHenry Museum and Mansion, the Great Value Museum, local farm stands, and eateries. Have a sports tournament at John Thurman Field? We are located less than 5 miles away! Feeling Artsy? Check out the Gallo Center for the Arts just down the road! Make us your home away from home in our lovely guest rooms equipped with free high speed Wi-Fi, and relax in our outdoor heated pool and hot tub. Make sure to grab a bite before you head out for the day with our complimentary breakfast! Looking to host an event? Invite your guests to our lovely ball room!

hotel_name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Aurora - Naperville, an IHG Hotel
about_text: Experience our Holiday Inn Express & Suites Aurora-Naperville, Illinois hotel. We are located in Downtown Aurora and within walking distance to The Paramount Theater, Two Brothers Roundhouse Complex, RiverEdge Park, Hollywood Casino and Metra Rail Station serving downtown Chicago. We are close to Dart Container, Pentair, Inc, and International Paper. The Aurora hotel is within minutes of Chicago Premium Outlet Mall, Aurora University, Waubonsee Community College, Great Lakes Center, Stuart Sports Complex and miles of running/biking trails. Aurora area attractions include Phillips Park Zoo, Red Oak Nature Center, Fermilab, Raging Waves Waterpark, Vaughan Athletic Center & Indoor Waterpark. We offer an indoor pool and whirlpool, 24-hour limited fitness center, and Complimentary Hot Breakfast. Meeting space is available for up to 48 people and complimentary high-speed Internet and a Business Center.

hotel_name: Holiday Inn Express Akron NW - Fairlawn
about_text:
Welcome to the Holiday Inn Express Akron NW - Fairlawn hotel, located in the upscale suburb of Fairlawn, Ohio, just a few minutes west of downtown Akron. We are located within minutes from I-77, on State Route 18, also known as Market Street. We offer 88 beautifully appointed rooms.  Whether traveling for business or leisure, travelers will appreciate amenities such as our 24-hour business center with Internet, indoor pool, and fitness center. We offer our Express Start Breakfast Bar, a hot breakfast complimentary to all guests.
   
We are directly across the street from the Summit Mall and within walking distance to many restaurants and shops.   Major corporations including Signet Jewelers, Panther Transportation and First Energy are all nearby.  

It is easy to visit everything the Akron area has to offer.

hotel_name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Amarillo, an IHG Hotel
about_text: No matter what brings you to the Texas Panhandle, you'll find the finest hospitality in Texas at the Holiday Inn Express® Hotel & Suites in Amarillo, TX. Our hotel is located off I-40, close to R. Husband International Airport (AMA), downtown Amarillo and area attractions like Palo Duro Canyon. Business guests appreciate our Amarillo, Texas hotel's location near companies like Bell Helicopter, Pantex, Tyson Foods and area hospitals. We also boast free Internet access, stylish executive suites, a 24-hour Business Center and two meeting rooms to make life on the road simpler. Families enjoying a Texas vacation love affordable hotels in Amarillo, TX that are close to must-see attractions like the Panhandle Plains Museum, the American Quarter Horse Museum and Wonderland Amusement Park. The iconic Cadillac Ranch is also just 15 miles from our Amarillo, Texas lodging. Few hotels in Amarillo, TX can match our amenities and ambiance.

about_text: The Fort Conde Inn, Alabama's only 4-star, AAA four diamond rated boutique hotel and bed and breakfast, is a luxurious facility exuding the style and feel of nineteenth century Mobile. Requiring two years of meticulous workmanship, the Inn has now been restored to its original Victorian splendor. Built in 1836, the Fort Conde Inn (Hall-Ford House) is Mobile’s second oldest house and its interior and exterior finishes reflect its architectural vintage from original heart pine flooring and custom-milled stairways, moldings, and window and door trim to marble fireplace mantles, plaster walls, 12 foot ceilings and crystal chandeliers. The Fort Conde Inn, located in Mobile's historic Fort Conde Village, has recently expanded to include four newly restored hisorically certified homes: The Antunez House, the Spear-Barter House, as well as the Blakely and Gonzalez cottages. Walking into the Inn today, is like taking a step back in time to when these homes were originally built. The Inn sits on a quiet street in Fort Conde Village surrounded by Victorian homes restored with integrity and respect for their architectural heritage. It is situated adjacent to Fort Conde, a pre-revolutionary war fort built by the French in 1720 and named after the Prince of Conde, a grandson of Luis XIV. Mobile was founded by the French and the fort protected Mobile from incursions by the British. In recognition of the French heritage of this land, the rooms at the Inn have been named in French after friends and family members of the owner.

hotel_name: Arizona Biltmore, A Waldorf Astoria Resort
about_text:
Daily Mandatory Charge includes: Resort Charge with guest internet; fitness center access and classes; Biltmore Golf replay; 1-hour bicycle usage; 2 bottled waters daily; lawn games; access to The Twist water slides; PressReader. Mandatory Charge also includes Historical Preservation Fund charge.

Known as an Arizona landmark with a century-old legacy and a celebration of Frank Lloyd Wright-influenced architecture and design, the Arizona Biltmore Waldorf Astoria Resort provides a glamorous oasis built among 39 acres adorned with lush gardens and glistening swimming pools. 

More than 700 guest rooms, seven sparkling pools, seven dining outlets, a 65-foot waterslide, two championship golf courses, 200,000 square feet of meeting and event space and a Spa facility await. We offer luxury not typically found in resorts of this size - while still honoring the history of this iconic and magical destination.

hotel_name: Four Points by Sheraton Jacksonville Beachfront
about_text: Set sail to a seamless oceanfront getaway at Four Points by Sheraton Jacksonville Beachfront. Ideally settled along the Jacksonville Beach boardwalk, our hotel is only moments away from exciting destinations such as Adventure Landing, Jacksonville Beach Fishing Pier, TPC Sawgrass and St. John's Town Center. Make time to explore the iconic sites of the city or spend your day soaking up the Florida sun on the beach or by our outdoor pool. From the daily happy hour at our on-site restaurant to our complimentary barbecue, we offer an inviting atmosphere for business and leisure travelers alike. Plunge into the plush beds in our stylish, beach-inspired rooms and drift off to relaxation. Our suites feature free high-speed Wi-Fi, flat-panel TVs, kitchenettes and pullout sofas, providing you with the ultimate comfort you desire and deserve. Whether you plan on lounging with your feet in the sand all day or trotting all over town, you'll discover a refreshing retreat at Four Points by Sheraton Jacksonville Beachfront.

about_text: Towering over Memphis, Hilton Memphis boasts the distinction of being the city's tallest hotel. This luxurious high-rise offers over 30,000 square feet of flexible meeting space, perfect for any business function. Situated in the heart of Memphis' prominent East Memphis business district, our location at I-240 and Poplar provides convenient access to a variety of shopping and dining options. The Memphis International Airport is just a 15-minute drive away, while the vibrant Downtown Riverfront District is approximately 20 minutes via interstate. Unwind after a productive day in our inviting outdoor pool and whirlpool, or savor delicious meals at our on-site restaurant. Hilton Memphis offers a sophisticated and convenient haven for your Memphis visit.

hotel_name: Hampton Inn & Suites Memphis at Beale Street
about_text:
Welcome to the Newly Renovated Hampton Inn & Suites - Beale Street, located in the heart of the Memphis Entertainment District. We are just a half block off Beale Street, 2 blocks from the FedExForum, and within walking distance of the business district. Most downtown attractions are a short walk or trolley ride away. Whether visiting for business or pleasure, the Hampton Inn & Suites - Beale Street has it all.

Renovated in Spring 2019 to fit in with the modern downtown blues atmosphere, the hotel features an indoor pool, an expanded fitness center, and a sweets shop. Free hot breakfast is included with every overnight stay. Complimentary WiFi, in-room safes, iron and ironing board are also included, as well as local and 800 calls.

about_text: Situated in the heart of the city and within walking distance to top attractions, Hyatt Regency Seattle is designed to make connections. As the largest hotel in the Pacific Northwest and first LEED Gold-certified hotel in the city, the hotel features 1,260 guest rooms and suites, 103,000 square feet of function space and numerous gathering areas and workspaces. Commitment to safety and wellness is our top priority. In accordance with Washington State guidelines, Andare Kitchen & Bar is open at 25% indoor capacity with delivery, take-out and curbside pick-up available. Our Fitness Center is available for use by reservation only. For details on all hotel-specific protocols in place, please visit our website. Current Offers: - Looking for a family-friendly staycation? Take advantage of our Hyatt Night In package that includes early check-in, late checkout, savings on parking and food and beverage options and more. - Need an alternative work location? Book Hyatt Regency Seattle as your Office for the Day and enjoy private use of a guest room from 7 a.m. to 7 p.m., including items such as premium Wi-Fi, discounts on dining and parking, access to hotel gym, etc. Hyatt Regency Seattle is designed to celebrate the very best the city has to offer and provide guests with a distinct Seattle experience. We look forward to welcoming you soon!

about_text: One of downtown Seattle's most dynamic destinations, The Westin Seattle offers guests spacious hotel rooms and suites with anticipatory service, signature Heavenly® amenities, and stunning views of the Seattle skyline. Nearby, Seattle icons such as Pike Place Market, the Space Needle, the Washington State Convention Center, and Lumen Field beckon, offering ample opportunities for adventure and exploration. After a busy day exploring Seattle, enjoy curated local wines and innovative small plates at 1900 FIFTH, or savor elevated casual dining at Relish Burger Bistro. For relaxation, the hotel features a heated indoor pool and wellness-enhancing WestinWORKOUT Fitness Studio with state-of-the-art gym equipment, including Peloton® bikes. For those seeking modern event space in downtown Seattle, please use our nearly 70,000 square feet of versatile venues and our delicious catering and expert planning services—CDiscoverthe Emerald City on your terms at The Westin Seattle.

about_text: Located near the Puget Sound waterfront, our luxury boutique hotel reflects the intrinsic beauty of Seattle and elevates the refined edge of downtown. Condé Nast Traveler thinks so, too—naming us to its 2020 Readers' Choice Awards as number one hotel in the Pacific Northwest. Come and experience the celebrated interplay of creativity and community within our sleek glass façade. Vitality and innovation find their home here, where innovators, entrepreneurs, and philanthropists seek refuge from the ordinary. Conceived by the city’s own award-winning Olson Kundig Architects, Thompson Seattle is a contemporary urban landmark at the center of an unparalleled landscape. Expansive, gasp-inducing views of the Sound, coupled with the energy of Pike Place Market and the culture of downtown, ensure that Thompson Seattle embodies the best of this modern city. It’s a place where travelers become residents and residents are transported, with revelry fueled culinary experiences that pay homage to the bounty of the Pacific Northwest. Add intriguing layers to the choreography of your stay - whether dining in our captivating restaurant, Conversation, or sipping up high at The Nest, our iconic rooftop bar and lounge. A vibrant culture awaits. Discover the unexpected Seattle with us.

about_text: Welcome to the Hotel Indigo Denver Downtown, where modern day pioneers and urban explorers are inspired to discover the perfect day in Denver! Offering the charm of a boutique hotel, our LoDo hotel features sliding barn doors and spa-style bathrooms, top-notch amenities of the Hotel Indigo brand, and in-house local experts who bestow their wisdom on what to do and where to go while visiting Denver. We are located just steps from Union Station, Coors Field, and the Museum of Contemporary Art.

about_text: Milwaukee Marriott Downtown is a full-service hotel that offers the epitome of luxury and convenience to make it one of the top hotels in downtown Milwaukee. Ideally located in the heart of East Town, this hotel offers easy access to Milwaukee’s top destinations including the shores of Lake Michigan, Pabst Theater, Cathedral Square Park, the Summerfest grounds, and the famed Milwaukee River Walk. This luxurious downtown Milwaukee hotel offers modern amenities including high-speed wireless internet, a 24-hour fitness center, and flexible wedding, special event, and meeting facilities equipped with state-of-the-art lighting and audio equipment. Guests love to stop by East Town Kitchen + Bar which offers elevated comfort food. Guest rooms are highlighted by luxury bedding, HD TVs with premium cable, and stylish design. Choose the Milwaukee Marriott Downtown and discover a Milwaukee, WI hotel destination that provides incomparable service and unprecedented style.

hotel_name: The Candler Hotel Atlanta, Curio Collection by Hilton
about_text: The Candler Hotel Atlanta - Curio Collection by Hilton Atlanta. Situated downtown on famous Peachtree St Atlanta. Set within The Candler Building, Atlanta's first steel skyscraper and on the National Register of Historic Places, this boutique hotel honors its past by retaining its iconic lobby and Beaux-Arts architecture with other areas thoughtfully restored and reimagined by designer Nicole Hollis. Arguably Atlanta's favorite hotel. Our chic hotel offers 265 brand new guest rooms with bright, modern décor and amenities which include Smart TV's, mini refrigerator and laptop sized safe. Make the most of business travel or family weekends by upgrading to a one-bedroom suite with separate lounge, sofa bed and soaking tub. Hotel amenities include complimentary WiFi, a fitness center with Peloton bikes, business center and full-service restaurant By George, housed in the former Central Bank & Trust banking hall, helmed by renowned and award-winning chef Hugh Acheson.

about_text: Explore Omaha from our Regency Mall Area Hotel Welcome to the Omaha Marriott, at the intersection of Interstate 680 and West Dodge Road, in the heart of Omaha! Conveniently located in the Regency Business Park and across the street from the exclusive Regency Court with many upscale shopping and dining options including Borsheim's, Whole Foods, Bonefish Grill and Flemings Steak House. Omaha's largest mall, The Westroads Mall, offering 150 stores and restaurants is less than a half mile drive from our hotel. Enjoy our full service Marriott with an onsite restaurant and lounge, gym, indoor/outdoor pool, business center, 24 hour Corner Pantry, complimentary parking and complimentary coffee in the lobby! We offer over 12,000 square feet of flexible event space, 300 guest rooms and over 600 parking spaces! Come stay, play and travel with us!

about_text: Work and unwind at our Oakland International Airport hotel. Let Courtyard Oakland Airport be your gate to the Golden State. Just minutes from Oakland International Airport (OAK), our hotel provides greater flexibility for guests traveling on business or leisure. Enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi throughout the entire hotel. The highlight of our lobby is The Bistro – Eat. Drink. Connect., which offers healthy food options as well as Starbucks coffee. Relax in spacious rooms with plenty of thoughtful amenities that keep guests well-connected and entertained. In downtime, splash around in our refreshing outdoor pool, or work up a sweat in the state-of-the-art fitness center. Wedding receptions or intimate board meetings will be right at home in three event venues. We encourage guests to make use of our complimentary airport transportation by calling the hotel on arrival. Book your stay at Courtyard Oakland Airport today and prepare to be impressed.

hotel_name: Hotel Ivy, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Minneapolis
about_text: Experience an unforgettable stay at The Hotel Ivy, a Luxury Collection Hotel, located in downtown Minneapolis. Connected to the city's Skyway system, it offers convenient access to downtown attractions. The hotel features 136 rooms and suites blending tradition and modernity, with amenities such as high-speed internet, original artwork, luxurious linens, and limestone bathrooms. Enjoy relaxation at Anda Spa, stay active at Anda Fitness Center, dine at Monello restaurant or Constantine speakeasy, and host unique events with custom catering or private in-room dining. Discover refined elegance in the heart of the Twin Cities.

address: 3100 Camino Del Rio Ct, Bakersfield, CA 93308-6245
about_text:
Welcome to the DoubleTree by Hilton hotel in Bakersfield. Begin your stay at this inviting hotel with a delicious fresh-baked DoubleTree Chocolate Chip Cookie and allow our attentive staff to cater to your every need. 
Situated on acres of beautiful, landscaped gardens and surrounded by palm trees and seasonal flowers, this Bakersfield hotel offers a resort-like oasis.

Ideally located only five miles from Meadows Field Airport and just off the Rosedale Highway and Highway 99, the hotel provides easy access to all that Bakersfield has to offer. Visit local attractions such as Kern River and The Fox Theatre, both within five minutes of the hotel, or remain in the hotel and lounge by the outdoor pool and work out in the fitness center.

Host a meeting, conference, special event, or wedding at this hotel with over 14,500 sq. ft. of flexible function space, including the largest ballroom in Bakersfield.

about_text: Named after the beloved wife of Hawaii's last reigning King, the historical Queen Kapiolani Hotel is conveniently located one block to Waikiki beach and near the Honolulu Zoo, Kapiolani Park, Waikiki Shell and Waikiki Aquarium. Most upgraded rooms feature views of Diamond Head and/or the ocean and the following FREE amenities: WiFi Internet access throughout the hotel and mini-refrigerator. Additional hotel amenities include meeting and banquet facilities, pool with sun deck and restaurant with panoramic views of Diamond Head and the Pacific Ocean.

hotel_name: Hilton Hawaiian Village Waikiki Beach Resort
about_text: Hilton Hawaiian Village is Waikiki's only true resort destination located on the widest stretch of beach in Waikiki. Do as much or as little as you like on Duke Kahanamoku Beach & Lagoon, the world-famous stretch of pristine white sands and azure waters fronting the Hilton Hawaiian Village Waikiki Beach Resort. Unwind beside five sparkling pools, which include a 10,000-square-foot Super Pool and the multi-layered Paradise Pool, featuring dramatic waterfalls and one of the only water slides in Waikiki. In this inspiring setting, we provide our guests with a destination to find reflection, renewal and indulge in new experiences unique to Hawaii and Waikiki.

hotel_name: Hilton Garden Inn Waikiki Beach, Honolulu
about_text: The brand-new Hilton Garden Inn Waikiki Beach puts you within minutes of Waikiki Beach and the many exciting attractions in Oahu, Hawaii. Walk to the beach and experience surfing, SUP boarding, and may other fun activities. 623 guestrooms and suites are available including both king and double queen guestrooms. These well designed rooms include a mini-refrigerator, microwave, 46" HDTV with premium cable, and complimentary WiFi internet access. Some rooms feature a view of the city or beach. Most rooms have a balcony with seating where you can enjoy the beautiful Hawaiian cityscape.

address: 12300 Las Vegas Blvd S, Henderson, NV 89044-9506
about_text: Nestled in the quiet city of Henderson at the southern end of the Las Vegas Valley, the Forbes Travel Guide Four-Star and AAA Four-Diamond M Resort Spa Casino captures a unique sense of place with its distinctive desert scape location in one of the world’s most exciting cities. The hotel's luxury boutique experience offers 390 guest rooms and suites including one, two, and three-bedroom loft suites, that balance eclectic sophistication with a sleek modern look. Forbes Four-Star Spa Mio is a special retreat with a full service salon and numerous treatment rooms, each benefiting from their own individual relaxation pod. The hotel also offers complimentary valet parking services, laundry, a 24-hour front desk and concierge, resort pool with private cabanas, eight restaurants including a rooftop cocktail lounge with outdoor terrace, 24-hour room service, daily newspaper delivery, turndown services, and extensive banquet spaces.

about_text:
See why so many travelers make Fairfield Inn & Suites Laredo their hotel of choice when visiting Laredo. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.
Guest rooms offer air conditioning, and Fairfield Laredo makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.
You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the hotel, including a 24 hour front desk, newspaper, and express check-in and check-out. In addition, guests can enjoy a pool and free breakfast during their visit. As an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.
Close to some of Laredo's most popular landmarks, such as Fort McIntosh (3.0 mi) and Republic of the Rio Grande Museum (3.1 mi), Fairfield Laredo is a great destination for tourists.
While visiting Laredo, you may want to try some ribs at one of the nearby restaurants, such as Texas Roadhouse, Rudy's "Country Store" & Bar-B-Q, or Tony Roma's.
Should time allow, Imaginarium of South Texas is a popular attraction that is within walking distance.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Fairfield Inn & Suites Laredo as you experience all of the things Laredo has to offer.

about_text:
The Hampton Inn Norfolk/Virginia Beach hotel in Virginia is located just off Newtown Road and Interstate 64 on Greenwich Road in the Hampton Roads area. The Hampton Inn hotel is just 12 miles from the beach. Major business areas such as downtown Norfolk, Interstate Corporate Center and others are a short distance away. Norfolk International Airport is 10 minutes from the Hampton Inn hotel and the Virginia Beach oceanfront is a 15-minute drive using Interstate 264.

The hotel features 4 stories, 122 rooms, fitness room, and outdoor pool. Enjoy Norfolk, Virginia hospitality at our complimentary deluxe continental breakfast with hot items.  Other amenities at this Hampton Inn are local calls, WiFi, and TV with HBO and 18 pay-per-view selections. The Hampton Inn Virginia Beach hotel offers data port phones, fax and copy service, microwaves, refrigerators, irons, hair dryer, connecting rooms, cribs, and room service.

about_text: Come settle in at the Staybridge Suites in Lubbock, Texas! Conveniently located across from Texas Tech University. Our recently renovated guest rooms in 2024 offer many amenities that will help you feel comfortable whether you are here for an extended stay or just an overnight visit. Our hotel and staff will be glad to welcome you and make you feel right at home. We are located just a short drive from Lubbock International Airport. Our hotel guests have easy access to many restaurants and retail locations. At this all-suite hotel, you'll enjoy apartment-style accommodations including a kitchen with a full-size refrigerator. Many of our guests here love our complementary beer and wine which is available during our evening socials! We have complimentary parking on-site and can accommodate uhaul trailers and large semi on the side of our hotel. In January 2024 - we've made improvements in the guest room by replacing every guest room TV with brand new 55inch televisions.

hotel_name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Tacoma Downtown, an IHG Hotel
about_text: The Holiday Inn Express & Suites Tacoma Downtown Hotel is exquisitely designed and conveniently located just off I-5 in the heart of downtown Tacoma. We are minutes away from the University of Washington Tacoma, Union Station, Tacoma Dome, Greater Tacoma Convention Center, Port of Tacoma, and a short drive from Joint Base Lewis McChord. Our spacious suites are perfect for travelers visiting Tacoma General Hospital or St. Joe's Medical Center. Need some leisure downtime? Step out and enjoy the great Pacific Northwest and visit Ruston Way Waterfront, NW Trek Wildlife Park, or our beautiful Mt. Rainier. If you're traveling for business or leisure, stay with us at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Tacoma Downtown. Rest in our fresh and comfortable beds and start your day right with our healthy hot breakfast. You can count on us to be the perfect hotel for all your traveling needs.

hotel_name: Hotel Indigo Columbus at Riverfront Place
about_text: While we may like to take it slow in the South, our tendency to settle into the moment hasn’t stopped the hustle. Founded as a riverfront trading town, the Chattahoochee River rapids are the soundtrack to our city. Hotel Indigo Columbus at Riverfront Place celebrates the spirit of creativity and innovation that spawned the historic W.C. Bradley family, whose influence continues in our hotel today. Founded in 1885, the W.C. Bradley company is distinguished in adaptability and forward-thinking, most known for manufacturing consumer goods with subsidiaries including Char-Broil and Zebco brands. In our restaurant, local gets the spotlight with fresh entrees featuring handpicked produce from W.C. Bradley Farms. With 107 uniquely-appointed guest rooms, our hotel gives you the front seat to the hidden essence of our neighborhood. You don’t need to go far for views – our rooftop bar offers an inviting setting for twilight craft cocktails and regionally-influenced local beers overlooking the Chattahoochee. Cheers to a moment to savor.

hotel_name: Renaissance Montgomery Hotel & Spa at the Convention Center
about_text: Travelers looking for Montgomery, Alabama luxury hotels choose Renaissance Montgomery Hotel & Spa at the Convention Center. Our Montgomery hotel's stunning architecture highlighted by modern amenities and a rooftop pool makes us a top choice for discerning guests. We are an Alabama capitol hotel situated downtown, near Maxwell Air Force Base, and we are a stylish hotel that features more than 103,000 square feet of meeting space, an 1,800-seat performing arts center, a 73,000-square-foot exhibit hall, and a 9,000-square-foot European spa. Comfort reigns supreme in each of our guest rooms featuring high-tech amenities, such as HD LCD TVs, wireless and touch screen phones, Wi-Fi, and a connectivity panel for all electronic devices. Enjoy delectable cuisine at The House restaurant in our hotel and mingle at The Exchange, our bar.

about_text: Berrodin Bed & Breakfast since first opening in 2017 has had the privilege of serving thousands of guests from over 40 different countries. Located in the Heart of Highland Square. Charming century home and Bed & Breakfast in the heart of Akron’s Highland Square Neighborhood. Berrodin Bed & Breakfast is a unique place of hospitality & fellowship where everyone is welcome. Situated on a historic brick-paved residential street just a block from the heart of Highland Square, Berrodin Bed & Breakfast offers guests all the comforts of home in a family-owned and operated three-story inn that exudes warmth and goodwill. We offer a personalized lodging experience in a thriving diverse urban area that is rich in history, culture, dining, music, entertainment, and adventure. Living at our B&B for the past 30 years, we can recommend the best places to dine, shop, and explore in Highland Square and beyond. We welcome the opportunity to host you, your family, and friends at our cozy inn where we will strive to serve you, and make your long-term or short-term stay both relaxing and memorable.

hotel_name: Hampton Inn and Suites Los Angeles - Glendale
about_text:
Finding an ideal family-friendly hotel in Glendale does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles - Glendale, a nice option for travelers like you.
Close to some of Glendale's most popular landmarks, such as Glendale Federal Savings Building (0.6 mi) and Power and the Passion (0.8 mi), Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles - Glendale is a great destination for tourists.
Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles - Glendale offers guests an array of room amenities including a flat screen TV, a refrigerator, and air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available.
The hotel offers a 24 hour front desk and baggage storage, to make your visit even more pleasant. The property also features a pool and free breakfast. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to paid public parking available on-site.
While visiting Glendale, you may want to try some crab at one of the nearby restaurants, such as Las Vegas Seafood Buffet, Din Tai Fung Dumpling House, or Crab Avenue.
During your visit, be sure to check out popular attractions like Museum of Neon Art (0.1 mi) and Central Park (0.1 mi), which are all within walking distance of the hotel.
Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles - Glendale looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Glendale.

hotel_name: Four Points by Sheraton Tallahassee Downtown
about_text: The Four Points by Sheraton Tallahassee Downtown is located in the heart of the city, just blocks from Florida State University, the State Capitol building, Florida A&M University, local museums, shopping, and more. Our hotel is the first L.E.E.D. Silver Certified property in Tallahassee actively carries out sustainable principles and practices in our daily operations. Our hotel features 164 guestrooms, a full-service restaurant, 2 bars, a resort-style pool, hot tub, a 24-hour fitness center, free Wi-Fi, and much more. We are the only choice when visiting Florida's capital city.

about_text: Discover the seamless fusion of contemporary elegance and unparalleled hospitality at the Marriott Marquis Houston. Situated in the heart of downtown Houston, Texas, our hotel provide convenience with a modern allure. Seamlessly linked by a skywalk to the George R. Brown Convention Center, our spacious guest rooms and suites offer a haven of comfort and style. Indulge in the ultimate relaxation with a refreshing plunge in our infinity pool or drift along the world's largest Texas-shaped rooftop lazy river. Whether from these aquatic wonders or the comfort of your room, immerse yourself in sweeping park or city vistas, accompanied by a wealth of deluxe amenities designed to elevate your stay. Explore an array of culinary delights across our diverse six dining outlets, each offering a unique and flavorful journey to cater to every palate.

about_text:
Rediscover the recently renovated suites at Embassy Suites by Hilton Phoenix - Scottsdale. Located 15 miles from Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport, the Embassy Suites by Hilton Phoenix Scottsdale features 270 two-bedroom suites with a separate living room area with sleeper sofa, 55- and 49-inch HDTVs, private walk-out balcony or patio, in-room safes, and wet bar with microwave, coffeemaker and a mini-fridge. 

Whether you're traveling for business, recreation, or fun with the family, our all-suite property has everything you need. Take in the gorgeous views of Stonecreek Golf Club or Camelback Mountain. Greet the morning with our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast. Sip drinks poolside, break a sweat in our 24HR fitness center, or savor locally inspired cuisine at Tatum's lounge or restaurant. 

Wind down for the day or gear up for the night with our complimentary evening reception.

about_text: FOUND:RE Phoenix is a place where the community gathers to experience great local design, art, and food. As downtown Phoenix's newest lifestyle hotel, our 104 industrial-chic guestrooms feature custom locally-designed fixtures and furnishings, eclectic local art, and thoughtful amenities. Browse the work of local artists in our Gallery and Studio, or host an unforgettable meeting surrounded by inspiring, thought-provoking art in our 6,000+ square feet of flexible, indoor/outdoor event spaces. If you're looking for a memorable meal with friends or family, try our restaurant, MATCH Restaurant & Lounge. MATCH Restaurant & Lounge is a neighborhood eatery, serving modern comfort food with unique cocktails and craft beers.

hotel_name: Hyatt Regency Denver At Colorado Convention Center
address: 650 15th Street Adjacent to Colorado Convention Center and one block from 16th Street Mall, Denver, CO 80202-4207
about_text: Hyatt Regency Denver at Colorado Convention Center, featuring 1,100 modern accommodations, is one of the region’s largest hotels. Standing 36 stories high, sleek and contemporary in design, it is adjacent to the Colorado Convention Center and just one block from the 16th Street Mall pedestrian promenade. The guest rooms were designed with a décor that captures the essence of being where the mountains meet the plains. With special emphasis on state-of-the-art technology, each accommodation features the convenience of LCD Smart 46 inch televisions and free high-speed Internet along with comfortable work stations. A 6,700 square foot fitness center, with windows overlooking the 14th Street Theater District, includes an indoor lap-pool and outdoor sun deck and whirlpool. In addition to Former Saint Craft Kitchen and Taps , Hyatt Regency Denver provides the 27th floor Peaks Lounge which captures sweeping views of the Rocky Mountains.

about_text: Voted Friendliest Hotel in the U.S.! When you visit a famously whimsical city, you want an equally whimsical hotel. With tasteful vintage touches at every turn, The Royal Sonesta Portland Downtown offers the quintessential Portland experience. Rest your head among custom-made bird wallpaper and playful décor in one of our 221 guest rooms and suites. Experience the Peloton Bike in our fitness center. Indulge in a relaxing afternoon at Dosha 5th Avenue Spa. And if business brings you here, enjoy over 8,000 square feet of unique meeting space sure to inspire. Not only do local Oregonians love us, but the property has received raves from Travel + Leisure, Architectural Digest and Condé Nast Traveler magazines. In the heart of downtown, our historic hotel is steps away from Powell's City of Books, Tom McCall Waterfront Park, Pioneer Courthouse Square, and many other premier attractions. A stay at The Royal Sonesta Portland Downtown is an experience you won't soon forget.

about_text:
Retro style meets modern luxury at the AAA 4 Diamond-rated Nautilus Sonesta Miami Beach hotel. Originally designed in the 1950s by famed "Miami Modern" architect Morris Lapidus, our new South Beach oceanfront hotel is a faithful nod to the Golden Age of midcentury oceanfront glamour.

Experience premier amenities, including a heated saltwater pool with an underwater sound system and poolside cabanas, direct access to South Beach, a 24-hour fitness center with a Peloton, valet parking, elevated on-site dining, and 23,000 sq. ft. of flexible event space. Stay in the heart of Miami Beach on Collins Avenue with easy access to top destinations, including Lincoln Road, the Kaseya Center (former FTX Arena), and the Miami Beach Convention Center.

At Sonesta Hotels & Resorts, we're so happy you're here.

about_text: Welcome to Hilton Miami Airport Blue Lagoon, Miami Airport Resort style hotel. Free internet access is offered to guests in the public area. In the guest rooms it is free for Hilton Honors members and charged for non members. Membership is free. The Hilton Miami Airport Blue Lagoon offer a flat screen TV with 40+ channels, a minibar, coffee maker and hair dryer. The hotel boasts a very large outdoor and heated pool, Jacuzzi, tennis and basketball court and a scenic walking path. During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered including room service and a concierge. For travelers arriving by car, parking is available for $21 for self parking per night. For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Miami, Hilton Miami Airport is located a short distance from Little Havana, the Design District and Wynwood - the famous Arts district. There is also shopping close by at Dolphin Mall, the Magnificent Mile in Coral Gables and Brickell in downtown Miami. Hilton Miami Airport Blue Lagoon puts the best of Miami at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

address: 1311 Wet N Wild Way, Arlington, TX 76011-4302
about_text: Arlington's Entertainment District is thriving with the excitement of professional sports and national attractions as well as home to major North Texas businesses. The Holiday Inn Arlington-NE Rangers Ballpark is convenient for guests visiting Dallas, Fort Worth, or arriving at DFW Airport.  Our most popular events are Dallas Cowboys home games at AT&T Stadium, Texas Rangers at the brand New Globe Life Field, the original Six Flags Over Texas and Hurricane Harbor. To truly experience Arlington, visit the UT Arlington Planetarium,  College Park Center or Levitt Pavilion for the Performing Arts. All of our guest rooms are spacious and feature HDTV, microwave and mini fridge. Relax at the indoor heated pool and hot tub or lounge poolside and enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi. The Draft Bar and Grill serves up breakfast and dinner.
