about_text: This unique resort-style hotel offers the following features: LOCATION: Directly across the main entrance to Disneyland(R). Adjacent to Anaheim Garden Walk. Two blocks from the Anaheim Convention Center. Two-story apartment-style buildings on nine acres of landscaped gardens and walkways. ROOMS: Large rooms, some with patio or balcony. FAMILY SUITES: Two connecting rooms for families. WI-FI: Complimentary internet for guests. FOOD & BEVERAGE: Affordable Restaurant, Lounge and Room Service with with breakfast (6:00am – 11:00am), lunch (11:00am - 5:00pm), dinner (5:00pm - 11:00pm) and late-night offerings (until 1:00am). PARKING: Ample parking all around the hotel. POOL: Largest outdoor swimming pool in Anaheim and hot tub. RECREATIONAL AREA: Green outdoor space with corn hole toss and complimentary oversized connect four games to enjoy. FITNESS ROOM: On site gym with machines and free weights. MEETING ROOMS: Over 11,000 sq. feet of flexible indoor and outdoor meeting space. VALUE: Unbeatable value for a friendly, full-service, 3-Diamond hotel in Anaheim!

about_text: The Embassy Suites by Hilton Anchorage Alaska hotel is located in midtown Anchorage. This upscale hotel will is one of the most luxurious all suite property in the State of Alaska. The Embassy Suites Anchorage Alaska hotel is close to many corporate offices, including British Petroleum, CH2M Hill and Providence Health Care. The hotel is also within walking distance of numerous restaurants and world class shopping. The Embassy Suites Anchorage Alaska hotel features 169 rooms, either one or two bedroom suites with microwave, refrigerator, coffeemaker, hair dryer, voice mail and high-speed internet access. This Anchorage Alaska hotel features a full-service restaurant, bar and lounge, business center, meeting space with onsite catering, indoor pool, whirlpool and fitness center.  We look forward to welcoming you to our Alaska hotel with Hilton signature service and cleanliness along with Hilton Honors benefits for our loyal guests.

about_text:
Enjoy modern amenities at our hotel in Toledo, OhioThe  Holiday Inn Express & Suites Toledo West provides comfortable and modern accommodations with a variety of guest rooms and amenities to suit your preferences. Enjoy a free hot breakfast buffet offered daily near the indoor swimming pool and Fitness Center. Ideally located just  one mile from the University of Toledo and Franklin Park Mall and close to a host of local attractions and fine dining.

Holiday Inn Express & Suites Toledo West  provides fresh, plush beds. Linens and duvets are washed fresh for every guest. You will rest easy on our pillow top mattress with plush comforter and crisp white duvet with comfy pillows.

Guests receive complimentary breakfast served daily, including fresh baked waffles and oatmeal with delicious toppings. Holiday Inn Express & Suites Toledo West also provides free in-room and public area Wi-Fi and business services with fax and printer and photocopy equipment.

hotel_name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Maumee Toledo
about_text:
Stay a while at our Home2 Suites by Hilton Maumee Toledo hotel, ideally located near excellent attractions. Our hotel combines comfort, convenience and location into a complete lodging experience.
Business travelers can enjoy the vibrant décor as you get to work in our incredible business center. After a day of work, relax at our outdoor patio complete with a grill and fire pit. Every room in our all-suite hotel features a welcoming and comfortable modern décor. Enjoy the extensive amenities each suite has to offer including a work desk, a full kitchen, sofa bed and free WiFi. Prepare all your favorites from the comfort of your room with an induction burner, available from the front desk.
Be the star of multi-tasking at our Spin2 Cycle, where you can run on the treadmill while running a load of wash. After your work out, take a dip in our indoor pool. Forgot something? Stop by the 24-hour Home2Mkt for a snack and any forgotten travel essentials.

about_text: The Cambria® Hotel Plano Frisco blends modern style with classic Texas charm. We want you make the most of your visit—whether you’re traveling to Plano for business or vacation. That’s why we offer spacious guest rooms and amenities like a outdoor pool, a local shuttle, a fitness center and more. WiFi is included throughout the hotel. We also have our own full-service bar and restaurant serving locally inspired dishes and craft beers from local brewers. Just a short walk from our hotel, you’ll find The Shops at Legacy, an open-air shopping center featuring upscale retailers and a variety of dining options. Legacy West is also within walking distance. It’s an emerging business and cultural district with shops, restaurants and corporate offices for JP Morgan, Toyota Motor Corporation, Liberty Mutual Insurance and many others. Plus, we offer a complimentary shuttle to nearby businesses, attractions and medical centers in Plano and Frisco. If you want to explore the greater DFW area, it’s easy to drive to Dallas to visit the Sixth Floor Museum, the Dallas Arboretum and Botanical Gardens and other attractions.

about_text:
The DoubleTree by Hilton Madison Downtown is in the heart of all of the action. Just steps from the Kohl Center and the University of Wisconsin-Madison campus, this hotel is perfectly located to be able walk to the Capitol, State Street, and numerous other Downtown Madison venues and attractions. 

Enjoy the courtesy shuttle service to and from the Dane County Regional Airport as well as within a two-mile radius of the hotel. All guests receive complimentary Wi-Fi, and Hilton Honors members can earn points during their stay. The award-winning team looks forward to welcoming you to the beautiful city of Madison with their famous DoubleTree chocolate chip cookies.

hotel_name: DoubleTree by Hilton Lubbock University Area
about_text:
Experience the charm, warmth and genuine service of the new DoubleTree by Hilton Lubbock University Downtown. Featuring a stucco exterior and stunning open atrium design, our hotel is located at the intersection on 5th St and Ave Q, nestled between thriving Downtown Lubbock and Texas Tech University.  Whether you are here to become a Texas Tech Red Raider, enjoy Lubbock's vastly growing community with over 20 new restaurants or enjoy the local entertainment at the upcoming Buddy Holly Performing Arts Center, we are the place for you. The DoubleTree Lubbock sits within four miles of both major hospitals, Covenant Medical Center and University Medical Center.

We'll greet you at check-in with a warm DoubleTree Chocolate Chip Cookie, make you feel at home in our modern rooms and suites with an array of thoughtful amenities and attentive service. Enjoy WiFi access, large flat panel TVs, and complimentary tea and coffee in your room.

about_text: Abloom with the vibrant spirit of the west, our AAA Five Diamond wonderland re-energizes and reinvigorates desert escapism. Blending personalized service with Spanish-style architecture and outdoor adventure, we offer all of the superb amenities you expect from a world-class destination resort. Soak up the sun at one of our 6 sparkling pools on property featuring waterslides, cabanas, poolside service and Arizona’s only white sand beach. We invite you to unwind at our with luxurious treatments at our 44,000 sq. ft. Well & Being Spa, or the world renowned Sisley-Paris spa-within-a-spa. Tee up at the TPC Scottsdale’s Stadium golf course, home to the annual PGA Tour WM Phoenix Open, located right in our backyard and enjoy your best round of golf yet. Consistently awarded Arizona’s best dinning resort, enjoy curated culinary experiences at our five restaurants on property, or for larger affairs we have 316,000 sq. ft. of flexible event space including both indoor and outdoor venues and two conference centers. Discover sanctuary in the Sonoran Desert.

hotel_name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Modesto-Salida, an IHG Hotel
about_text: Beautiful Modern Hotel ideally located between San Francisco and the North Gate entrance to Yosemite Enjoy easy access on and off Highway 99 from our convenient location. Blue Diamond, Kaiser Permanente, Seneca Foods, Save Mart, PG & E, Silgan Container, Frito Lay, Foster Farms are a short drive from the hotel. SJVC, Brandman University, University of Phoenix, Brightwood College, Gurnick Academy of Medical Arts, Modesto Junior College, Herald College, and Kaplan are a few miles away. Sutter Health Memorial Medical Center and Doctors Medical Center are five minutes away. We are 90 minutes from three international airportsOAK, SFO, and SMF. We offer free parking and Road Warriors can keep up exercise routines with our on-site Fitness Center. Boomers! Family Fun Center is directly across the street. Bel Passi, Riverbank, Rainbow Fields, Mistlin, and Costa Fields, YMSA-AJAX, Big League Dreams are the nearby Sports Complexes.

about_text:
The Hampton Inn & Suites Montgomery-Downtown hotel is located in the heart of Montgomery, Alabama's newly redeveloped and energized historic area. Whether traveling to our city on business or leisure, our spacious, attractive rooms and suites will undoubtedly provide you with an extraordinary lodging experience.

Our beautiful 10-story hotel is conveniently located just minutes from several of Montgomery's authentic restaurants such as the Olive Room, Montgomery Brew Pub, and Lek's Railroad Taste of Thai. Not to mention, our Hampton Inn hotel is just a short drive away from the Capitol Hills Links Stop on the Robert Trent Jones Golf Trail in Alabama.

Every morning you will be able to enjoy a comfortable work-out in our cozy exercise facility, after which, you can enjoy our complimentary On the House hot breakfast which includes two hot items and a variety of other breakfast selections.

No matter your travel plans, you will love staying with us.

hotel_name: Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott Montgomery-EastChase Parkway
about_text: Relax in Alabama at Fairfield Inn & Suites Montgomery-EastChase Parkway. Our hotel is located in East Montgomery near The Shoppes at EastChase, providing a variety of shopping and dining options. Enjoy access to nearby attractions, including Lagoon Park, Robert Trent Jones Golf Trail, Auburn University at Montgomery, downtown Montgomery and the Rosa Parks Museum. Business travelers appreciate our hotel's proximity to the Alabama Industrial Park and Maxwell Air Force Base. Start the day with our free hot breakfast or work out in our 24-hour fitness center and indoor pool. During your downtime, unwind with loved ones on our outdoor patio with a firepit. Hosting a small business or social function? Book our event space. Make use of free Wi-Fi, microwaves and mini-fridges in every hotel room. At Fairfield Inn & Suites Montgomery-EastChase Parkway, you’re our #1 priority. Ask us about The Fairfield 100% Guarantee™, where we promise you'll be satisfied or we'll make it right. That's our commitment to you.

about_text:
The Hilton Akron/Fairlawn hotel is an ideal choice in Ohio for those traveling for business or leisure. The hotel is situated in a well-manicured office park with excellent shopping and entertainment opportunities nearby. Located in the upscale suburban Fairlawn area of Ohio and close to Cleveland, Akron and Canton.

The experienced hotel staff and impeccable service have earned this Hilton hotel one of the highest scores for customer loyalty and return visits. At the Hilton Akron/Fairlawn hotel the level of service is matched by the level of comfort of our guest rooms that feature oversized marble bathrooms, premium cable TV channels, high-speed wireless & wired Internet access, designer furnishings, and a daily USA Today newspaper.

The Hilton Akron/Fairlawn hotel in Ohio features a comprehensive fitness center with indoor and outdoor swimming pools - sauna - state-of-the-art Precor fitness equipment - and a full-time masseuse. The hotel's winning restaurant is Beau's Grille.

about_text:
The Hilton Garden Inn Mobile West hotel is conveniently located in the heart of Mobile, Alabama. The City of Mobile offers a rich history, prime location and many unique attractions. Whether driving or flying into the Mobile Regional Airport, Hilton Garden Inn Mobile West Alabama hotel is conveniently located off of I-65 and Airport Boulevard. With over 300 years of history, the Mobile heritage is reflected in the people architecture and food, with something for every traveler.

The Hilton Garden Inn Mobile West Alabama hotel features 101 spacious guestrooms. Each room is equipped with one king or two queen beds. A hospitality center in each room includes a microwave refrigerator and coffeemaker. An iron ironing board and hairdryer are standard amenities in all of our beautiful rooms. about_text:
The Hilton Garden Inn Tallahassee hotel is just off Florida Interstate I-10 and minutes from downtown Tallahassee. Florida State University, Florida A & M University and numerous corporate offices are also nearby. We offer deluxe accommodations with complimentary high-speed Internet access and secure PrinterOn remote printing. Each Hilton Garden Inn Tallahassee hotel room features an oversized work desk with an ergonomic chair, two telephones, voicemail, data ports, and Internet access. Other standard features include a microwave, refrigerator, coffee maker, hairdryer, iron and ironing board, satellite television with HBO, and a full array of Neutrogena bath products.

The Hilton Garden Inn Tallahassee, Florida hotel breakfast restaurant, The Garden Grille & Bar, serves a bountiful breakfast buffet until 10:00am weekdays and 11:00 am weekends. For lunch or dinner service, numerous local restaurants are located within just a few blocks of the Hilton Garden Inn Tallahassee hotel.

about_text: Make your trip a great experience at Le Méridien Indianapolis. Our vibrant hotel near Indiana Convention Center offers everything you need for a seamless stay, from contemporary rooms & suites, plush Marriott bedding & ergonomic workspaces to on-site dining. Our multifunctional event spaces are ready for your next meeting, wedding, or other special occasions. No matter what brings you to Indianapolis, enjoy it from Le Méridien Indianapolis.

about_text: Soaring 70 floors above the Detroit River in downtown Detroit, Michigan, Detroit Marriott at the Renaissance Center is ideally situated on the RiverWalk and next to Hart Plaza. Our hotel sits within the GM Renaissance Center, which provides convenient access to shopping, restaurants, and entertainment. The Detroit "People Mover" public transportation system enables guests to visit top attractions that surround the hotel. Floor-to-ceiling windows and dramatic views highlight our hotel rooms, while a reinvented lobby boasts functional seating and business-friendly amenities in a trendy setting. Delight in the stylishly urban ambiance of Volt, and enjoy breakfast, lunch, dinner, and evening cocktails.

about_text: Tucked in Harbor East near the famed Inner Harbor in Baltimore, Maryland, Baltimore Marriott Waterfront offers guests an unsurpassed location to explore the vibrant city of Baltimore. Our top-rated waterfront hotel in Baltimore is superbly situated in the Harbor East district, home to the city's best dining and nightlife opportunities. Upon arrival, guests will be delighted to discover spacious, well-appointed rooms with perks, including luxury bedding, high-definition TVs, and stunning water views. Additional hotel amenities include a 24-hour fitness center. Boasting a staggering 50,000 square feet of event space and situated near the city's Convention Center, our hotel is ideal for business travelers to Baltimore. Families, too, will appreciate our superior location near local attractions like Camden Yards. Head towards the water and see why Baltimore Marriott Waterfront is the perfect option for business and leisure travelers.

about_text:
The Hilton Milwaukee City Center hotel is a classic downtown Milwaukee Hotel recognized as the city's finest hotel with a tradition of excellence going back more than 80 years. The gracious style of the hotel is reflected in our impeccable service and attention to every detail.

Combining its 1920s grandeur and elegance with today's modern conveniences, the Hilton Milwaukee City Center hotel features beautifully appointed guest rooms with plush furnishing and the latest in-room amenities, the distinguished Milwaukee ChopHouse featuring savory steaks, fresh seafood and an extensive wine list, and the renowned Miller Time Pub and Grill, perfect for unwinding with friends and co-workers.

In addition, the Hilton Milwaukee City Center hotel has a well-earned reputation for hosting weddings, meetings, conventions and banquets.

about_text:
Step into the world-class Hilton Atlanta, your ideal downtown setting for business or pleasure located in the heart of Atlanta. Enjoy walkability to the city's most renowned attractions like the Georgia Aquarium, Centennial Olympic Park and Georgia World Congress Center. Dine at our award-winning Nikolai's Roof, highlighting over 40 years of AAA Four-Diamond accolades or Trader Vic's, Atlanta's only authentic Tiki experience. Our full-service lobby restaurant serves Southern classic fare with a twist, and grab-n-go cafe, Market Place, serves La Colombe coffees and fresh sandwiches and is conveniently open late. Ease into transportation to and from Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport via MARTA, connected by skybridge directly into our contemporary accommodations. We are conveniently the closest convention hotel to the I-75/I-85 connector.

Each of our 1,249 guest rooms offer deluxe accommodations, contemporary furnishings, lounge seating, HD LCD TV and WiFi access.

hotel_name: Hard Rock Hotel and Casino Tulsa
about_text: Sleek, stylish, and absolutely packed with hip and modern amenities, Hard Rock Hotel & Casino Tulsa is the place to stay! Stay in our AAA Four Diamond-awarded hotel with 454 rooms and suites fit for a rock star. Play a round of 18-holes at the historic Cherokee Hills Golf Course, followed by a variety of dining options including the award-winning upscale McGill's on 19, HWY 66 Diner, The Eatery (formerly known as The Buffet), and Food Court that serves breakfast, lunch and dinner. Then, our nightlife will rock your world! Rock out to the beats at Amp Bar, jam to live rock music at Riffs or 2-step to the best country hits in Track 5. Hard Rock Live features live top-shelf acts like Stevie Wonder, Blake Shelton, KISS, Reba and Alanis Morissette, followed by an action-packed extravaganza in our 24-hour casino. Replay Sports Bar is a sport lover's dream with 51 TVs, a sports ticker located upstairs on our mezzanine floor. Our 75,000 sq ft of meeting space is enhanced by excellent service and enough catering options to impress a room full of rock stars. All this and more makes Hard Rock Hotel & Casino Tulsa the premier choice!

The Hilton Garden Inn is centrally located between Dallas and Fort Worth only ten miles from the DFW Airport with convenient access to I-30 and highway 360. Our Arlington, TX hotel is conveniently located close to attractions such as Six Flags, Hurricane Harbor, The Ballpark in Arlington (home of the Texas Rangers, 1 mile away), and the new Dallas Cowboys Stadium (1.5 miles away).

Our tastefully-appointed hotel features modern conveniences suited to the savvy business traveler, along with a great location and recreational amenities to please leisure guests. Spacious guestrooms and suites boast a long list of guest amenities, generous work surfaces, luxurious bedding, and complimentary high-speed internet access.

about_text: Residence Inn Bakersfield is your home away from home. With exterior private entrances. Each suite comes with an apartment size kitchen with fridge, stovetop, dishwasher & microwave. Our two bedroom, two bath suites have a full stove/oven. We are pet friendly and the only hotel in Bakersfield with an enclosed dog park where you pet can roam freely. We offer a daily hot breakfast every morning if you do not feel like cooking yourself. Great rates offered for group events and of course our extended long term guest. Also we have some rooms with wood burning fireplaces that can be used during burn season Nov-March. We are one of a kind in at the Residence Inn Bakersfield on Chester Lane.

Make your stay in Lubbock, Texas one to remember when you choose Hilton Garden Inn Lubbock. Our welcoming hotel is conveniently located near Texas Tech University, offering the perfect base whether you're visiting a loved one, catching a sports game or attending graduation. Canyon West Shopping Center is adjacent to us, providing a wealth of enticing shopping, dining and entertainment options. Other must-see local attractions include the Buddy Holly Center, Science Spectrum Museum and South Plains Mall.

Inspired by the local landscape, our modern and sophisticated lobby area includes a stunning feature wall and breathtaking fireplace. Unwind in an inviting and comfortable guest room, featuring home comforts like microwave and mini-refrigerator. Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the hotel.

hotel_name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Irvine - Spectrum
about_text:
The DoubleTree by Hilton Irvine Spectrum is conveniently located in the heart of Orange County's Technology Hub. Only 10 minutes from the John Wayne Orange County Airport (SNA), the hotel is easily accessible from I-5 (Santa Ana Freeway), I-405 (San Diego Freeway) and Hwy 133 (Laguna Freeway). As the gateway to many Orange County attractions, we are a half-mile from the Irvine Spectrum Center and the closest hotel to the new FivePoint Amphitheater. Our hotel is 15 minutes from Laguna Beach, 20 minutes from Disneyland and less than one hour from Los Angeles and San Diego. 

The DoubleTree by Hilton Irvine Spectrum offers 252 guest rooms with many features. All guest rooms feature 50-inch televisions, refrigerator, in-room safes, iron and ironing board, hair dryer, in-room coffeemaker, and internet access.

On-property dining options include 90 Pacifica Restaurant, serving breakfast, lunch and dinner, and 90 Pacifica Wine Bar for casual fare and beverages.

Welcome to SpringHill Suites Phoenix Glendale/Peoria, your Glendale “home away from home.” SpringHill Suites Phoenix Glendale/Peoria aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.
Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV, a kitchenette, and air conditioning, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel.
Springhill Suites Phoenix Glendale/peoria Hotel features a 24 hour front desk, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a pool and free breakfast. If you are driving to Springhill Suites Phoenix Glendale/peoria Hotel, free parking is available.
If you like oyster, Springhill Suites Phoenix Glendale/peoria Hotel is conveniently located near Oscar's Pier 83, which is known for serving up this local favorite.
If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Sahuaro Ranch Park, which is a popular historic site amongst tourists.
SpringHill Suites Phoenix Glendale/Peoria puts the best of Glendale at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

about_text:
stay close to the airport in Amarillo.

Comfort and convenience await you at the Hampton Inn & Suites Amarillo East hotel. Our hotel provides easy access to I-40 and is a short 9 minutes from Amarillo International Airport (AMA). Visit nearby Big Texan Ranch or the Historic Route 66 District for a true taste of Texas. Explore the Texas Air and Space Museum and Panhandle Plains Historical Museum, or take a hike at Palo Duro Canyon State Park. After a long day, retire to your spacious guest room or suite for a peaceful night's rest on our clean and fresh Hampton beds®.

Our modern guest rooms feature free WiFi, an HDTV and plenty of plugs to charge your devices. Upgrade to a suite for extra space, a sofa bed and wet bar. Head to the lobby for free hot breakfast each morning, or grab on of Hampton's On the Run™ Breakfast Bags, available Monday through Friday. Take a relaxing dip in our indoor heated pool or hot tub, or get some exercise in our fitness center.

hotel_name: Candlewood Suites Mobile-Downtown, an IHG Hotel
about_text: Candlewood Suites Mobile Downtown is the only all-suite extended stay hotel in downtown Mobile. Located right in the heart of downtown, our guests enjoy an easy walk to historic neighborhoods, the Dauphin Street Entertainment District, museums and theaters. Enjoy your personal space in an oversized suite complete with a full kitchen to maintain your diet on the road. All the right amenities for an extended stay, including a complimentary 24 hour guest laundry and workout facility. Relax in our garden courtyard with a relaxing atmosphere that includes a seasonal outdoor pool, complimentary BBQ grills, cozy seating areas next to the fire pit, and a covered portico to watch TV. The Candlewood Suites Mobile Downtown is going to be your extended stay hotel of choice when you visit Mobile.

hotel_name: Hampton Inn & Suites Denver Downtown-Convention Center
about_text:
Stay in the heart of downtown Denver at the Hampton Inn and Suites Denver Downtown-Convention Center, conveniently located one half block from the Colorado Convention Center. Whether your travels bring you here for business or pleasure, you will feel like you have arrived when you step into the artistically chic lobby that reflects the local environment and energy.

Amuse yourself with a walk from our contemporary hotel to attractions such as the Denver Center for Performing Arts, 16th Street Mall, Denver Art Museum, and sporting venues such as Coors Field and Ball Arena. Nearby attractions such as Sports Authority Field at Mile High, Denver Aquarium, Denver Zoo, History Colorado, and Denver Museum of Nature and Science are just a short ride away.

From trinkets to treasures, it is all available in nearby shopping at Denver Pavilions, Larimer Square, Tabor Center and the 16th Street Mall.  Downtown Denver has an eclectic mix of dining options.

about_text: Located in the bustling downtown Boston, Massachusetts area, Omni Parker House is an opulent 19th-century landmark hotel situated along the Freedom Trail. Discover high-end New England dining at Parker's Restaurant, where the Boston Cream Pie was invented, a classic cocktail lounge and upscale bar. You'll also find a rooftop ballroom, fitness center, and 19 meeting rooms at our Boston hotel. Stay near Boston's top attractions such as the Theatre District, Fenway Park, Boston Aquarium and TD Garden. The hotel is also near Beacon Hill, Boston Common, Quincy Market and Faneuil Hall Marketplace so you can immerse yourself in the city's rich history and enjoy all that Boston has to offer. Relax in elegant hotel rooms and suites featuring old-world decor, cherry wood furnishings, and flat-screen TVs. Whether you're traveling for business or leisure, let Omni Parker House make your trip extra special with one of our packages.

about_text: The Langham, Boston re-imagines service and tradition as a new American classic hotel following a multimillion dollar renovation. Once the Federal Reserve Bank of Boston, this iconic landmark is a combination of American warmth and comfort. With 312 guestrooms and suites, two new dining destinations, The Langham Club and transformed meeting space, The Langham is a glamorous place to celebrate, just steps away from Boston's best sites and attractions.

about_text:
Situated amid a vibrant and burgeoning downtown, the 600-room Hilton Omaha is directly connected via skybridge to the CHI Health Event Center and Arena. Our hotel is conveniently located between Eppley Airfield and Omaha's growing arts and entertainment district.
 With over 40,000 sq. ft. of versatile meeting space our prime location offers quick access to offices, local dining, and Omaha attractions including the Old Market Entertainment District, Charles Schwab Field Omaha, Henry Doorly Zoo, and the RiverFront Park. Reimagine your stay in one of our recently renovated guest rooms with refined amenities and unique custom designed touches. Other enhancements include illuminated backlit mirrors, sizable desks, a multitude of data ports, and upgraded televisions.
Our Omaha hotel has guests covered. Replenish your mind, body, and spirit in our indoor saltwater pool, relaxing whirlpool, and saunas or stay active in our fitness center outfitted with cardio and strength training equipment.

about_text: Culture lovers, art enthusiasts, serial shoppers and park runners unite at Radisson RED Minneapolis Downtown. Locked in a brotherly bond with its 'Twin City' of St Paul, Minneapolis is an outdoorsy city where nature - be it the looping Mississippi river, or its many parks and lakes - is never far away. A city that effortlessly blends culture, commerce and opportunity. Visit for a day, a weekend, or longer - and it might just become your favorite US City.

about_text: Welcome to Hampton Inn Riverside Downtown. Our brand new, 6-story hotel offers an ideal location in heart of the historic Downtown District, surrounded by the best amenities the Inland Southern California region has to offer. Enjoy close proximity to the Riverside Convention Center, Fox Performing Arts Center, and the Riverside Pedestrian Main Street Mall. We're also just two miles from the University of California Riverside and 15 miles from Ontario International Airport. Make yourself at home in a modern guest room or suite. Each room features our clean and fresh Hampton bed®, an HDTV and free WiFi. Our suites offer extra space to relax, as well as homelike amenities including a sofa, mini-fridge and microwave. Wake up each morning to fresh waffles at Hampton's free hot breakfast. If you're in a hurry, grab a Hampton on the Run® Breakfast Bag, available Monday through Friday, as you head out the door.

about_text:
Welcome to Hampton Inn & Suites Toledo/Westgate, ideally located just one mile from the University of Toledo's Savage Arena, the Glass Bowl Stadium and Franklin Park Mall. A beautiful Art Deco building full of character and charm, our hotel offers choice, clean accommodation close to a host of local attractions and convenient transport links.

Relax in a spacious, bright guest room or suite at our Toledo/Westgate hotel. Tune in to your favorite shows on the flat-screen TV and connect effortlessly to the WiFi provided from the comfort of your bed. Heat snacks in the microwave and store refreshments in the fridge for later. When you need to finish that presentation, be productive using the ergonomic desk and chair you'll find in your room.

Savor a hot breakfast, that's not only delicious but also free. Pick up a snack or drink from our on-site convenience shop when you're in a rush or in need of an energy boost.

about_text:
Traditional southern charm meets modern amenities at Hilton Richmond Downtown. Our downtown Richmond, Virginia hotel is housed in the former Miller and Rhoads department store, an iconic building with over 100 years of history. The restored building spans an entire city block and boasts original features, such as the lobby marble floor, laid in 1883, and high ceilings. 

Enjoy easy access to all that Richmond has to offer including theaters, historical sites, museums, restaurants, and the Greater Richmond Convention Center. Enjoy a complimentary shuttle service within a one mile radius. Convenient location to many businesses, attractions, and the Main Street Station, where Amtrak runs through Richmond numerous times each day. 

Unwind in a comfortable guest room with work space, complimentary WiFi with Hilton Honors membership, a mini refrigerator, and a coffeemaker. For a memorable experience, select a suite located on the corner of the hotel, offering incredible views of the city.

about_text:
Located off I-40, in the Texas panhandle, the friendly Hampton Inn & Suites Amarillo West hotel is close to Amarillo's Medical and Shopping Districts and is just minutes from many popular Amarillo attractions. Explore Palo Duro Canyon State Park on horseback, pick up a unique souvenir on Route 66 or spend the afternoon shopping at Westgate Mall. Let the kids get hands-on with science exhibits at the Don Harrington Discovery Center and visit the iconic Cadillac Ranch.
Unwind in a spacious guest room at this modern Amarillo hotel, where you can check emails at the ergonomic desk with free high-speed internet access or watch HD channels on the LCD TV. Our suites also feature a seating area with sleeper sofa and a wet bar with microwave and mini-refrigerator. Get a head start on your day with Hampton's free hot breakfast, served daily and enjoy free tea and coffee in the hotel lobby, 24-hours a day.

address: 102 South Cottage Hill Road, Carrollton, GA 30117
about_text:
Hampton Inn Carrollton, GA hotel is a 77 room hotel located in the heart of Carrollton's commercial district. Our hotel has a large breakfast area adjacent to the lobby which includes a fireplace for our guests' comfort. We also feature a business center, fitness room, outdoor pool and a meeting room that can accommodate up to 50 people. There are two elevators and four floors in this Hampton Inn Carrollton Georgia hotel. 

We also have two whirlpool suites available that are extra large suites with a wet bar. All rooms at our Carrollton, Georgia hotel have a large desk work area with internet access and electrical and telephone outlets at waist level for convenient plugs-ins. All Hampton Inn Carrollton Georgia hotel rooms have high-speed internet access, irons, ironing boards, hair dryers and in-room coffeemakers.

We love having you here at our Hampton Inn Carrollton, GA hotel in Georgia.

hotel_name: Hilton Stamford Hotel & Executive Meeting Center
about_text:
Daily Resort Charge will be added to the room rate and includes two-hour Ke Ala Hele Makalae bike rental, cultural sunrise ceremony, two bottled waters daily, cooler, beach mat & beach towel rentals, and yoga classes. Embrace the Aloha Spirit at our hotel Hilton Garden Inn Kauai Wailua Bay features a spectacular beachfront location on the east coast of Kauai on Kuhio Highway 56 just five miles from Lihue Airport.

Our hotel is next to the scenic Wailua Bay, where the Wailua River meets the sea. Walk into the inviting, open-air lobby with skylights and feel the calming effects of the Garden Isle. Each guest room, junior suite or cottage, has relaxing ocean or garden views along with comfortable beds and complimentary WiFi. Our charming two-room cottages provide a separate sleeping and living area for added privacy as well as a lanai to enjoy the refreshing Hawaii tradewinds.

about_text: A full-service hotel with 193 guest rooms. We offer your choice of the Garden building with exterior corridor entrances or our Tower Building with interior corridor. Complimentary breakfast buffet is available for all of our registered guests. Join us in the newly remodeled Lido Bar and Grill with over 12 TV screens to watch your favorite sport. UFC fights are shown here as well. Join us for our Sunday brunch beginning every Sunday at 10am until 3pm, with bottomless mimosas. Order from many items off our menu. Come for brunch, and stay for dinner. Meeting and Banquet space is available for up to 350 guests, as well as poolside meeting space. We offer an onsite fitness room as well as use of a full off-site fitness center located only 1 block away. Guest laundry is also available onsite.

about_text: The Quality Inn Kent hotel is a newly remodeled and modern hotel that is conveniently located to service all your travel plans. We are minutes away from the Seattle-Tacoma International Airport and provide a complimentary shuttle service to and from the airport. I-5 and Highway 167 are also close by, which provides easy access to downtown Seattle, Tacoma, and Mount Rainer. You can also check out nearby local attractions, such as the Showare Center, Emerald Downs Horse Track, the Super Mall, and Muckleshoot Casino. Within walking distance of the hotel are a number of local restaurants, as well as the Riverbend Golf Course, and the Bally Total Fitness Center. Quality Inn Kent provides a number of complimentary amenities and services to guests, including a complimentary Hot breakfast, high speed wireless internet access, and free local calls. Guests will enjoy our spacious rooms, each of which includes a refrigerator, data port speaker phone, hairdryer, iron and ironing board, and cable and flat screen TV. Pets are also allowed at the Quality Inn Kent for a small fee ( pets only allowed for pet room. Please check front desk for availability). Come and stay at the Quality Inn Kent hotel. Our friendly staff is waiting to welcome you and make your stay as enjoyable as possible.

about_text: At Hotel Washington, the finest luxury amenities and unrivaled sophistication come to life. Since 1917, Hotel Washington has been at the center of the action, known for its roster of A-list visitors, including prominent politicians, movie stars, and even King of Rock 'n' Roll Elvis Presley. hotel_name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Surprise, an IHG Hotel
about_text: Welcome to the Holiday Inn Express in beautiful Surprise, Arizona, one of the nation's fastest growing cities. The Holiday Inn Express Surprise is located next door to the Surprise Stadium, home of the Texas Rangers and Kansas City Royals Spring Training. Outdoor enthusiasts can enjoy some of Phoenix's top-rated golf courses and miles of hiking & bike trails just minutes from the hotel. The hotel is conveniently located near the State Farm Stadium, home of the Arizona Cardinals, Gila River Arena, home of the Arizona Coyotes and Phoenix International Raceway. The Holiday Inn Express Surprise is a smart choice for corporate travelers visiting Banner Health, the Toyota and Ford Proving Grounds, and Luke Air Force Base. No matter what brings you to Phoenix, Peoria, Glendale or Sun City Arizona, "Stay Smart" at our Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites featuring Simply Smart bedding collection and complimentary Express Start® Breakfast.

about_text:
Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Abilene, Courtyard Abilene Southwest/Abilene Mall South is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its proximity to great restaurants, Courtyard Abilene Southwest/Abilene Mall South makes it easy to enjoy the best of Abilene.
The rooms offer a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease.
Courtyard Abilene features a 24 hour front desk and room service. In addition, as a valued Courtyard By Marriott Abilene Hotel guest, you can enjoy a pool and breakfast that are available on-site. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking.
While in Abilene, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Abilene Marriott, including Joe's Pizza (0.2 mi), Nikos Greek Restaurant (0.2 mi), and Casa Herrera (0.3 mi).
Abilene is also known for some great art galleries, including Amy Graves Ryan Fine Arts Gallery and The Center for Contemporary Arts, which are not too far from Courtyard Abilene.
Whether you’re traveling for business, pleasure or both, Courtyard Abilene Southwest/Abilene Mall South is sure to make your visit to Abilene one worth remembering.

about_text: Welcome to the newest Abilene hotel, the Hilton Garden Inn Abilene, ideally located in the commercial and retail hub of Abilene, Texas. This hotel in Abilene, Texas features 123 rooms, about 3,000 square feet of flexible meeting space, and an expanded fitness center. Each guestroom at the Hilton Garden Inn hotel in Abilene, TX is equipped with a 32" LCD TV with high definition programming, spacious work area, complimentary wired and wireless high-speed Internet, a microwave, refrigerator, coffee maker, iron, ironing board, and hair dryer.

about_text:
Hilton Garden Inn Norman is in central Oklahoma, home of Oklahoma Sooners, the national championship-winning college football team. Experience Sooner Magic with a tour of the University of Oklahoma. Riverwind Casino is only 2 miles away from the hotel.  While visiting Norman tour the Sam Noble Oklahoma Museum of Natural History or Fred Jones Jr. Museum of Art. Have fun with the family outdoors at Little River Zoo or see a show at the Sooner Theater.  
Major nearby corporations include York International, Hitachi Computer Products, ClientLogic, Boise Cascade/Office Maxx, National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration, Sysco Food Services, and Norman Regional Hospital. 
We have supplied a fridge, microwave, coffeemaker, and HDTV in every guest room. Our revolutionary Garden Sleep System is so comfortable, the bed conforms to you, providing pressure-free support for a restorative night's sleep.

hotel_name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Berkeley Marina
about_text:
Located only 20 minutes from Oakland International Airport, the Doubletree by Hilton Berkeley Marina hotel provides breathtaking views of the Bay Area, San Francisco skyline and Golden Gate Bridge.  Walk along the marina or visit popular attractions, including the University of California, Berkeley. Our complimentary shuttle will take you anywhere within a 3 mile radius, including the BART station which provides direct access to explore nearby San Francisco, Oakland, or the surrounding East Bay. Our hotel is located near the University of California Berkeley campus, including the Berkeley Botanic Gardens and Lawrence Berkeley National Labs. Our location also offers travelers access to beaches, Sonoma and Napa wine country, golfing at Tilden Park, or hiking.

After a long day of sightseeing in the Bay area or business meetings, relax in your spacious guest room which feature either a balcony or patio.

hotel_name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Berkeley, an IHG Hotel
about_text: Welcome to the Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Berkeley! We are located on University Avenue within walking distance of Downtown Berkeley and 1.7 Miles from Central UC Berkeley Campus. Enjoy performances & concerts at the Berkeley Greek Theater. Visit the Lawrence Hall of Science Center including the Idea Lab, NanoZone, and Real Astronomy Experience. Golden Gate Fields is where the Bay comes to play, offering live thoroughbred horse racing in a spectacular setting, just 2 short miles away. The University of California Botanical Garden features over 12,000 different kinds of plants from around the world on 34 acres. If you love chocolate as much as we do, don't miss touring Scharffen Berger Chocolate Makers, producers of the highest quality chocolate using vintage European equipment right here in Berkeley. For history buffs, don't miss the USS Hornet in Alameda. It s a one-of-a-kind experience you won t want to miss! Catch a Cal Golden Bears Game at Memorial Stadium. We are the most comfortable and convenient hotel headquarters to catch all the action! When it's time to relax, return to your spacious room at the Holiday Inn Express Berkeley Hotel. Stay in touch while away from home with our complimentary high-speed Internet service. Get your last-minute presentation done in our Business Center. Stay healthy and fit in our Fitness Center. We also offer complimentary hot breakfast and free on-site parking. We look forward to seeing you soon!

address: 100 Conference Center Dr, East Peoria, IL 61611-9569
about_text:
Located on the riverfront of the Illinois River. Very close to Caterpillar World Headquarters, Bradley University, EastSide Centre, Peoria Civic Center, and within walking distance to many restaurants and shopping venues.

The hotel features 226 two room suites with a daily cook to order breakfast and nightly manager's reception. Each suites is equipped with a microwave, refrigerator, coffee maker, safe, hair dryer, iron, ironing board, two televisions and large working desks. 

The hotel has an indoor pool, business and fitness center, Riverside Cafe, restaurant serving lunch and dinner, lounge, and a conference center with 30,000 square feet of meeting space.

about_text:
If you’re looking for a hotel in Provo, look no further than Residence Inn Provo South University.
Nearby landmarks such as Brigham Young University (2.4 mi) and Lavell Edwards stadium (2.7 mi) make Residence Inn Provo South University a great place to stay when visiting Provo.
Guest rooms offer amenities such as a kitchenette, a refrigerator, and air conditioning, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel.
The property also features a pool and free breakfast to make your visit even more pleasant. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking.
If you’re looking for a Mexican restaurant, consider a visit to Black Sheep Cafe, Brassas Mexican Grill, or Costa Vida Fresh Mexican Grill, which are all conveniently located a short distance from Residence Inn Provo South University.
Provo is also known for some great science museums, including Monte L. Bean Life Science Museum, BYU Museum of Paleontology, and BYU Earth Science Museum, which are not too far from Residence Inn Provo South University.
The staff at Residence Inn Provo South University looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

about_text: Located off I-15 for easy access, we are ideal for weddings and family reunions, business groups & athletic teams. Only 5 minutes away from Brigham Young University and Utah Valley University. Seven Peaks year round ice arena and summer water park are only 2 miles away. Want some outdoor fun? Sundance Resort is just a 13 mile drive up Provo Canyon. You'll also enjoy seeing Bridal Veil Falls and the Provo River. Who wants to shop? We're across the street from Provo Towne Centre Mall. We are only 5 miles away from most area athletic events and conferences. Complimentary WiFi high-speed Internet throughout the hotel. Always fresh and clean rooms, exceptionally comfortable beds. We offer daily a complimentary deluxe hot breakfast that includes: freshly brewed coffee, hot waffles, cereals, fresh fruit, and much more. At the Fairfield Inn in Provo, you're our #1 priority. We promise you'll be satisfied or we'll make it right. That's our commitment to you.

about_text:
The Hampton Inn Columbia hotel has received the Hampton Inn's Circle of Excellence Award. Our hotel is currently ranked #15 out of all Hampton Inns nationwide!

The Hampton Inn I-70 Columbia hotel is conveniently located at Exit 128A, off Missouri Interstate 70 at the intersection of Highway 63, and is central to everything Columbia has to offer. The University of Missouri, downtown Columbia, Columbia Regional Airport, and Columbia Regional Hospital are all just minutes from the hotel. Other area attractions near our Columbia I-70 Hampton Inn include the Boone County Fairgrounds, Columbia Mall, Finger Lakes State Park, art galleries, museums and nature and fitness trails. Restaurants within walking distance of this Missouri hotel include Cracker Barrel, Golden Corral, Burger King, KFC, Pizza Hut, Taco Bell, China Garden, Ski Hi Bar & Grill and McDonald's.

about_text:
Located in the heart of Arvada, CO, Hilton Garden Inn Arvada Denver is one block from the city's famed Olde Town District. Just off of I-70, the hotel is convenient to downtown Denver, just 15 minutes away. The Light Rail System is also nearby, offering easy access to the airport, area businesses, the Colorado Convention Center, Downtown Denver and much more.

Enjoy thoughtful amenities at our Arvada, CO hotel, including complimentary WiFi, a microwave, mini-fridge, and coffeemaker in every room. Recline on the comfortable Suite Dreams by Serta bed for a restful night's sleep. Upgrade your room to enjoy extra space and amenities plus views of the Rocky Mountains.

Enjoy American Classics for breakfast and dinner at our on-site restaurant. You'll also find restaurants within walking distance of the hotel. Stay fit with an invigorating workout in the fitness center or swim in the indoor saline pool.

about_text: Step back in time at Hotel Colorado. Enjoy our legendary service, modern amenities, and newly renovated rooms as you explore the beauty of our corner of the majestic Rocky Mountains. You'll be delighted by our fine dining options, full-service amenities, and proximity to world-class hot springs, skiing, hiking, and whitewater rafting. The hotel is conveniently located off of I-70 in Glenwood Springs, directly between Aspen and Vail, 2.5 hours west of Denver or 1 hour east of Grand Junction. Whether you're visiting to experience one of Colorado's epic mountain adventures, relax and rejuvenate in our town's healing hot springs, or escape from the hustle and bustle of daily life, we can't wait to welcome you. Come be part of our historic guest list that includes the likes of the "Unsinkable" Molly Brown and Teddy Roosevelt while you create memories you'll cherish for a lifetime. Come experience why we've been a Colorado icon for more than 130 years - your escape awaits in Glenwood Springs.

address: 2850 S Circle Dr, Colorado Springs, CO 80906-4101
about_text: At Soul Community Planet (SCP) Colorado Springs, every stay does good. Good for the self, good for others, good for the planet. SCP Colorado Springs is a modern, eco-friendly property with a state-of-the-art fitness facility (SCP Fit), creative co-working space (SCP Commons) and the Provisions Market, stocked with locally-sourced food and beverage products. SCP offers a wealth of wellness opportunities and aims to make the world a better place by serving those who value personal wellness, social good and the environment. We promise to provide our guests with good clean accommodations at a fair price. We back up this promise through our innovative Fair Trade Pricing program, letting guests determine the price they pay at check-out based on the quality of their experience. At SCP Colorado Springs, every stay does good.

address: 8110 N Academy Blvd, Colorado Springs, CO 80920-3904
about_text: Welcome to The Academy Hotel Colorado Springs! Our Family owned and operated full service hotel is nestled around the Colorado Rocky Mountains is conveniently located off I-25 near the U.S. Air Force Academy. The Academy Hotel consistently offers unbeatable value, amazing amenities and exceptional service. Lodging at our hotel provides leisure and business travelers with a wide variety of famous Colorado Springs attractions such as the historic Manitou Cliff Dwellings, Garden of The Gods, Cave of The Winds, Royal Gorge, the Cog Rail Way and more! Guests marvel about The Academy Hotel's luxurious atrium filled with majestic fountains and lush greenery, a warm and inviting fireside lounge, indoor pool, sun deck, fitness center, business center, children's arcade and onsite dining at the Falcon's Bar & Grill - with delicious American Cuisine daily specials and happy hour from 3:00 p.M.-6:00 P.M.Wake each morning to a complimentary hot breakfast with waffle and made to order omelet bar!

about_text: At the Best Western Plus Beach View Lodge Carlsbad you're sure to find that little something extra. With our modern amenities and thoughtful design, the Best Western Plus Beach View Lodge will stand out among other hotels in Carlsbad, CA. For the business traveler, a spacious work desk and free internet access are included in all our guest rooms to ensure you don't miss a beat while you're away from the office. For extended stays, each room provides a convenient in-room mini fridge that is ideal for drinks and snacks. We also have an in-house fitness room, so you can keep up your workout routine while you're on the road. As always, the Best Western Plus Beach View Lodge will provide you with the superior customer service that you are used to at Best Western® Hotels & Resorts.

about_text: Ideally positioned 15 minutes from both Denver and Boulder, The Westin Westminster provides convenient access to the 16th Street Mall and Pearl Street Mall, as well as abundant outdoor recreation afforded by the Rocky Mountains. The 1st Bank Center is located just two miles away. With more than 76,000 square-feet of meeting space including six distinct outdoor event areas, the stage is set for inspired events. Rejuvenate at the WestinWORKOUT® Fitness Studio and spa room or in the indoor heated pool. Kachina Southwestern Grill invites guests to indulge.Majestic Rocky Mountain and park views await in each of our 370 guest rooms. Find restorative sleep in a Westin Heavenly® Bed and refresh in our Heavenly® Bath with signature Westin bath amenities. High Speed Internet Access and iHome bluetooth sound systems keep you connected.

hotel_name: Staybridge Suites Rochester - Commerce Dr NW, an IHG Hotel
about_text:
This hotel's property in the Rochester, MN area is conveniently located off Highway 52 with easy access to Highway 63, Highway 14 and I-90; delivering travelers the perfect combination of comfort and convenience. Spacious suites are equipped with amenities designed to enhance your business trip or vacation. These amenities paired with outstanding customer service make you feel at home at the Staybridge Suites Rochester hotel.

The hotel's easy access to Rochester International Airport (RST) and Minneapolis Airport (MSP) ensures a hassle-free stay for all guests. A speedy commute to Mayo Clinic, St Mary's Hospital, Methodist Hospital, and IBM, is certain, too. With free wired and wireless HSIA, a 24-hour business center. We are also a pet friendly hotel so you can bring your fur-buddies with you!

Our guests can enjoy convenient access to top-notch shopping in Rochester, as the hotel is located near Apache Mall, Galleria University Square, and Downtown Rochester.

about_text: Newly reimagined on America’s no. 1 beach, our eco-and-family-friendly waterfront hotel inspired by Winter the dolphin, star of 'Dolphin Tale,' offers a wholesome, whimsical ambiance and interactive and educational marine-life experience unlike any other thanks to our unique partnership with Clearwater Marine Aquarium, Winter’s home sweet home. Conveniently located on the beautiful powder-white sands of Clearwater Beach, Winter the Dolphin’s Beach Club provides a tropical retreat the whole family will enjoy. Relax poolside on our sundeck and join friends for a bite to eat and drink at our two on-site restaurants. Buy your aquarium tickets, merchandise, and more at the front desk. Enjoy an exclusive VIP aquarium experience meeting Winter and friends - rescued and rehabilitated marine life, including otters, pelicans, and more.

about_text:
Welcome to the DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Billings. A towering landmark in downtown Billings since 1980, our hotel is a quick walk to corporate offices, government buildings, and local restaurants. Rocky Mountain College and Montana State University Billings are both within a 10-minute drive, and family-friendly attractions like ZooMontana and The Reef Indoor Water Park are just 15 minutes away. For your convenience, the hotel offers a complimentary shuttle to BIL Airport every 30 minutes.

Grab a warm DoubleTree Chocolate Chip Cookie at check-in and settle into a guest room with complimentary WiFi, plush bedding, a 50-inch HDTV, and ergonomic workspace. Here a few days? Stretch out in a suite with a living area and private bedroom. Pets are always welcome.

Enjoy unique hotel dining in Billings, MT during your stay. Our rooftop restaurant Montana Sky serves a locally inspired menu along with gorgeous views from 20 floors up. Stop by Montana's Lounge to have a beer and shoot pool.

about_text:
Daily Mandatory Charge includes: TBID Fee - Tourism Business Improvement District.

The Hampton Inn Billings hotel is located next to I-90 at Exit 447, 3.5 miles from downtown Billings, Montana. Area attractions include golf courses, shopping malls, museums, state parks and the zoo. Fiddlers Green is our on-site restaurant.  Within 1.2 miles, our hotel guests can dine at McDonald's, Burger King or Dairy Queen. 

We feature 122 rooms (double queen, king standard, king study rooms and suites), a complimentary extended breakfast bar, complimentary parking, exercise gym, winter plug-ins, business center, whirlpool and indoor pool, guest laundromat, safe deposit box and complimentary airport shuttle service.

Whether traveling to Montana for business or pleasure, our Hampton Inn guests enjoy room amenities which include coffee maker, complimentary newspaper, complimentary local calls and TV with cable.

Our generously sized rooms and well-crafted common areas let you spread out in, get work done, and let go when it's time. Sonesta Select helps make your time away from home personal, and uniquely you.

address: 28 E 63rd St, New York City, NY 10065-8088
ranking: #66 of 543 hotels in New York City
about_text: A landmark luxury hotel in the heart of Manhattan, The Lowell rises 17-floors above an iconic residential neighborhood, and is steps away from the celebrated fashion houses of Madison and Fifth Avenues and the vast oasis of Central Park. The Lowell continues to be the most highly ranked hotel in New York City. The hotel was awarded the designation as the #1 Hotel in NYC from 2019 Travel + Leisure World’s Best Awards for the second year in a row, along with being recognized in the Condé Nast Traveler Readers’ Choice Awards as the #1 Hotel in NYC. The Lowell has been named the #1 Best Hotel in New York, the #1 Best Hotel in New York City and ranked #12 of the 50 Best Hotels in the USA 2020 by U.S. News & World Report in their annual Best Hotels rankings. Majorelle was bestowed the #1 spot for restaurant décor from Zagat’s New York City Restaurant Guide. Established in 1927, The Lowell reflects the timeless elegance and soul of the Upper East Side. The warmth of a familiar smile, attention to detail and discreet service welcome discerning guests as they move through chic classical spaces. Wood-burning fireplaces—a rare find in New York—landscaped terraces with sweeping city views are enjoyed in many of the sun-filled rooms and suites fashioned in the hotel’s distinctive style with the refined comforts of a private apartment. Legendary restaurateur Charles Masson oversees the property’s newest dining additions where guests come to escape the bustle of the city over seasonal cuisine at Majorelle and linger over the perfect martini at Jacques Bar. The Club Room at The Lowell offers a sophisticated setting to unwind, while the reimagined Pembroke Room upholds tradition with its beloved breakfast and afternoon tea.

about_text:
Relax at the Hampton Inn & Suites Murrieta Temecula hotel, just minutes from Temecula Wine Country and Murrieta Hot Springs. As a Hampton Forever Young hotel, you'll find rooms ready to meet your needs with an increased number of electrical outlets to charge devices, places to socialize within the hotel and strong WiFi throughout, including the pool area.

Choose from a spacious standard room or suite with sofa bed and separate living area. Use the large workstation in each room to be productive and stay connected to the office and to family. Watch your favorite shows on the 37-inch HDTV. Rest on the clean and fresh Hampton bed™. Take advantage of the microwave, mini-refrigerator and free coffee and tea in each room.

Start your day with our free hot breakfast serving waffles, eggs and meat choices as well as cereals, fruit and other morning favorites. Swim some laps in the heated outdoor pool and unwind in the spa. Maintain your workout routine in the fitness center.

hotel_name: Comfort Inn & Suites Murrieta Temecula Wine Country
about_text: Free Wi-Fi, a complimentary hot-breakfast buffet, and a perch that's within striking distance of both ocean and mountains are the perks that attract our guests to the recently renovated Comfort Inn & Suites Murrieta Temecula Wine Country. The non-smoking, three-story Comfort Inn has 66 newly updated rooms that all feature free Wi-Fi, cable TV, coffeemakers, microwaves and mini-fridges. Mornings start with a free hot breakfast buffet of eggs, bacon, cereal and fruits. Morning newspapers are free as well. Leisure guests make time for a dip in the indoor pool, soak in the hot tub and workout in the exercise room. Corporate guests, meanwhile, take advantage of the copy and fax facilities. There's also a guest laundry on-site. Parking is free. The Comfort Inn is off I-15, two blocks from downtown Murrieta. Pechanga and Pala casinos are within 30 minutes of the hotel. Lake Elsinore is 15 minutes away, and San Diego is just over an hour away. Disneyland can be reached within 90 minutes.

hotel_name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Murrieta - Temecula
about_text: Welcome to the only IHG Hotel in Murrieta Holiday Inn Express & Suites in Murrieta-Temecula We are conveniently located in the heart of Murrieta situated between Murrieta Hot Springs Road, I-15 and the I-215 freeways and 45 miles away from the Ontario International Airport. Our hotel is located in the Murrieta Commons Area with access to retail and dining within walking distance. We are neighbors to the Murrieta Mesa High School and have over 70 restaurants around our hotel. Our hotel is just minutes away from major valley attractions such as Santa Rosa Plateau, Harveston Lake Park, Los Alamos Hills Sports Park, Temecula Valley Wine Country, Pechanga Resort Casino, and many more. Our business travelers find our hotel convenient to our nearby area businesses and corporate offices which are all within 10 miles of our hotel. We also have local hospitals nearby such as the Loma Linda Medical Center and Kaiser Permanente Murrieta.

address: 2436 Mahogany Way I-4 & Somersville Rd/Auto Ctr, Antioch, CA 94509-2966
about_text: Located just 45 minutes from downtown San Francisco, our Comfort Inn® hotel puts you in a prime spot for fun. Our property is close to outdoor recreation in the Dow Wetlands Preserve, Loma Regional Park and Antioch Dunes National Wildlife Refuge. Or, take the family for fun-filled day at the Antioch Water Park. Dow Chemical and Los Medanos College are also nearby. Our hotel is just 3 miles from the Black Diamond Mines Regional Preserve, a 6,096-acre park located on the grounds of former coal and sand mines dating back to the mid 19th century. Today, the park is a perfect spot for hiking. If you're a fan of live entertainment, you'll love that our Antioch hotel is just 2 miles from El Campanil Theatre. The venue hosts a variety of acts, including tribute bands, comedy shows and theater performances. Back at our hotel, you'll find convenient amenities such as a refrigerator and microwave in each room. Free breakfast is available each morning, and we look forward to meeting you at our evening manager's reception. Also take some time to enjoy a swim in our seasonal outdoor pool. Traveling with a large group? We have plenty of space for bus parking.

about_text: Courtyard by Marriott Norwalk is located in the heart of the business district in Norwalk, Connecticut and is near White Plains Airport (HPN) and the Metro North-South Norwalk train station. Our comfortable guest rooms and suites feature luxury bedding, thick mattresses and inviting spaces for work or relaxation. Our spacious, open lobby offers comfy lounge areas with televisions, and we offer free WiFi throughout the hotel so you'll never feel tied to your room. Enjoy easy access to the latest news, weather and airport conditions via our interactive lobby GoBoard. Our on-site Bistro provides guests with healthy food and beverage offerings for breakfast and dinner as well as Starbucks beverages and an evening bar with beer, wine and cocktails. Courtyard by Marriott Norwalk is just minutes to the Maritime Aquarium and historic SoNo, and less than an hour away from NYC!

about_text: A jewel in Marina Bay with 512 fully refurbished guestrooms and suites, Conrad Centennial Singapore is one of the city’s most esteemed addresses for business and leisure travellers. Well connected, the hotel is a 20 minute drive from Changi International Airport and a 3 minute walk to the Promenade MRT station. Savour tantalising cuisines at our award-winning restaurants. From sumptuous International buffets at Oscar’s to exquisite Cantonese cuisine at Golden Peony, as well as indulgent afternoon tea and delicious cocktails at our opulent Lobby Lounge, you will be spoilt for choice. For those with a sweet tooth, dainty cakes with gourmet coffee and tea at The Terrace are not to be missed. The hotel is also located in close proximity to six shopping malls with over 1,000 shops and 400 restaurants; world-class attractions such as Gardens by the Bay, the Singapore Flyer, the National Gallery Singapore and museums.

hotel_name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Denver South Centennial Airport
about_text:
With our convenient location and all-suite amenities, Home2 Suites by Hilton Denver South Centennial Airport is the perfect home base for your business or leisure trip. We are located next to Centennial Airport with quick access to I-25. Inverness Business Park and Denver Tech Center are less than 10 minutes away, as well as plenty of shopping, dining and attractions.

Stay for a night, a week, a month or more - our modern, spacious suites are equipped for a comfortable stay. Relax on the sofa and watch TV, cook a meal in the kitchen and sleep well in the clean, crisp bed. Moveable furniture, an ergonomic work space and free WiFi help you get work done. Bring along your pet, too: our hotel is pet friendly and just down the road from a huge off-leash dog park.

Free breakfast is available each morning, with delicious classics like Belgian waffles, fresh fruit, eggs and oatmeal.

address: 2931 W Marine View Dr, Everett, WA 98201-3927
about_text:
Boasting a convenient downtown location and wonderful views of the Olympic Peninsula and Puget Sound, Hampton Inn Seattle/Everett is only minutes from Providence Medical Center, Naval Station Everett and Boeing Field. Discover lots of Seattle attractions just 30 minutes' drive from our hotel in Everett, WA. Visit Seattle Aquarium, take a whale watching tour or ride to the top of the Space Needle for panoramic city views. Explore Pike Place Market - the oldest continually operating farmers' market in the US and home to the original Starbucks coffee shop.  

Unwind in a bright and modern guest room or suite at this hotel in downtown Everett, WA: equipped with a microwave, refrigerator and coffee maker. Keep in touch with free WiFi at the large desk or work comfortably with the handy lap desk. Watch movies on the flat-screen TV and sleep soundly in the clean and fresh Hampton bed®. Join us each morning for Hampton's free hot breakfast buffet, featuring our famous waffles.

about_text: Welcome Home. Your host is Amara at the newly reinvented Hotel Amarano Burbank-Hollywood, the only 4-star luxury boutique hotel in Burbank. The hotel celebrates the essence of Southern California, sunny views from the bright lights of Hollywood, and the warm California sun. The newly renovated hotel is a place filled with the spirit of Hollywood that welcome you as you are. Amara has mastered the guest experience. Whether it is having a cocktail at FYC Kitchen & Bar or simply retreating by the pool to recharge in anonymity. Amara wants her guests to relax and unwind. Cleanliness protocols for COVID-19 are in place for the safety of our guests. The hotel has social distancing and face mask mandates in place. The reinvented guest rooms are well appointed with a dash of glamour from wall-to-wall. Experience comfort and luxury by indulging in one of Amara’s Guest Bedrooms or Hollywood Themed rooms. Inspired by Amara’s taste for the finer things in life, experience upgraded amenities such as Gilchrist & Soames bath and body products, fine linens, Lavazza coffee and espresso, a Sealy Plush Pillowtop Mattress, Robes available, Microwave in many rooms, along with a spacious work desk, in room safe, complimentary WIFI, and a 55” HDTV equipped with Beyond TV Entertainment. Amara wants you to experience a kind retreat.

about_text: Experience a relaxed modern space that feels authentically local. The Hilton Garden Inn Boulder greets you with inviting social spaces, upscale amenities, a locally passionate staff, and attentive service while our central location puts you minutes from Boulder’s favorite outdoor activities. Take a short walk down to Boulder Creek Path, jump on a bike and head to a Flatirons trailhead, or take in mountain vistas on a nearby hike. After your adventure, step into spacious rooms with a 49-inch HDTV, hand-painted local artwork, microwave, mini-refrigerator and a Keurig coffee maker. Count on our complimentary WiFi, 24/7 business center and spacious meeting rooms with catering available for all your business needs.

about_text:
Welcome to the Hampton Inn & Suites Davenport. We are the newest addition to the growing business district. Our location meets the needs of almost every traveler whether it is business or leisure.

Relax in one of our spacious rooms with complimentary wireless High Speed Internet Access, large comfortable beds, business size desk, cable TV and LCD television. Relax by our indoor pool or hot tub. Wake up and enjoy our complimentary On the House hot breakfast. 

If you are here on business we are centrally located to many area companies such as Alcoa, John Deere Headquarters, Rock Island Arsenal, Cordova Nuclear Plant, Kraft Foods, Tyson Foods, Purina, Mid American Energy, Genesis Medical, Trinity Hospital, Palmer College, Augustana and St Ambrose.

We are also close to local attractions such as John Deere Pavilion, The TaxSlayer Center, River Center, TPC at Deere Run, Casinos, Rock Island Arsenal Museum, Figge Art Museum and Quad Cities Botanical Center.

about_text: Celebrated by World Travel Awards as Oceania's Leading Hotel 2019 and by Luxury Travel Guide as Luxury City Hotel of the Year, book your next stay at InterContinental Melbourne The Rialto, a timeless five star luxury Melbourne hotel offering a juxtaposition of Melbourne’s old and new. InterContinental Melbourne The Rialto is perfectly located on prestigious Collins Street in Melbourne and offers 253 guest rooms and suites. The hotel’s architecture is a distinctive blend of heritage and contemporary. Be transported from the 1890s of the neo-Gothic façade into the dramatic lobby that overlooks the soaring glass atrium. Built in 1891, the hotel began as two separate buildings that housed the famous Melbourne wool stores, commercial and government offices and residences. Step outside to experience Melbourne’s best luxury shopping and renowned food scene or follow the aroma for the perfect cup of coffee. Wind your way through the hidden laneways or hop on the free city tram and explore Australia’s arts and sports capital. Experience award-winning bars and restaurants in a city famous for its food with Alluvial, Bluestone Wine Lounge and Market Lane Bar. Enjoy a drink in our bars or head next door to the buzzing Rialto precinct and experience the array of cafes, bars and celebrity restaurants. Club InterContinental is available exclusively for guests staying in Club InterContinental rooms and suites. A place of sanctuary after a busy day exploring Melbourne, working, or simply a quiet place to unwind. With private access on level 4 overlooking Collins Street, every detail of your Club journey is enhanced through personalised and thoughtful touches. This exclusive experience features private check in and check out, breakfast, all day refreshments, afternoon tea and evening canapes. For exceptional experiences and details that truly delight, there is only Club InterContinental. Choose to live the #InterContinentalLife

Our Cypress Ballroom with beautiful views is an ideal space for weddings and corporate events.

about_text:
Stay connected and comfortable at Home2 Suites by Hilton Lakeland. Set among shops, restaurants and entertainment at Lakeside Village, our modern, all-suites hotel provides a convenient location for your business or leisure trip. Attractions such as Publix Field and the RP Funding Center are a short drive away in downtown Lakeland, and easy access to Polk Parkway and I-4 makes travel a breeze.
Perfect for an extended stay, each of our stylish and spacious suites features an in-suite kitchen, sofa bed, 42-inch HDTV and moveable furniture. Stay productive with the desk and ergonomic chair, or relax on the comfortable bed. Pets are always welcome, too.
Enjoy free breakfast favorites such as eggs, cereal, oatmeal and fresh fruit every morning at our Inspired Table™, as well as Coffee2 Tea beverage service any time. Host a small meeting in our boardroom and take advantage of free printing and WiFi.

about_text:
The Hampton Inn and Suites Lakeland-South Polk Parkway Florida hotel is nestled inside the Lakeside Shopping Village. This Lakeland-South Polk Parkway Florida Hampton Inn and Suites is centrally located just off the Polk Parkway, Exit 27 from I-4, between Tampa and Orlando. Also the Hampton Inn and Suites Lakeland-South Polk Parkway hotel is only moments away from Sun N Fun, Lakeland Linder Regional Airport, Joker Marchant Stadium, and less than 40 minutes to a lot of the major Orlando attractions and so much more! 

The Hampton Inn and Suites Lakeland-South Polk Parkway Florida hotel has 117 luxurious appointed rooms offer complimentary high-speed internet access, 24-hour business center and fax service. All of our guest rooms feature the Hampton Inn and Suites signature Cloud 9 bedding for a great nights rest, granite counter top vanities, a large work desk with convenient outlets, flat panel TV's, decorative touches in each room, complimentary local phone calls, personalized voicema

about_text:
The Hilton Garden Inn Erie Pennsylvania hotel is conveniently located just off exit 24 of Pennsylvania Interstate 90, in the heart of the Peach Street business district and only 10 minutes from downtown Erie and the Bayfront area. Presque Isle Downs Casino and Thoroughbred Racing and the incomparable Presque Isle State Park are also within easy reach. This beautiful new Hilton Garden Inn hotel adjoins the Ambassador Center, a banquet and conference facility with space for up to 1000 guests. The Hilton Garden Inn Erie Pennsylvania hotel is within a half mile of over 30 restaurants, the Millcreek Mall and Splash Lagoon Indoor Waterpark. Erie Airport is only 8 miles away and is serviced by our complimentary area shuttle. 

Nearby corporations to Hilton Garden Inn Erie Pennsylvania hotel include GE, Erie Insurance, Lord Corporation, St. Vincent Hospital and Milcreek Community Hospital.

about_text:
Discover our welcoming Homewood Suites by Hilton Tyler hotel. Convenient to the Medical District and downtown, this chic hotel provides unique amenities and services such as executive boardroom suites, a sports court and grocery shopping. Count on us to share local tips as you explore our town's famous Rose Garden, Azalea Trail and Goodman-LeGrand Museum.

We offer a hot full breakfast each morning and an evening social* Monday - Thursday. You also can enjoy food from your kitchen or cooked on the barbeque grills.

If you're traveling on business, check out our executive boardroom suites. Each spacious suite features separate living and sleeping areas, two TVs, free internet access and a fully equipped kitchen - including all the utensils. Accessible suites, designed for wheelchair entry, have visual and audio communication devices.

Plan your event in Tyler, Texas in our 600 sq. ft. meeting space, with A/V and catering options.

about_text:
Texas-sized hospitality awaits you at the Hilton Garden Inn Tyler hotel. Our new 100% smoke-free hotel, complete with sleek contemporary design and state-of-the-art features, will be your home away from home. Conveniently located in South Tyler's premier business district, the hotel offers well appointed rooms and a limited number of Suites to satisfy even the most discriminating of travelers. All rooms feature the exclusive Garden Sleep System to help you have a more peaceful nights rest and 37-inch plat panel LCD televisions.

The full service Great American Grill serves breakfast, lunch and dinner daily, and also prepares evening room service. Our full service meeting facility, with over 3,000 square feet of flexible meeting space is perfect for your next business meeting, luncheon, party or wedding reception.

hotel_name: DoubleTree by Hilton Pleasant Prairie Kenosha
about_text: Situated between Milwaukee and Chicago is DoubleTree by Hilton Pleasant Prairie Kenosha, just off I-94. Travel easily to various corporate headquarters from our hotel including Uline, Snap-On and Jockey as well as Lakeview Business Park. Take the complimentary hotel shuttle within 5 miles of the hotel. On-site dining is available at The Chancery and we also offer room service. Get work done in the business center, work out in the 24-hour fitness center or relax in the heated indoor pool and whirlpool. During your stay, keep in touch with complimentary WiFi. Choose from one king, one double, or two queen beds in a standard room or opt for more space in a suite with a separate living area and additional sofa bed.

about_text:
the gateway to the Sierra Nevada beckons...
welcome to the Hampton Inn & Suites-Clovis, CA 

Nestled in the shadow of the Sierra Nevada, our Hampton Inn & Suites Clovis hotel is minutes from downtown Fresno and the best attractions in the San Joaquin Valley. Here you can find yourself hiking a snow-topped peak, browsing charming antique shops, or canoeing a tranquil river moments after you step outside our hotel.

If you're looking for a convenient Clovis, CA hotel, look no further. Our hotel is less than three miles away from both Fresno Yosemite International Airport and Fresno State University. And we're a great jumping off point for Yosemite National Park. If you're visiting for business, we're close to Aramark, Pelco by Schneider Electric, PG&E, Grundfos Pumps, iLove2Create, and other key corporations. When you visit our Clovis hotel, you can do it all.

So head our way, to a place where Sierra Nevada adventures are never far away.

hotel_name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Roanoke - Civic Center , an IHG hotel
about_text: Welcome to the brand new Holiday Inn Express® Roanoke - Civic Center If you're looking for Star City's best hotel, look no further! Our 100% smoke free hotel is the closest hotel to the Roanoke Civic Center (Berglund Center), downtown Roanoke, and important area businesses and attractions. Our Roanoke, VA hotel's location is ideal for business travelers with meetings in downtown Roanoke and the surrounding area. The Roanoke Civic Center (Berglund Center) is one block from our front door and the Roanoke Regional Airport (ROA) is five miles. Coca-Cola and Norfolk Southern are nearby. We have free Wi-Fi access throughout the hotel, and our 24-hr Business Center offers copy, fax and print services to help you prepare for meetings in Roanoke, VA. Lodging at our smoke free downtown Roanoke hotel provides leisure guests with easy access to nearby museums, including the new Taubman Museum of Art, Center in the Square and the Science Museum of Western Virginia. Nearby Mill Mountain is home to the Discovery Center Nature Center, the Mill Mountain Zoo and the Roanoke Star, the largest man-made star in the world. Enjoy our Roanoke hotel perks from our free breakfast buffet to 24-hour coffee in our lobby. You can relax at our indoor pool or workout at our on-site fitness facility. See why we're the best choice among downtown Roanoke, VA hotels!
