address: 424 E Palm Canyon Dr, Palm Springs, Greater Palm Springs, CA 92264-8806
about_text: Welcome to the Hotel California in Palm Springs! Nestled along the base of the San Jacinto Mountains, in the Southern California desert of Palm Springs, the Hotel California is an ideal adults only getaway for guests looking to relax and enjoy the sunshine. Our classic California Spanish Mission hotel provides just the right amount of rustic charm and romance. Fourteen comfortable rooms surround a sparkling pool and spa amid a lush courtyard where banana palm trees and birds of paradise sway in the breeze complimenting spectacular mountains views!!

about_text:
Just minutes from Fort Sill, Comanche County Memorial Hospital and Cameron University, the Hilton Garden Inn Lawton-Fort Sill, OK hotel boasts a fantastic location in the heart of Lawton - Fort Sill. Numerous businesses, shopping outlets, restaurants and entertainment options can be easily reached from our modern Lawton, OK hotel. Popular attractions nearby include Central Mall, the Convention Center, the Museum of the Great Plains and Wichita Mountains Wildlife Refuge and Holy City. Enjoy connectivity to the airport with our complimentary shuttle service. Feel at home in a stylish guest room, featuring a comfortable bed, a microwave and mini-refrigerator, an HDTV, a large, ergonomic desk and complimentary WiFi. Upgrade to a spacious suite for a separate living area with a pull-out sofa bed.

Keep fit during your stay at this hotel near Fort Sill, OK, in the outdoor swimming pool or the complimentary 24-hour fitness center.

hotel_name: DoubleTree by Hilton Greeley at Lincoln Park
about_text:
Our DoubleTree by Hilton Greeley at Lincoln Park hotel is located next to the Union Colony Civic Center. With amenities designed for the savvy business traveler, we are the premier location for meetings and events in the Colorado Rockies. From ranch-based guest room wall murals to themed suites reflecting the Colorado community, each space within our hotel will immerse the guest in a uniquely Colorado experience.  

Unwind in a spacious guest room with WiFi access, a 50-inch HDTV, coffeemaker and evening room service. Opt for a suite with more space, premium bathroom amenities and a king-sized bed: several offer a connected boardroom and extended seating areas. Our rooms offer a mini-refrigerator, iron and ironing board and workstation.   Plan your next conference in our Centennial Ballroom for up to 800 people or in the smaller University of Northern Colorado Meeting Space for 50.

about_text:
Located within walking distance of shopping, fast food and fine dining, Homewood Suites by Hilton Greeley is an extended stay hotel that has easy access to all major destinations in the city. Explore the popular Colorado Model Railroad Museum 5 miles away, or learn more about the history of the area at the Greeley History Museum and Centennial Village. Visit students or attend events at the University of Northern Colorado. Tour one of the brewing companies in the area.

Settle into an inviting studio or one-bedroom suite, and feel at home with separate living and sleeping areas, a fully equipped kitchen, comfortable bed, complimentary internet access, and a sofa bed. Join us each morning for an included hot full breakfast. After a busy day, unwind with a complimentary evening social and drinks* Monday through Thursday. Stock up on snacks, beverages, frozen treats, chilled meals and travel essentials at the 24-hour Suite Shop®.

about_text: Welcome to the Hotel California in Palm Springs! Nestled along the base of the San Jacinto Mountains, in the Southern California desert of Palm Springs, the Hotel California is an ideal adults only getaway for guests looking to relax and enjoy the sunshine. Our classic California Spanish Mission hotel provides just the right amount of rustic charm and romance. Fourteen comfortable rooms surround a sparkling pool and spa amid a lush courtyard where banana palm trees and birds of paradise sway in the breeze complimenting spectacular mountains views!!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Wilmington-Brandywine Valley
about_text:
Looking for a place to stay in Wilmington? Then look no further than Homewood Suites by Hilton Wilmington - Brandywine Valley, a family-friendly hotel that brings the best of Wilmington to your doorstep.
Homewood Suites Wilmington offers guests an array of room amenities including a flat screen TV, a kitchenette, and air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available.
The hotel offers a 24 hour front desk, a gift shop, and baggage storage, to make your visit even more pleasant. The property also features a pool and free breakfast. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking.
Nemours Mansion & Gardens (2.9 mi), located nearby, makes Wilmington Homewood Suites a great place to stay for those interested in visiting this popular Wilmington landmark.
When you’re feeling hungry, be sure to check out Famous Dave's, which is a barbeque restaurant that is popular with locals and out-of-towners alike.
Should time allow, The Delaware Contemporary and Highlands Art Garage are some popular art galleries that are relatively easy to get to.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Homewood Suites by Hilton Wilmington - Brandywine Valley as you experience everything Wilmington has to offer.

about_text:
The Hampton Inn Loveland hotel is conveniently located at the crossroads of Colorado interstate I-25 and Hwy 34 at the gateway to the Rocky Mountain National Park and Estes Park.  Located next to the Outlets of Loveland Factory Outlet Complex, we are at the midway point of Fort Collins, Loveland, Greeley, Denver and Cheyenne, Colorado. Loveland area attractions include Benson Sculpture Park, Budweiser Event Center (The Ranch), gaming, colleges, ice skating, dog racing, historic museums, scenic mountain drives, local plays, skiing and a western stock show.  Hampton Inn guests can dine at IHOP, Lonestar Steakhouse, Cracker Barrel, Chili's,  Johnnie Carinos, Black Eyed Pea, Cracker Barrel, McDonald's, KFC or Subway, all within a half mile of our hotel. 

The Hampton Inn Loveland hotel features 80 rooms, fitness center, indoor pool and hot tub and a complete business center.

hotel_name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Loveland, an IHG Hotel
about_text: Our Loveland hotel offers premium amenities. Experience ultimate comfort at our Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Loveland, located just two miles away from the Fort Collins-Loveland Airport (FNL). Your family will love staying at our hotel in Loveland, CO - the Gateway to the Rocky Mountains. We are located just off I-25, with easy access to numerous area attractions, including the Anheuser-Busch Brewery, Benson Sculpture Park, Highland Meadows Golf Course and Boyd Lake State Park. You can also enjoy shopping at the Promenade Shops at Centerra and the Prime Outlets of Loveland. Business travelers will appreciate the comfortable accommodations at this new Loveland hotel. Situated in a beautiful suburban area, we offer close proximity to the Fort Collins-Loveland Airport and several local businesses, including Anheuser-Busch, Heska Corporation, Goldco, Vestas, Hexcel, JBS, State Farm and the Hach Company.

hotel_name: Avid Hotels Milwaukee West - Waukesha, An IHG Hotel
about_text: Welcome to avid hotel Milwaukee West - Waukesha! You will find our modern hotel off I94-E on the southwest corner of Meadow Lane and Marshview Street. During your stay you can expect clean, comfortable, contemporary accommodations and convenient on-site amenities, Including a modern 24-hour Market, fitness center, business center, and complimentary good all-round breakfast. In town for business, sports, or school? Our hotel is a quick drive to many facilities, such as GE, Pattyn, ProHealth Care, INNIO Waukesha Gas Engines, Center Court Sports Complex, and Carroll University. To top it all off, we are less than 3 miles from the Waukesha County Airport and Waukesha County Expo Center. Now that's what we call convenience! Whether you're in Waukesha for business, school, or leisure, we are confident you will enjoy your stay at our modern and clean hotel.

hotel_name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Milwaukee Brookfield
about_text:
Home2 Suites by Hilton Milwaukee Brookfield is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Waukesha, offering a family-friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.
Home2 Suites by Hilton Milwaukee Brookfield offers guests an array of room amenities including a flat screen TV, a kitchenette, and a refrigerator, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available.
The hotel offers a 24 hour front desk, baggage storage, and a convenience store, to make your visit even more pleasant. The property also features a pool and free breakfast. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking.
While in Waukesha, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Home2 Suites by Hilton Milwaukee Brookfield, including Chancery Pub & Restaurant (1.1 mi), Albanese's Roadhouse (0.4 mi), and Meiji Restaurant (0.2 mi).
Should time allow, Waukesha County Historical Society & Museum is a popular history museum that is relatively easy to get to.
Enjoy your stay in Waukesha!

about_text: Be the Tru you at Tru by Hilton Brookfield Milwaukee. Visit nearby Brookfield Square Shopping Mall and Milwaukee County Zoo, then relax in your cozy guest room. Our innovative rooms offer free WiFi, large TVs with premium channels, and tons of storage space. Big, bright bathrooms with products from Not Soap, Radio make mornings a breeze. Start your day right with our free, hot breakfast. Select scrambled eggs and sausages, cereal, bagels and yogurt, or deliciously indulgent waffle boats. Whatever you choose, make it your own with over 30 sweet and savory toppings. Find your fun in our lively lobby, complete with games and semi-private alcoves. Free tea, hot chocolate and LavAzza coffee are available 24/7 - and you can even jazz up your drink with a variety of flavored syrups. Swim in our pool, work out in the fitness center or unwind on the patio. Affordable travel now comes with unexpected things - like certainty.

about_text: Unwind at the Courtyard Gulfport Beachfront Hotel; whether away for work or play, feel the comforts of home with complimentary wireless internet, recreational amenities and an on-site restaurant. The closest hotel to the Mississippi Aquarium. Easy access to Downtown Gulfport, Ship Island Excursions, Naval Construction Battalion Center, the Port of Gulfport, Mississippi Coast Coliseum and Convention Center, MGM Baseball Stadium, and Keesler Air Force Base. Relax following an action-packed day of meetings or sightseeing. Get rejuvenated in our large salt water swimming pool, challenge your co-workers to game of corn hole, or stay fit in our fully equipped fitness center. In the evening, watch the sunset over the Gulf of Mexico while enjoying dinner or refreshing cocktail in our Bistro restaurant. Our hotel's accommodations offer one of the largest meeting facilities on the coast, where we take care of the details so you can keep up with your busy lifestyle.

hotel_name: Hilton Garden Inn Salt Lake City/Layton
address: 762 West Heritage Park Blvd, Layton, UT 84041-5719
about_text:
The Hilton Garden Inn Salt Lake City/Layton hotel is just 25 miles north of downtown Salt Lake City, Utah, 30 miles from Snow Basin ski resort, two miles south of Hill Air Force Base and just east of Interstate 15. Our Salt Lake City area hotel is are within walking distance to over 20 great restaurants, the Layton Hills Mall, two movie theaters, a SuperTarget, shops and much more.

Our Hilton Garden Inn Salt Lake City/Layton hotel is attached to the NEW Davis Conference Center, boasts 147 well-appointed guestrooms, including six suites. Each hotel room features every amenity, including a refrigerator, microwave, complimentary wireless high-speed Internet access, a spacious work desk and PrinterOn (print from your room) capability. The Hilton Garden Inn hotel in Layton, Utah features the Great American Grill and Club Fahrenheit (a private club for members), an indoor pool, whirlpool, fitness center, and 24-hour business center.

about_text:
Welcome to DoubleTree by Hilton Lafayette East. Set off I-65 and State Road 26, our sleek hotel is close to corporate offices like Subaru, Caterpillar, Arconic and Arnett Hospital. Just a 5 minute drive will get you Downtown Lafayette and all its offerings, as well to the campus of Purdue University. Visit historic sites like the Samara House and Fort Ouiatenon while you're here, and reach Indianapolis Airport in an hour.

Welcoming you at check-in with a warm DoubleTree chocolate chip cookie and a smile is just the beginning of our award winning service! Make yourself at home in a guest room with complimentary WiFi, a 50-inch HDTV, mini-fridge, ergonomic work space, coffeemaker and an in-room safe. Here a few days? Choose a suite for more space and extras like a microwave, cozy sofa and walk-in shower.

Join us for breakfast and dinner in the Made Market Restaurant, with menus that focus on fresh and healthy American fare or enjoy your favorite cocktail in the Made Market Lounge.

about_text:
Enjoy the Best of Lafayette, Indiana's Hotels.
Experience an unforgettable stay in the 100% smoke-free Holiday Inn® Lafayette - City Centre hotel, the preferred choice of hotels in Greater Lafayette, IN. You can indulge and relax in our richly appointed rooms and suites, equally equipped for business and pleasure.Nestled in Historic downtown Lafayette, IN, our hotel's property is near Purdue University , just 3 blocks from the Tippecanoe County Courthouse and within walking distance of Long Theater. Unique shops and local restaurants line the streets, and a variety of performance art and theater venues are close by.
Area companies including Caterpillar, TRW, Arconic, Evonik, Wabash National, Subaru, and Toyota are just minutes from our facility in Lafayette, IN. We are near local hospitals, and Purdue Research Park, as well.

about_text:
Fairfield Inn & Suites Turlock is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Turlock, offering many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.
Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel.
The property also boasts a pool and free breakfast, to help make your stay more enjoyable. If you are driving to Fairfield Inn & Suites Turlock Hotel, free parking is available.
While visiting Turlock, you may want to try some burritos at one of the nearby restaurants, such as La Mo's Cafe, Mundo's Latin Grill, or Chipotle Mexican Grill.
Should time allow, Carnegie Arts Center is a popular art gallery that is relatively easy to get to.
Enjoy your stay in Turlock!

hotel_name: Candlewood Suites Turlock, an IHG Hotel
about_text: Welcome to Candlewood Suites, Turlock the one and only extended stay hotel in the area. Candlewood Suites Turlock is centrally located just minutes from Emanuel Medical Center, University of Stanislaus and Pedretti Park (walking distance) in Turlock. We are only 12 miles a way from Modesto and all the major hospitals (Kaiser, Sutter Memorial and Doctors Medical Center of Modesto) and international companies in the area (E. & J. Gallo, Conagra Foods, Seneca Foods, Sensient Technology, Bunge, Del Monte and many more). Our guests can cook meals in their fully equipped kitchen, relax in the recliner while watching movies from our free movie library. Business travelers will work more efficiently utilizing the executive desk with speaker phone and free high-speed Internet. Our guests will enjoy the one of the best restaurants in town right next to our hotel and will receive great discounts on their meals. For those guests that prefer to Dine In our Candlewood Cupboard provides breakfast, lunch, and dinner options, as well as sodas, snacks, and ice cream or enjoy our out-door grill Much larger than the average hotel room and more affordable than a corporate apartment, the Candlewood Suites is the perfect home away from home for relocation, project and temporary medical assignments Whether your visit brings you to us for business or pleasure, one night or an extended stay, the Candlewood Suites is ready to serve you. We are a pet friendly hotel (Pet fee applies).

about_text:
At the modern 4-story Hampton Inn & Suites Muncie Indiana hotel, you'll find exactly what you need. Whether your travel is business or pleasure in our spacious bedroom you'll enjoy all the extras our hotel has to offer. 

You can enjoy the Hampton Inn & Suites Muncie Indiana hotel's free amenities like On the House hot breakfast daily, kids under 18 stay free, exercise facility and a indoor heated swimming pool. The Hampton Inn & Suites is the nation's leading chain of quality, value-priced hotels. 

At the Hampton Inn & Suites Muncie Indiana hotel, you'll find clean, fresh, comfortable rooms standard with coffee maker, iron and ironing board and cable television. Enjoy free locals calls and no surcharge for using a calling card and complimentary High Speed Internet Access. 

Smoking is prohibited in our entire hotel and guest rooms. Start your day with a complimentary USA Today newspaper Monday through Friday.

address: 6200 Gulf Boulevard, St. Pete Beach, FL 33706
ranking: #23 of 32 hotels in St. Pete Beach
about_text: The Beachcomber Beach Resort Hotel is located on 5 1/2 acres of beautifully tropical landscaped gardens. From the first glimpse of the beautiful, white sandy beach and the blue waters of the Gulf of Mexico to the welcoming smiles of all of our associates, you will feel relaxed and glad to be here. The Beachcomber offers rooms overlooking the Tropical Landscaped Gardens, the Swimming Pool, or the white sandy Beach. Each of our guest rooms has two double beds, a small refrigerator, coffee maker, iron and ironing board, hairdryer, large closet, AM/FM clock radio and Flat Screen TV with free HBO. There are two heated swimming pools with chaise loungers, an on-site fitness center, an on-site guest laundry facility, complimentary coffee served daily in the lobby.

about_text:
Right in the heart of the Florida Middle Keys, find your paradise at the Hampton Inn Marathon hotel. Refresh in the oceanfront pool and find fun at the Tiki Bar. Learn about sea life at the nearby Dolphin Research Center and Sombrero Reef Marine Sanctuary. Visit the Turtle Hospital, Seven Mile Bridge and the Marathon Garden. Perfect your game at Key Colony Beach Golf Course. 
Our modern guest rooms feature free WiFi, a microwave, refrigerator and 50-inch HDTV. Head to the lobby for free hot breakfast each morning, or grab one of Hampton's On the Run™ Breakfast Bags, available Monday through Friday. If you have to get work done, stop by the business center with access to a computer, faxing and printing capabilities. Walk to boat rentals, swim at Sombrero Beach and relax watching the sunsets at Calusa Beach.

hotel_name: Staybridge Suites Missoula, an IHG Hotel
about_text: Staybridge Suites Missoula hotel is conveniently located near I-90 and the Missoula International Airport. Just minutes from Downtown Missoula and the University of Montana, it is an ideal location for both corporate and leisure travelers. We want you to be comfortable during your time in our beautiful city. Located near a variety of restaurants and shopping, as well as golfing, skiing and world class fly fishing, we are perfectly suited for you to have fun during your down time. A full hot breakfast served complimentary every morning and evening meals Monday through Wednesday make us a great place to come home to. Our suites are ideal for extended stay guests featuring a kitchen with a full size refrigerator, cook-top, dishwasher, microwave, and all the cookware and dishes you will need. Amenities like our billiards room, basketball court and barbecue pavilion give you ample opportunities to socialize. Complimentary airport shuttle available.

about_text: Lovely Craftsman-style home circa 1905, built upon the site of the Battle of Franklin. Located within one mile of the Historic Downtown Shopping/Dining District of Franklin and 3 blocks from the famous Carter House and Lotz House Museum. Guests can choose from four uniquely decorated bedrooms furnished with antiques; each with its own private bath, and relax in the gathering room or large sun room and wraparound porch. Full breakfast served in the main dining room and coffee/tea bar available at all times in the gathering room.

about_text: Franklin Marriott Cool Springs is centered in the heart of the thriving Cool Springs district of Franklin, Tennessee area just south of Nashville. Located just off I-65, the hotel puts you close to historic Franklin attractions, FirstBank Amphitheater, the Galleria mall, sports facilities, and entertainment venues. The hotel features 300 guest rooms with luxurious linens, smart TVs, and in-room refrigerators. The vibrant lobby is anchored by Stave Regional Kitchen and Lounge, featuring a full bar and live music every Wednesday evening, and the newly renovated M Club executive lounge. Additional amenities include a heated indoor pool, large 24 hour fitness facility, business center, sundry shop, free parking, and 35,000 feet of flexible meeting space for the perfect conference, corporate meeting, wedding, and social event. WiFi is available for free in public areas, and has a surcharge of $9.95/day in rooms.

about_text: The Embassy Suites Flagstaff hotel is located in the heart of Flagstaff, Arizona, adjacent to the North Campus of Northern Arizona University (NAU) and only minutes from the Lowell Observatory - where Pluto was discovered - and historic downtown Flagstaff. This full-service, upscale, all-suite hotel is a short drive from the Arizona Snowbowl Ski and Recreation Area and centrally located to the natural wonders of Meteor Crater, Sunset Crater Volcano, Wupatki National Monument, Scenic Sedona, Oak Creek Canyon, the Painted Desert and the Grand Canyon National Park. Guests at the Embassy Suites Flagstaff hotel stay in spacious two-room suites with galley kitchens and receive a complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast, high-speed Internet access and a nightly manager's reception.

hotel_name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Flagstaff Downtown, AZ
address: 224 South Mikes Pike Street, Flagstaff, AZ 86001
about_text: Whether you plan to hike Coconino National Forest, snowboard at Arizona Snowbowl or check a national park off your bucket list, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Flagstaff Downtown, AZ provides the perfect home base for your Flagstaff adventures. Situated in the heart of downtown, our hotel is steps away from the best breweries, restaurants and shopping that the area has to offer and provides remarkable views of the surrounding mountains and forests. Plan an unforgettable outing to the Grand Canyon, about 80 miles from the hotel's property, or stick closer to home while you explore nearby attractions like Lowell Observatory, Wupatki National Monument and Sunset Crater Volcano National Monument.

about_text:
Hampton Inn Waterloo Cedar Valley sits a few minutes away from Waterloo, Iowa's waterfront along the Cedar River. You'll find an amazing variety of activities for your entire family around our Waterloo hotel. Our historic, quaint town is the perfect spot to catch an outdoor performance or visit an amazing piece of artwork. We're close to Crossroads Center, where you'll find dining and lots of places to shop.

See a John Deere tractor being manufactured. Attend the National Cattle Conference. Visit Silos & Smokestacks, a national heritage area that pays tribute to farm life, agribusiness and rural communities. Explore the Dan Gable International Institute and Museum, featuring wrestling figures throughout history. Marvel at The Galleria de Paco, a recreation of The Sistine Chapel done in aerosol paint.

Enjoy a free hot breakfast daily consisting of hot and cold items, and beverages. If you're running late, pick up a free Hampton's On the Run® Breakfast Bag on your way out the door.

about_text: Comfort Inn & Suites in Waterloo, IA near Crossroads MallLocated adjacent to shopping at Crossroads Mall, the Comfort Inn & Suites® hotel in Waterloo, Iowa offers easy access to Cedar Valley Arboretum and Cedar Valley Trails, 106 miles of hard-surfaced trails and 10 miles of water trails perfect for a variety of outdoor adventures. This Waterloo, IA hotel is also convenient to the Grout Museum of History and the University of Northern Iowa, home of the Panthers.Waterloo is home to John Deere Waterloo Operations, as well as Lost Island Water Park, the Waterloo Riverfront and a Downtown Museum District featuring the Waterloo Center For the Arts.Guests of this Waterloo, IA hotel are invited to relax in the indoor heated pool and enjoy the following additional amenities:Free wireless high-speed Internet accessFree newspaper Monday through FridayFree coffeePet-friendly hotel; additional fees applyYour Morning Breakfast is full of hot and delicious options, making breakfast at the Comfort Inn & Suites the perfect way to start your day. Enjoy our free hot breakfast featuring eggs, meat, yogurt, fresh fruit, cereal and more, including your choice of hot waffle flavors!All guest rooms at this non-smoking hotel offer a 32-inch high-definition flat-screen television, a microwave and refrigerator.Its perfect location and convenient access to area attractions make the Comfort Inn & Suites a great place for business and leisure travelers in the Waterloo, IA area.

about_text:
The Hampton Inn and Suites Dothan hotel in Alabama offers southern hospitality at its best.  The spacious lobby with its home-like atmosphere allows our guests to visit with family and friends as if you were at home.  Our complimentary On the House breakfast is served off the main lobby each morning.  Complimentary fresh coffee and tea are offered daily in the hotel lobby.  

Each of our beautifully appointed rooms has coffeemakers, irons and ironing boards as standard amenities.  Our Studios and Suites have a kitchenette with a microwave, refrigerator, wet bar and sofa sleeper to make you feel at home during your stay.  Our beautiful private swimming pool and spa are open year round for your enjoyment.  You will find our meeting facilities are ideal for small and large groups with convenient lobby access.  

To keep you connected, The Hampton Inn and Suites Dothan hotel is pleased to provide complimentary wireless high-speed internet service throughout the hotel.

about_text:
The Hilton Garden Inn Jackson hotel is in easy reach just off Interstate 40 at the Hwy 45 Bypass with easy access to Old Hickory Mall, the West Tennessee SportsPlex and other event venues. Get business done easily in the Jackson area with quick access from the hotel to the West Tennessee Healthcare, Kellogg's, Delta Faucet and Pinnacle Foods.

Wake up to a great morning with complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast at The Garden Grille & Bar®. Enjoy an evening cocktail in the Pavilion Lounge bar or have dinner delivered to your door. The Pavilion Pantry® is always open for convenience items. Take a dip in our outdoor pool or burn calories in the fitness center. Events and receptions are easy with our 2,300 sq. ft. of flexible event space including in our Tennessee Room for events for up to 100 people or our boardroom for small meetings of up to 12 people. Our professional event staff can help with catering options and all the details.

about_text: Renovated 2023 - Winners of the Choice Gold Award for Customer Satisfaction, the Comfort Suites is an all suites Hotel, located in the heart of the city. Guest will find a myriad of shopping and dining, most within 1 1/2 miles of the hotel. Access to Interstate 40 is within 1/16 of a mile. The Jackson Sportsplex is two exits down off I-40 and an approximate 7 minute drive. The Columns Shopping Center and restaurants is a quick 1/2 mile drive. The Comfort Suites offers a full hot breakfast, fitness center, indoor pool and hot tub spa, and a full business center. Guest appreciate our friendly staff and comfortable thermostat controlled suites, as well as our excellent customer service.

about_text: My Place Hotel-Pasco/Tri Cities, WA welcomes travelers for short-term or long-term stays! Take advantage of breakfast in bed by customizing your meal at check-in. Included in guest stays are a 24-hour front desk, complimentary coffee, and high-speed internet. Guestrooms were designed for comfort with pillowtop mattresses, blackout curtains, and in-room climate control. My Place offers an extended-stay hotel experience, providing a full kitchen in each room, an on-site laundromat, and MyStore stocked with all the essentials. The hotel extends a warm welcome to pets, making it a pet-friendly accommodation. The My Place in Pasco is within a half mile of the HAPO Center and Gesa Stadium! Other attractions in the area are the Bechtel National Planetarium, and the REACH Museum. Don't wait, book your experience at My Place Hotel in Pasco, WA today!

hotel_name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Pasco-Tricities, an IHG Hotel
about_text: Enjoy the features at Pasco's NEWLY RENOVATED All-Suite Holiday Inn Express & Suites Whether it is business or pleasure that brings you to the Tri-Cities, the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Pasco is a perfect fit. We offer spacious accommodations with all suites featuring a living room, 55-inch TV, wet bar, microwave, mini fridge, and in-room coffee. With the hotel's location in Pasco, enjoy nearby shopping, restaurants, Gesa Stadium or TCYSA Soccer and HAPO Center Softball Complex, or boating on Columbia River. Visit the charming nearby wineries, golf courses, farmer's market, or shop until you drop at Columbia Center Mall. The Columbia River hosts hydroplane races during the summer. Just a few steps from the hotel, you will find the HAPO CENTER hosting conventions, conferences, or tradeshows. Don't miss a chance to see the Bechtel National Planetarium at CBC, or for the outdoor enthusiast enjoy Sacajawea State Park, Badger Mountain when you are in town.

hotel_name: Hilton Garden Inn New Orleans Airport
about_text:
Hilton Garden Inn New Orleans Airport is 4.5 miles from the Louis Armstrong New Orleans International Airport, nestled in suburban Kenner, Louisiana. We are proud to offer hotel guests complimentary airport shuttle service. Hilton Garden Inn New Orleans Airport overlooks Lake Pontchartrain in the Laketown area, adjacent to the Pontchartrain Convention Center and next to the Treasure Chest Casino, both within walking distance.
 
Our full-service hotel is certain to please both business and leisure travelers alike. Hilton Garden Inn New Orleans Airport offers a plethora of amenities that will make your stay away from home a pleasure, including an on-site restaurant, complimentary Wi-Fi and a 24-hour business center. We strive to provide our guests with the utmost in comfortable, affordable accommodations.
 
Hilton Garden Inn New Orleans Airport offers 1,650 square feet of meeting space and catering services that accommodates up to 80 people.

hotel_name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel New Orleans Airport
about_text:
The DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel New Orleans Airport, conveniently located in suburban New Orleans just off I-10, is only two miles from Louis Armstrong New Orleans International Airport (MSY) and minutes from the French Quarter and downtown New Orleans. Come see all of what New Orleans has to offer, suchas Bourbon Street, Harrah's Casino, the Aquarium of Americas, New Orleans Superdome, and the Central BUsineses District. Take the stress out of travelling with the complimentary 24-hour airport shuttle service. 

Choose from a range of spacious guest rooms, suites and executive accommodations with a long list of thoughtful amenities to make your stay as comfortable as possible. For your convenience, wireless HSIA is available in public areas throughout the hotel. Guests also have full use of an array of great services such as a sparkling outdoor pool in a beautiful courtyard setting, a well-equipped 24-hour fitness center and plentiful, free on-site parking.

about_text: With an ideal location in Maryland’s second largest city, the Hampton Inn and Suites Frederick-Fort Detrick offers easy access to Fort Detrick along with all the other attractions of the city. Our hotel is three miles from downtown Frederick destinations like the fairgrounds and Hood College. Wells Fargo, U.S. Silica, and the National Laboratory for Cancer Research are within four miles. Whether you prefer to take in the historical sites or stroll through the town, browsing antiques, this hotel is conveniently positioned for both business and leisure travel. And during your stay, enjoy a free, hot breakfast each morning, complimentary internet service, free parking, an indoor pool, fitness center and more.

hotel_name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Oshkosh-Sr 41, an IHG Hotel
about_text: Comfort, convenience and professional courtesy is our Oshkosh, WI Hotel's PriorityDiscover the cities charm while staying at the ideal location for business and leisure travelers. Conveniently located off US-41, the Holiday Inn Express® Hotel & Suites Oshkosh - SR-41 hotel also offers a free shuttle to Appleton Airport (ATW) based on availability.Corporate travelers won't find a better smoke-free hotel in Oshkosh. The Holiday Inn Express offer intimate meeting space as well as premium business amenities. Relax by the fireplace while using complimentary wi-fi throughout the hotel. Amcor, Oshkosh Truck Corp, Aurora Hospital and the University of Wisconsin - Oshkosh are all located nearby the hotel's property.Oshkosh has plenty of fun and adventure to offer everyone, as well. Explore the past, present and future of aviation at the EAA AirVenture Museum. If you enjoy the outdoors, hike one of the area's many trails, including the Wiouwash.

address: 424 E Palm Canyon Dr, Palm Springs, Greater Palm Springs, CA 92264-8806
about_text: Welcome to the Hotel California in Palm Springs! Nestled along the base of the San Jacinto Mountains, in the Southern California desert of Palm Springs, the Hotel California is an ideal adults only getaway for guests looking to relax and enjoy the sunshine. Our classic California Spanish Mission hotel provides just the right amount of rustic charm and romance. Fourteen comfortable rooms surround a sparkling pool and spa amid a lush courtyard where banana palm trees and birds of paradise sway in the breeze complimenting spectacular mountains views!!

about_text: Situated along the waterfront of Portland, Maine, our hotel is in the heart of downtown. Explore the unique neighborhood with our complimentary Canopy bikes and find dozens of award-winning restaurants, shops, galleries, and trails within a mile. Our rooftop bar, Luna, features fantastic views of the working waterfront with a seasonal locally sourced menu of small plates and craft cocktails. Salt Yard Cafe and Bar provides all day dining from creative breakfast and pastries, fresh and healthy lunch choices, and classic cocktails with a local twist. For special events and large gatherings and we offer a private dining room and state of the art function spaces.

about_text: Enliven your Maine getaway at The Westin Portland Harborview, where you'll dwell in historic charm. Originally opened in 1927 as the Eastland Park Hotel, our hotel is immaculately restored while maintaining its rich beauty. In our New England town, you can explore the seafood restaurants and unique shops in Old Port, and admire river and mountain views at Western Promenade. Afterwards, lounge in luxury in our accommodations, where our contemporary style is united with modern amenities such as LCD TVs and workstations. When it's time to indulge, revel in the convenience of our 24-hour room service, and savor American bites and hand-crafted cocktails at our top floor bar and lounge. Experience a state of relaxation at Artne Spa, and work up a sweat at our WestinWORKOUT® Fitness Studio. Planning an event? Our historic ballroom creates the perfect backdrop for your celebration or conference. Elevate your occasion with our catering and coordinating services. At The Westin Portland Harborview, escape the ordinary.

hotel_name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Davis - University Area, an IHG Hotel
about_text: Welcome to Holiday Inn Express Davis - University Area. This Davis, California hotel is conveniently located near I-80, less than a mile from downtown Davis with restaurants, shopping and the U.S. Bicycling Hall of Fame, 1.5 miles from the University of California Davis campus, 1.5 miles from the Mondavi Center for the Performing Arts, 1 mile from Amtrak station and a 25 minute drive from Sacramento International Airport (SMF). Other great destinations such as Sacramento State Capitol, San Francisco, Napa Valley and Lake Tahoe are all close enough for a great day trip! During the day relax by our outdoor pool and hot tub or take a ride around Davis on one of our complimentary road bicycles. In the evening join friends, family and colleagues in our spacious lobby with community tables featuring charging ports to just hang out or for a casual meeting. In the morning enjoy complimentary breakfast.

about_text: Hyatt Place UC Davis is located on the UC Davis campus within walking and biking distance of Downtown Davis. Hyatt Place UC Davis offers the perfect location to enjoy the area’s sights and attractions, which includes Mondavi Center for the Arts, Davis Arts Center and the Robert Mondavi Institute for Wine and Food Science. We are close to many UC Davis sporting events, including UC Davis Aggies basketball and football games at Aggies Stadium. Our spacious guestrooms feature our plush Hyatt Grand Bed® and state-of-the-art media and work centers. You’ll love the swiveling HDTV, Cozy Corner with sofa, and bathroom vanities with granite countertops and complimentary amenities. Get connected with free Wi-Fi and remote printing. Wake up to breakfast and coffee served fresh every day, or sip a cocktail at the bar in the p.m.

about_text: Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Camarillo, Hampton Inn & Suites Camarillo is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its family-friendly environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, Hampton Inn & Suites Camarillo makes it easy to enjoy the best of Camarillo. Rooms at Camarillo Hampton Inn provide a flat screen TV, and guests can stay connected with free wifi. You can also enjoy a pool and free breakfast while staying at Hampton Inn Camarillo. For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Camarillo, Hampton Inn & Suites Camarillo Hotel is located a short distance from McGrath Family Farm (1.5 mi) and St. Mary Magdalen Chapel (2.1 mi). During your visit, be sure to check out one of Camarillo's popular shrimp restaurants such as Lure Fish House, Wood Ranch BBQ & Grill, and Charn Thai Restaurant, all a short distance from Camarillo Hampton Inn. about_text: Stay at the Holiday Inn Express Hotel and Suites St. Paul/Woodbury, fresh from a million dollar renovation. Enjoy our newly expanded Express Start breakfast area and business center. As a guest at Holiday Inn Express Hotel and Suites St. Paul/Woodbury, we have thought of everything to make your stay the very best. Starting with our complimentary hot deluxe Express Start breakfast, our 100 room hotel includes whirlpool, fireplace, one and two room suites with refrigerators and microwaves. We are a 100% non-smoking hotel. During your visit to the Holiday Inn Express Hotel and Suites St. Paul/Woodbury enjoy our indoor pool/whirlpool, exercise room and free wireless Internet. Feel refreshed with our new bathroom design, including our new custom shower heads made by Kohler, and our new J.R. Watkins bath amenities. about_text: We offer hot buffet style breakfast including bacon, eggs, biscuits and gravy, yogurt, cereal, and our guests favorite, Waffles. We have a refreshment bar available 24 hrs a day consisting of fresh lemon water, and brewed ice tea, your choice of reg or decaf coffee. Our feature is for the kids or the young at heart it is a 2 story water slide that goes in and outside of the hotel, our pool is always available for the less adventurous, warm and inviting. We offer rooms for the disabled as well as rooms furnished with 2 queen beds, and king bed rooms each of these are also available in our suite category. Our prices will be hard to beat. The staff prides itself in catering and seeing to your every need, your sastisfaction is #1! We offer convenient parking we are close to the highway, you are within walking distance of a variety of shops and restaurants. So, let us be your next "Choice" when looking for a great place to stay for rest, play, or your get away!

about_text: Balance Work with Life at our Rockville Hotel​EVEN® Hotel Rockville-Washington D.C. Area is just steps from the Twinbrook Metro Station, providing easy access to Washington D.C., Baltimore, Gaithersburg, and Glenmont​.​Our wellness hotel in Rockville features modern, relaxing guest rooms with in-room fitness equipment, spa-inspired bathrooms, and complimentary nightly tea service. Keep up with your routine with our best-in-class 24-hour Fitness Center and healthy dining options. EVEN Hotel Rockville- Washington, D.C. Area is pet-friendly. We also offer flexible event spaces​ for your business event.​Take a day trip to Washington D.C.'s famous memorials, tour the Smithsonian Museums and the National Mall. Head to Baltimore and explore the Inner Harbor, and The Maryland Science Center. Bethesda is mere minutes away, offering great shopping and dining options.Business travelers will also be close to Deloitte, GlaxoSmithKline, Kaiser Permanente, Walter Reed National Military Medical Cente

about_text:
Looking for a place to stay in Janesville? Then look no further than Quality Inn, a budget friendly hotel that brings the best of Janesville to your doorstep.
Rooms at Quality Inn provide air conditioning, and guests can stay connected with free wifi.
In addition, while staying at Quality Inn guests have access to a 24 hour front desk. You can also enjoy free breakfast. Need a place to park? Free parking is available at Quality Inn.
While you’re here, be sure to check out some of the diners, including Wedge Inn East and Kealy's Kafe, all of which are a short distance from Quality Inn.
Plus, during your trip, don't forget to check out an art gallery, such as Raven's Wish Gallery.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Quality Inn as you experience everything Janesville has to offer.

about_text:
Looking for a place to stay in Conway? Then look no further than Home2 Suites by Hilton Conway, a family-friendly hotel that brings the best of Conway to your doorstep.
Guest rooms offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a kitchenette, and Home2 Suites by Hilton Conway makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.
You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the hotel, including a 24 hour front desk, baggage storage, and newspaper. In addition, guests can enjoy a pool and free breakfast during their visit. As an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.
For those interested in checking out Baum Gallery at Uca (2.2 mi) while visiting Conway, Home2 Suites by Hilton Conway is a short distance away.
While in Conway, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Home2 Suites by Hilton Conway, including Umami Sushi Lounge & Grill Fusion (0.2 mi), Tacos 4 Life Grill (1.0 mi), and Mulan's Chinese Buffet and Suishi (0.3 mi).
If you are interested in exploring Conway, check out a park, such as Cadron Settlement Park.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Home2 Suites by Hilton Conway as you experience everything Conway has to offer.

hotel_name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Conway, AR
about_text: Located in the "Town of Colleges," the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Conway, AR lies within three miles of the University of Central Arkansas, Central Baptist College and Hendrix College. We also offer easy access to the Don Owens Sports Complex, about five minutes away, and our hotel's position near I-40 lets you quickly reach downtown Little Rock. Browse the artifacts at the Faulkner County Museum or admire the paintings and photographs at the Baum Gallery, both less than four miles away.

about_text: At the Hilton Garden Inn Conway hotel, both busy executives and leisure travelers will be pleased to find everything to make their trip to Conway relaxing and enjoyable. Our mattresses are so comfortable you won't want to leave. about_text: The Hilton Garden Inn Montebello/Los Angeles hotel in California is situated on the 1st tee of the beautiful historic Montebello 18-hole Championship Golf Course just 8 miles east of Downtown Los Angeles, California. We are in the middle of San Gabriel, Los Angeles and Orange County. Features were designed with you in mind, whether are visiting for business or leisure.

hotel_name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Los Angeles Montebello
about_text: Our Los Angeles Montebello hotel is located in the serene suburban area, only eight miles outside downtown LA with easy access to businesses and attractions. Relax in a comfortable suite, start the day with free breakfast daily. We feature an indoor/outdoor pool maintained with natural minerals and a Spin2Cycle facility, where you can run a load of washing while exercising.

about_text:
Finding an ideal family-friendly hotel in Paris does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Hotel Montebello, a nice option for travelers like you.
While staying at Hotel Montebello Paris, visitors can check out Eiffel Tower (1.3 mi) and Cathédrale Notre-Dame de Paris (1.4 mi), some of Paris' top attractions.
Guest rooms offer air conditioning, a refrigerator, and a kitchenette, and Hotel Montebello Paris makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.
You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the hotel, including baggage storage. As an added convenience, there is paid public parking available nearby.
While in Paris, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Hotel Montebello Paris, including Angelina (1.2 mi), Le Comptoir (0.9 mi), and Le Relais de l'Entrecote (0.6 mi).
Best of all, Hotel Montebello Paris makes it easy to experience many great Paris attractions like Musée de l’Armée des Invalides, Museum of the Legion of Honor, and Musée des Plans-Reliefs, which are some popular military museums.
Hotel Montebello looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Paris.
